recentChanges:
You hear them howlin' at night... They come creeping out to give you a fright... Be cautious not to attract their attention... WEREMONSTERS are here to increase your tension! Hide to go unnoticed, prepare your fire shoot, and burn them down!

Enjoy the new Trick or Treat event! Complete the missions over the whole month and double your credits when playing during the weekend. Ghostly Greetings!
comments: This game used to be amazing when it first came out, now it is outdated as the developers have failed to conserve the player experience, with the game being infested with hackers, and oversaturated with ridiculous armor perks that wouldn't be accepted in any competitive game. All we see now is new content alongside no balance changes. This game is screaming for a sequel.

Really, I spent much money on this game, but I can't get my purchases back ? Why is that ? I don't know if this is possible, but check my Google pay history. It's littered with this game. So please, can I have most or all of my items back ? Thanks

I honestly love the game, it has smooth gameplay, rewards are fair, and easy controls. The reason why I gave three stars is multiplayer mode, the matching is unfair. I'm just level 18 and my enemies are in level 43, 65, 58, etc... I hope you guys can have a better match making like making players with the same levels battle just to be fair. So I hope you guys can do that someday.

Very fun! But if you are looking for a game that can save your progress, this is not it, I almost reach the max lvl and bought so many real money items, but sadly I can't load my progress to a new devices,I spend so many real money,but I can't get it back, my old device is broken and I can't load my progress to my new phone, please add account or make it so we can save our progress by connecting to Google play games, this game is very fun to be honest, but it's not perfect yet, saves will do it

I dont like how I try to play multiplayer and end up getting matched with players with a lot higher combat rating. I almost always get killed with a single shot or at the very least very easily. If you were to start playing this game from scratch, it isnt worth it. Needs immediate improvement. Place low level players with low level players and high level players with high levels.

title: The Walking Dead: Road to Survival
description:
The Walking Dead Road to Survival is the definitive Walking Dead strategy RPG game, brought to you by Robert Kirkman, creator of The Walking Dead comic series.

Build your team of Survivors and develop battle strategies to lead them into battle in an uncompromising story, fraught with danger. Fight for survival against walkers and humans alike, using strategy to attack enemy weak points and deep RPG progression to decide your path. Build a town to keep the walkers at bay, but be warned ‚Äì The horrors that lurk outside aren‚Äôt the only threat, and your decisions are all that stand between life and death.

Based on an all-new story from award-winning Walking Dead writer Jay Bonansinga, the dark aesthetic of this game reflects the uncompromising decisions you will need to make as you strategize for survival.

Stand with Michonne, Rick and other survivors from The Walking Dead, and join the epic battle against the darkest enemies from the Governor to Negan.

THE WALKING DEAD: ROAD TO SURVIVAL FEATURES:

Fight Walkers & Survivors
‚Ä¢ Battle against fierce opponents and use your best strategy to survive
‚Ä¢ Charge opponents with special melee and ranged attacks using deadly weapons like Michonne‚Äôs katana

Collect & Recruit Survivors
‚Ä¢ Collect new Survivors from The Walking Dead universe, each with their own specialized battle strategy

Upgrade Your Survivors 
‚Ä¢ Level up and customize Survivors to enhance their fighting strategies, weapons and skills
‚Ä¢ RPG progression makes your Survivors stronger as they cut down more walkers

Strategy Gameplay - Capitalize on Strengths & Exploit Weaknesses
‚Ä¢ Battle strategy is key to scoring powerful hits ‚Äì but watch out for retaliating strikes
‚Ä¢ Your battle strategy is all that‚Äôs keeping the Survivors of Woodbury safe ‚Äì Strategize and strike to win

Maps & Locations From The Walking Dead
‚Ä¢ Explore a new 3D map featuring real locations from The Walking Dead comics

Build your Community Base & Expand into the Wasteland
‚Ä¢ Build houses to hold Survivors, a Town Hall to expand your city, a Workshop to craft items, and more

PvP - Raid Enemies
‚Ä¢ Use your battle strategy to raid enemy factions for resources in the All Out War online mode
‚Ä¢ Strategic Multiplayer battles in a wide-open world filled with potential enemies and vicious walkers. 

Alliance Factions & Online Strategy
‚Ä¢ Multiplayer alliances and battle strategies keep you safe. Join allies in a faction to create a battle strategy and pool resources in the harsh world of The Walking Dead
‚Ä¢ Battle and build together with friends in multiplayer role-playing strategy gameplay

Battle in Iconic The Walking Dead Locations
‚Ä¢ Fight alongside your faction for control of areas from The Walking Dead
‚Ä¢ Battle to conquer and defend locations like Alexandria, Woodbury, Sanctuary, and more

Make Strategized Decisions to Change the Story
‚Ä¢ Decisions impact the story mode and make each game campaign unique
‚Ä¢ Write your own Survivor story in this dynamic and compelling Walking Dead RPG

Live In-Game Events 
‚Ä¢ Play to obtain valuable resources and new, exclusive Survivors.

Walkers tear at your city walls, while desperate Survivors rip apart the town‚Äôs foundations from the inside. When the time comes to fight, what will you choose?

Terms of Service: http://scopely.com/tos/
Privacy Policy: http://scopely.com/privacy/
Additional Information, Rights, and Choices Available to California Players: https://scopely.com/privacy/#additionalinfo-california.

‚Ä¢ Level up and customize Survivors to enhance their fighting strategies, weapons and skills
‚Ä¢ RPG progression makes your Survivors stronger as they cut down more walkers

Strategy Gameplay - Capitalize on Strengths & Exploit Weaknesses
‚Ä¢ Battle strategy is key to scoring powerful hits ‚Äì but watch out for retaliating strikes
‚Ä¢ Your battle strategy is all that‚Äôs keeping the Survivors of Woodbury safe ‚Äì Strategize and strike to win

Maps & Locations From The Walking Dead
‚Ä¢ Explore a new 3D map featuring real locations from The Walking Dead comics

Build your Community Base & Expand into the Wasteland
‚Ä¢ Build houses to hold Survivors, a Town Hall to expand your city, a Workshop to craft items, and more

PvP - Raid Enemies
‚Ä¢ Use your battle strategy to raid enemy factions for resources in the All Out War online mode
‚Ä¢ Strategic Multiplayer battles in a wide-open world filled with potential enemies and vicious walkers.

Alliance Factions & Online Strategy
‚Ä¢ Multiplayer alliances and battle strategies keep you safe. Join allies in a faction to create a battle strategy and pool resources in the harsh world of The Walking Dead
‚Ä¢ Battle and build together with friends in multiplayer role-playing strategy gameplay

Battle in Iconic The Walking Dead Locations
‚Ä¢ Fight alongside your faction for control of areas from The Walking Dead
‚Ä¢ Battle to conquer and defend locations like Alexandria, Woodbury, Sanctuary, and more

Make Strategized Decisions to Change the Story
‚Ä¢ Decisions impact the story mode and make each game campaign unique
‚Ä¢ Write your own Survivor story in this dynamic and compelling Walking Dead RPG

Live In-Game Events
‚Ä¢ Play to obtain valuable resources and new, exclusive Survivors.

Walkers tear at your city walls, while desperate Survivors rip apart the town‚Äôs foundations from the inside. When the time comes to fight, what will you choose?

Privacy Policy: http://scopely.com/privacy/
Additional Information, Rights, and Choices Available to California Players: https://scopely.com/privacy/#additionalinfo-california.

recentChanges:
The Total War update is here!
-Two all new War maps have been added: Sanctuary and Kingdom
-Mercenaries have been added to War! Allowing you to jump into the fight faster in Road to Survival's premier event!
-Intra-region matchmaking has been added to Cross Region War! You can now be matched against factions on your region and other regions during CRW events!
-Six New Stronghold effects have been added, mixing up the War experience!
comments: Better since last updated . Before i had lots of issues with the game and now its just an occasional hiccup and when it does go out its game wide and everyone gets some type of apology gift. Still a lot of differences between free vs pay but better for free now than it was in the past. I love my faction and this is the best aspect of the game. They make me want to log in even on busy or bad days. Try it, just wait to be sure that you're gonna keep playing before you spend too much $$$.

I absolutely love this game but my biggest complaint as I've gotten into later game play is that, every time I try to raid, I have to refresh for up to 30 or more minutes trying to find an opponent within even 90,000 levels of my rank. I've even been given the rank 23 person twice before I've gotten someone close. A person whose rank 100,000 should not have to almost exclusively fight people in the top 1000 players. They're characters are exceptionally stronger.

These seasonal events and just events in general need to be lowered in team power all together. Literally feel like i cant do anything in the Halloween event because you need a S11 or higher team.... Hey Devs? You want poeple playing and enjoying your events and content later on yes? Why have the power for seasonal events on the roadmaps be for S11 - S12 and up? Why not have as many people as possible enjoying it? Why save it for players at the end of the game, or people who pay lots of cash?

One of the best game i've ever played but the raid is so unbalanced,the wars is the worst its so unbalanced that it's almost impossible to win.Imagine workimg hard to get strong then ended up being defeated by a rich player who is at low level but have strong characters.

Royal Coins fail. I've won enough to at lease have 800 TWD points/coins but yet my number is still stuck at 550. Between yesterdays jackpot and today's I should have had enough to unlock TWD Shane. But its like its stuck to that number. Can someone like help me.

title: School of Dragons
description:
Fly fast, train hard, and learn well to become the Ultimate Dragon Trainer! Join Chief Hiccup and Toothless and embark on the thrilling adventures of DreamWorks Animation‚Äôs ‚ÄòHow to Train Your Dragon‚Äô.   
Play with your friends and explore mysterious worlds in this action-packed learning experience! Rescue, hatch, and train Dreamworks Dragons, defend New Berk and the Hidden World, and battle Grimmel and Stormheart in the ultimate dragon adventure! 

***Reached No. 1 of ALL ROLE-PLAYING GAMES in 80 countries ***

Features:
‚Ä¢ Train, fly, and customize over 60 of your favorite Dreamworks Dragons from the movies including Toothless, Light Fury, Stormfly and Deathgrippers.
‚Ä¢ Customize your dragons with thousands of colors and skins, so no 2 dragons look alike!
‚Ä¢ Fly dragons and race against your friends in over 30 courses!
‚Ä¢ Hatch and collect dragons in your stables and send them out on dragon missions to bring back treasure and loot!
‚Ä¢ Venture across 30 islands and lands and embark on epic quests and more! 
‚Ä¢ Meet new characters and adventure in new story lines in our 8 expansion packs and over 400 quests!
‚Ä¢ Play Dragon Tactics, our dragon-squad strategy game, and defeat enemies for loot and prizes

Subscription Options:
*This app offers 4 membership subscription options: $9.99 /month, $24.99 /3 months, $47.99 /6 months, and $84.99 /year. 
** Membership Subscription will auto-renew, and the account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be managed and turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.

For more information, view our current privacy policy (http://www.schoolofdragons.com/Help/privacypolicy) and terms of use (http://www.schoolofdragons.com/help/siteterms).
Registration information is optional (children under 13 require parent registration). You will be able to be notified of game updates and new features along with integration to our online educational world for kids.
PLEASE NOTE: School of Dragons is completely free to play, but offers game content, customization options, and items for purchase with real money.  If you choose not to use this feature, you can disable in-app purchases through your device‚Äôs settings.

Dreadfall has arrived at campus, covering the school grounds with pumpkins, spiderwebs, and everything spooky! Vikings can begin collecting candies and earning time-limited rewards by participating in the many Dreadfall activities. Those participating can look forward to:

comments: Honestly, I've played this game before, so I got it again, only to be disappointed. Whenever I create (or try to) my viking, it stops at the name and says there is a problem registering my viking. Other people are having this issue, but I will keep the game and see if it's resolved soon. Jumpstart Games, fix your game, please.

It's overall a good game that I can spend my time on, but there are a lot of issues that makes many people frustrated. The infamous Battle Event glitch keeps appearing and it sucks. Also, stop changing the Battle Event rewards for the events. I just want to farm gems without engaging in the event, but it forces me to get candy instead. Events should be, well, an event that gives players an option to engage in it or not. Thawfest was the reason why I kept the game uninstalled for months.

It has been awesome playing this game and I love it !!!!!!! I'm glad that you fixed the wild dragon disappearing thing !! But .....I can't do like ....anything ! Cuz you have to pay money for gems and you can't do anything if you don't have gems ! I'd love it if you made there be less coin spending on the new quests and stuff like that !! Please do !!

This game is great.... except that the chat system is awful (the chat is a tad bit too censored and you could get banned for a simple mistake, even though they don't even tell what you said wrong, they just tell you that you said something wrong), the graphics aren't the best, but not the worst, and the controls (especially for decorating the farm) are kinda terrible. But, I suppose it is somewhat decent if you look past the issues. Also, the teen dragons are very glitchy and broken.

It's a fun game overall, but it's also a Pay-to-Win game. You either have to spend money on memberships or gems to do any of the fun quest, or grind for months. I have a membership account and it gets boring because theres no quests until a big update. You should add daily quest to level up your dragons, or just to do something fun. And I also get constantly get "Logged Out" of the game. Please fix that. And the chat is horrible. I can't say Hi or I get muted. But overall, it's a decent game.

title: Inside Out Thought Bubbles
description:
WINNER OF GOOGLE PLAY‚ÄôS BEST OF 2015 APPS! 

From the creators of Frozen Free Fall and Where‚Äôs My Water?, Disney Interactive brings you this one-of-a-kind bubble-shooter based on the hit Disney‚Ä¢Pixar film, Inside Out!   

Growing up can be a bumpy road, and it‚Äôs no exception for Riley. Like all of us, Riley is guided by her Emotions ‚Äî Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness. Join Riley's Emotions on a journey to match, sort and burst memory bubbles, as you travel through unique locations inspired by the film ‚Äî Family Island, Dream Productions, Boy Band Island, Imagination Land, Train Yard, and more! Play this bubble shooter that twists the puzzle genre inside out! 

‚Ä¢ SHOOT & MATCH memories
‚Ä¢ UNLOCK characters and play over 1000 levels
‚Ä¢ UNLEASH POWER-UPS ‚Äì Create sunbursts with Joy, let the rain pour with Sadness, blaze a fiery path with Anger, repel matching memories with Disgust, and scatter orbs in frantic fun with Fear!
‚Ä¢ OVERCOME obstacles like Brain Freezes and jump ahead using boosters like Brain Storms! 
‚Ä¢ CONNECT to Facebook to gift and receive free lives, and to see how you stack up against your friends!
‚Ä¢ IMMERSE yourself in the world of the film through stunning 3D animation and gameplay featuring voice actors from the film!

Before you download this app, please consider that this app includes advertising, some of which may be targeted to your interests.  You may choose to control targeted advertising within our applications by using your mobile device settings (for example, by re-setting your device‚Äôs advertising identifier and/or opting out of interest based ads).   
‚Ä¢ In-app purchases that cost real money
‚Ä¢ The option to accept push notifications to let you know when we have exciting updates like new content
‚Ä¢ Location-based services
‚Ä¢ Advertising for some third parties, including the option to watch ads for rewards
‚Ä¢ As well as advertising for The Walt Disney Family of Companies

Visit the official Inside Out Thought Bubbles website ‚Äì http://games.disney.com/inside-out-thought-bubbles-app

comments: The game decides today, 22 Oct 2020, that from now on, instead of ads, I have to use gems to buy a spin after a loss on a level. But of course, I don't have any gems and gems cost real money. And, there's no way to earn gems through game play, so no more free spins! We'll see what happens from here, but I may be deleting this game.

Good game. Few things I didnt like was it forces me to use my extra help options on the beginning of the game. Or even forces me to use boost energy at the start when I dont even need it! They only give you three gems so you would buy the boost energy but it costs 6 gems!! I tried to end game so that I wouldnt have to buy it with my gems. But then it forces you to use your gems to continue. Level 24.

Please add the new features in the next update of the game, game data save with social accounts and improvements on UX design like the main lobby display with the fresh new look! And one more thing please add more characters in this game. Next, please label the game levels with colourful background with difficulty indicator on the level number for example, no indicator for easy levels, skull indicator for hard levels and horned skull indicator for super hard levels just like Candy Crush Saga do

After progressing to a certain level, the game gives you colours that you can't use to complete the level. You also don't have enough balls, sometimes by just 1/2 short of what you need. If these problems aren't resolved, I feel to delete the game due to it's frustrating set up!

This game used to be fun. Now I am forever stuck on level 644, because you are only given 25 balls. It is impossible to pass this level with only 25 balls. Help on you tube show 37 balls. You can pass with 37 balls. Fix the game. Fix level 644. Is there any support anymore for this game? Are there to be anymore updates? If not, why?

title: NeuroNation Ease: Mindfulness & Meditation
description:
Welcome to NeuroNation Ease, a personalised and effective meditation app that will help you to make your first steps into the world of guided meditation and mindfulness with ease.

Ease Mindfulness and Meditation was developed by NeuroNation, a leading organisation in the field of scientific mental training. NeuroNation's cognitive training program was awarded the AOK-Leonardo Prize for Digital Prevention by Germany's Federal Ministry of Health.

We live in busy times, and it can be hard to find calm and peace among the hustle and bustle. That's why with NeuroNation Ease, you can undertake various guided courses to help you deal with stress, anxiety, sleeping problems, and to improve your focus. 

There are many studies that already show the various effects of regular meditation, including:

1. Reducing fatigue and learning how to prevent stress from taking hold before it arises.

2. Focussing your concentration and attention on that which is truly important for you.

3. Learning to combat recurring anxiety, worries, and panic attacks.

4. Helping stave off depression preventatively.

5. Finding inner peace and through this, being able to get a better night's sleep.

6. Allowing yourself to feel more content and happy, and to enjoy live to the full once more.

With NeuroNation Ease, you receive:

A free foundations course to introduce you to mindfulness and several techniques that can already help you in moments of stress.

Personalisation of your meditation sessions based on your needs - change the length of the sessions and the level of spoken guidance at any time to make it even easier to relax.

Guidance from a friendly and experienced meditation expert, with content developed together with the MBSR and MBCT practitioner Dr Malte Thormaehlen.

Daily reminders to help you integrate mindfulness into your routine in whichever way suits you best.

Several courses to introduce you to different techniques including breathing exercises and MBSR body scanning, with new courses published regularly.


NEURONATION EASE PREMIUM

NeuroNation Ease offers you an entire mindfulness course for free without restrictions. In addition to this, there are further courses to discover as part of NeuroNation Ease Premium and mini-exercises available to you looking at different techniques and allowing you to progress further on your mindfulness journey. New courses are published regularly, so keep an eye out!

developerAddress: Synaptikon GmbH | Friedrichstra√üe 68 | 10117 Berlin | Germany
recentChanges:
Dear Ease Community,

this update is intended to increase the stability of the app ‚Äì to make your training experience even more carefree and relaxing!

If you have any feedback for us, feel free to write to us at ease@neuronation.com.

Your Ease Team
comments: Great app. Straight forward and the narrator has an incredibly soothing voice. So much to gain from this app and their other app NeuroNation I think it's called? That one is fab too!! :)

This app is wonderful. There is a significant lack of pressure to adhere to a particular course or even to buy premium (making me personally feel far more willing to subscribe to be honest). This app feels like it genuinely created to support people rather than for financial gain - which is something you rarely see nowadays. All in all, this app places meditation in the hands of the user, but provides freedom within it's supportive direction. Useful both for the beginner and the experienced.
Just did a 7 minutes breathing exercises and love it so far. It's short and simple and I definitely feel more relaxed after 7 minutes.
Everything was working fine. Until yesterday when the sessions just stopped loading(only the hot air ballon appears). I have an A5 2017 and restarting the app/phone doesn't fix it.
I have tried to meditate in the past but never quite been able to. I tried this app and for the first time really understood how peaceful meditation can be!

comments: Just my type of game. Doesn't heavily rely on p2w status that heavily(yet?). Devs are pretty generous. Edit: sad to say, I have to lower the score to 3 star now. Right now, CP wars is horrible. No cash, no cp. But i understand that it's how the game get its profits. Arena, is not worth it anymore. It has become an endless grind. Not really that bad, but there's something missing. Contents, we need contents to keep players, be it P2W or F2P.

I have th PC version and the mobile version, its just as good on mobile, it runs so nice and smoothly on the phone. When it first came out I had game bugs that gave me a big disadvantage, but now I have restarted the game on a new phone and the game has improved alot since then. Sadly I lost my characters but I was able to catch up really quickly and better than before.

I don't like this game but i'm addicted to it. May be i got brain washed. The reality in this game is you can become stronger by spending money. You can enjoy the game w/o spending too much but once you play this game, mark my word, u'll definitely find a way to spend some to get stronger if you want to. I just put 3 stars because once u get disconnected, you will need to restart the game before you can play again and its really annoying when it happen while u're about to finish the merchantry.

Generally really fun. This latest update though has me stuck in a loop where it says it needs updated. But i have it updated to the latest version in the store. So it keeps sending me back to the store then back to the game then back to the store when there is no additional update? Update 10/29/20 they once again updated the game and made it unavailable to android users. Its a waste of money on this game when they continously update it and make it unavailable for days on end. Down to 1 star

At first release it was good . But now it's heavily pay to win. It becomes a slot machine game. So to new players I'll warn you it's to late for you guys to catch up on the game.you need to spend your entire life savings just to catch up with players if your only a casual player well it's to late there no content for you here the game contents is only for people who spent so much on this game to enjoy it. I'm telling you f2p way here it just a bluff. Save your precious time on something else

Star Trek Fleet Command expands its universe with brand new Star Trek: Discovery IP!

Enter a galaxy on the brink of war as Federation, Klingon, and Romulan forces vie for control of the Alpha and Beta quadrants. Discover an ancient secret that could tip the scales of power forever.

As the commander of a starbase on the edge of civilized space, you will recruit iconic officers like James T. Kirk, Spock, and Nero -- and build powerful ships including the Enterprise, the Romulan Warbird, and Klingon Bird of Prey.

comments: Terribly pay to win. Everything about this game is unbalanced. And it's daily missions aren't a quick couple minutes here and there to complete they take hours. This developer needs to learn the place of this style of game, its not one that you should be expected to sit down and play for hours a day, rather a few minutes here and there.

I was really enjoying this game however there are a large number of issues. Once you get to level 18+ everything takes to long to upgrade. Parts needed to upgrade ships start to get to high and it becomes boring doing the same daily missions to acquire the parts. All the missions I currently have in progress I'm unable to go further with as I need to upgrade ships to the right power. Can only purchase one pack then it's removed and replaced with a more expensive option

The game, and especially its publisher, sucks. In no case do not install the game to get reward in another game, because the promise of a high reward just a lure. Publisher just increase install base in such manner. The game itself has no originality in terms of gameplay and aimed at the donation, the donation and once again the donation. In my case for reaching level 15 was just an excuses from support you have not completed the task, you are free to walk .. (ticket #8682186 from ironsource)

Be aware that if you play this game it is set up to be pay to win. You can do ok till about level 30 - 32 then it is so difficult to upgrade anything with out buying expensive packages in the store. ($20-$100) The game has no power balance so your at the mercy of anyone more powerful than you. There is no addressing griefers as they spend the most on the game so it grows difficult to advance or do events at times being constantly attacked by ships you can't damage at all. Just don't bother.

Downgraded my review. I have been playing since June of 2019 and this game is definitely a pay-to-win game. The mechanics of the game are pretty easy one you get the hang of it, but you will never get a way without paying $$$$...it's not even that there are micro transactions, it's that they cost $50, $100, and one or two $20 thrown in there. Clearly the developers are making bank as they are large number of players who are level 30 and higher with super strong ships that can be got thu paying.

Spots Connect: A beautiful relaxing puzzle game, Launchship Studios presents an immersive connecting 3 spots game for lovers of simple and addictive relaxing puzzle games! Spots Connect offers hours and hours of fun-filled entertainment. It is all about the connection of vibrant colored spots.

In this antistress satisfying games of Match 3, you will have to identify 3 spots of the same color line and connect them in a single move. Spots Connect is the perfect flow game for any puzzle game enthusiasts as it offers numerous levels that are challenging and interesting for players!

A puzzle game with matching 3 gameplay of connecting spots is the best way to enjoy your time. Spots Connect is a relaxing game of Matching 3 props that unveil new quests at every level. Make the most of this adventure and enjoy the line connecting fun!

It is easy to play simple and addictive puzzle! games, yet hard to master. Match 3 or more of the same color spots in one move and make the longest possible line to earn points and unlock awesome power-ups. comments: This game has a lot of potential but after a while it gets quite boring. Don't you think that when you have the buttons with the stripes an the arrows that if you merge them together you could clear the board or some type of explosion that adds points to your score. Come on people use your imagination we all have one. If I come up with something as simple as the explosions with the straight buttons I'm sure you could come up with something a lot better since you're supposed to be the experts

I've always enjoyed this type of connect games and, to me, this is probably the best one out there. You can spin a wheel once a day for free to win bombs, scissors, ect. to help if needed. Youcan use gems to buy spins and it's very easy to get gems. There's no limit to how many times you can spin the wheel as long as you have gems which is great!Some levels are difficult but you can always get extra time if you watch a 5 to 30 second ad. Try it. It's a great game!

My "go to" game for winding down and chilling out. Rarely do I find myself frustrated, and the ads are tolerable and, quite often, convenient! My teenager laughs at my longevity/commitment.....Level 1141 and climbing! There's just so many spots waiting to be connected!!! ...................... Side note: I usually keep my volume off while I play, but sometimes I thoroughly enjoy listening to the spots ‚òÜ "PoP"!‚òÜ when connected........and the fireworks! ü§£ü§≠ü§ì

I don't like that you run out of gems so fast and that you only get 2 free ones when u watch an ad its just to much work to keep pressing the button and watching ads over and over again just for two gems.. I think we should get more gems and more time on the clock.

Please help! When playing a game, after a few minutes, everything freezes and can't make anymore moves.... do i perhaps need to do an update or something? Love the game and don't want to start from the beginning again. All help will be appreciated Thank you.

title: Panic Attacks?
description:
This FREE app will help you when you have Panic Attacks. I've had panic attacks myself for 14 years and overcame them.

In the app, you'll find various ways to find relaxation.

1- Voice Guided Relaxation Session
2- Other relaxing sounds (ocean, campfire)


But you will also get specific Audio Tips to deal with a Panic Attack or an Anxiety Attack.

Furthermore, I've created some Videos about Panic Attacks where I explain what happens in your body when you feel nervous and anxious. You'll also learn what to do to relax. Relaxation is a strong antidote against phobias and anxieties.

Good Luck!

Geert

comments: First, I read his book, just wow. It has helped me tremendously. If I explain how it would take me too long so short version. Wow. I'm not a book reader ad this was my first ever book I read as an adult (I'm 35). Dont even question Geert. Just listen.... and you will find some sort of healing. His app is the same! I open it almost everyday. It might need a little updating but I really didn't care cause the content is exactly what I needed in my life right now.
I've read the book and am using the app daily. It has helped soooo much. I am ready to be done with unwanted anxiety!
Along with his book this app is great. I love the videos and especially the audios I can listen to any time. Both have helped with my GAD and panic attacks.
So far so good! Very helpful and informative. But the app crashed out after only a few minutes.
Found this app because of Geert's book, this app is very helpful. But I would suggest uploading the rest of your course on here and charging for it through this app, just a suggestion.

Otherwise it's a great game due to graphics and everything and I've had decent enough luck because the luck is randomized so people shouldn't be complaining for not getting a feautured hero from non guaranteed summons, that's their fault.

So its good enough to keep my interest for about half a decade i think that definitely deserves 5 stars. I see a lot of comments complaining about summon rates but i think its just unlucky people who are mad at their luck. I usually get atleast one fetured hero in the period of how long the featured summon lasts and there is always a garuteed summon after so many tries ive got more than i can lvl

I love this game but I'm done with it until money-team fixes their game. Red grade basically money locked so arena is useless now since all the cash shoppers automatically win due to gold frames. I am sick of it and just making a statement about it. AVOID THIS GAME.
Constant crashes, worse, right off the bat, the intro scene = crash, the first battle demo = crash, the first use of the big skill = crash... me taking this game and throwing it into the TRASH.
Very generous with the summons, free diamonds and quests to get more diamonds. It's very easy to play without spending. Also, the collabs are awesome!

title: ‚àû Infinity Loop ¬Æ
description:
Simple, relaxing, endless game. People love it!

‚àû Infinity Loop is a fun way of increasing your logic skills. It can be considered a puzzle game about creating intricate looping patterns or just the application of using a simple concept: "connecting multiple things" and make fun out of it.

Some people say this game is a good puzzle game but with a great zen mode. The goal is to clear your mind, remove the stress from your daily life without any pressure or tension to solve the levels. 

If you are looking for a stress relief or a relaxing game type, enjoy the loop!

FAQ

How to Play Infinity Loop?

Connect all the lines and corners to make perfect connections. It is like killing chaos and reaching perfection. Watch the video to overview how it works. Check on youtube as well where several people post the solutions. Nonetheless, we suggest you to try to find yourself how the game works and what are you supposed to do.

How to Play the Infinity Dark Mode?

The goal of the dark mode is to make disconnections, breaking it all and not leaving a single piece connected.

How many levels the game has?

Infinite.

How can I save my game progress?

Make sure you connect the app with Google Play Games on the settings panel (the button is in the bottom of the gameplay). This way your progress won't be lost. If you face further issues reach us by e-mail.

Do I need to pay anything to play Infinity Loop?

No. The original game is 100% free. There is no need to pay anything for the original game. The game is free for unlimited levels. 

I don't feel the game is challenging. Why?

The challenge for us would be making the game with increasing difficulty after a certain level while at the same time relaxing and allowing infinity levels. So how could level 100.000 be more difficult than level 10.000? It is hard. So as we cannot have the best in all worlds, we have opted to make it relaxing for now. 

Note: This game is also available on Android Wear and Android Watches. And it's very fun as well!

comments: Gameplay is beautifully simple, fun, and above all else, relaxing. This game was doing so well at being a calming game with super great sound design and music. This, however, was conpletely ruined by specific ads. I'm all for free games having ads, but if you are marketing a chill relaxing game with good music, maybe blacklist certain ads. It's fine to have popups or quiet videos, but if i'm trying to relax and out of nowhere it goes "AUDIBLE" at the top of their lungs, its very jarring.

Played it years ago as a way to kill time, reinstalled again recently. Still as good as I remembered it. Not much changed: it's still the same straightforward puzzle game. It has its challenging moments which get rid of the occasional tedium, but overall is fun. I think a good casual way to enjoy it is to finish five to ten sets a day.

Great game! 3 stars because of the ads. Way too many ads. You're in the vibe with the music and all, then an ad kicks in. Come on! I understand you gotta make some money, but the ads kinda kill the mood. How about making a paid version without ads? This is a game I'd pay for.

This game is soooo fun. It helps me with maths and keeps my brain active. It is so rewarding when you get it right. The puzzles progress lovely and I think it is a good simple, but hard game. I would recommend üëç

The most amazing offline game is infinity loop. Game is most favourable for children to develope their brain towards brain games like chess and etc. This game is too funny as well as it has easy levels and some time it has hard levels as well..I like it's hard level loops..üíóüéÄ

title: Calm - Meditate, Sleep, Relax
description:
Calm is a leading app for meditation and sleep. Join the millions experiencing lower stress, less anxiety, and more restful sleep with our guided meditations, Sleep Stories, breathing programs, masterclasses, and relaxing music. Recommended by top psychologists, therapists, and mental health experts.

Calm is the perfect mindfulness app for beginners, but also includes hundreds of programs for intermediate and advanced users.

Guided meditation sessions are available in lengths of 3, 5, 10, 15, 20 or 25 minutes so you can choose the perfect length to fit with your schedule. Topics include:

* Calming Anxiety
* Managing Stress
* Deep Sleep
* Focus and Concentration
* Relationships
* Breaking Habits
* Happiness
* Gratitude
* Self-Esteem
* Body Scan
* Loving-Kindness
* Forgiveness
* Non-judgement
* Commuting to work or school
* Mindfulness at College
* Mindfulness at Work
* Walking meditation
* Calm Kids
* And so much more...

Also featuring:

* An original Daily Calm every day: a new 10-minute program added daily to help ease you into the day or unwind with before bed
* 100+ Sleep Stories: adult bedtime stories guaranteed to lull you to sleep
* 7 and 21 day programs for both beginner and advanced users
* Life-changing Calm Masterclasses taught by world-renowned experts
* Breathing exercises to help you relax
* Exclusive music engineered to help you focus, relax or sleep
* Unguided timed meditation
* Open-ended meditation
* 30+ soothing nature sounds and scenes to use during meditation, yoga or to help you sleep

Track your progress with:

* Daily streaks
* Time spent meditating

Calm is loved by the press:

* ‚ÄúI‚Äôm generally wary of meditation apps because they sometimes weave in too much mystic talk for my taste. But Calm instead contains guidance like ‚ÄòConcentrate on your body‚Äô‚Äù - New York Times

* ‚ÄúIn the frenetic, crazy, digital world we live in, sometimes it's necessary to take a step back and smell the roses‚Äù - Mashable

* ‚ÄúEliminating distraction...ended up helping me relax and realize that all the stuff I was stressing about wasn't that big a deal‚Äù - Tech Republic

* ‚ÄúFound myself similarly refreshed afterwards‚Äù - TechCrunch

Calm is free to download and use, and there are no ads. A subset of the programs and features are free forever.

Some content is only available through an optional paid subscription. If you choose to subscribe, payment will be charged to your Google Account at confirmation of purchase.

recentChanges: Thanks for using Calm! This update contains multiple bug fixes and performance improvements. As always, you can expect an original Daily Calm every day, new music and Sleep Stories every week, and new Meditation programs every month.
comments: I have used this app for over 4 years! I had the free version for a year and a half and loved it but wanted a little more. I use the paid version now. It doesn't cost anymore than any streaming service, actually cheaper than my Netflix and even Hulu. I'd give up both for this app if I had to. Helps with my sleep , my kid's sleep and our mental growth. I highly recommend using this!

Stopped before I even started. This app expects you not only to have to sign in and create an account straight away, but the "free" trial also requires you to sign up with an active credit card before you even get to experience anything. I personally hate this way of working and tend to turn away from all apps that insist on this model. Installed and deleted within ten minutes.

11th month update: Now I am trying to delete my subscription it is sooooo difficult. Unbelievable. I would never recommend this app. They have hidden the subscription change, created many bugs like your browser does not support... I am trying to unsubscribe using the app itself, but surprisingly it is not working because of java or smtng. Why you would need java to unsubscribe. You are trying to rob the users. Making it difficult so that they will give up, and you will continue making money

I tried the 7 days free trial and i found the meditation offered quite poor. Mostly too short and way too much talking, and not even in a soft spoken tone. I couldn't play any of its music in the background. Maybe my fault, but ok, since a lot of the music on offer is pop commercial singer stuff. I also didn't like the 'well done, set a reminder' type of approach. A meditation app should provide escape from the manic, 'like' addictive type of world, not mimic it. Disappointed

This app changed my life. It really helped me became a calmer person and have clarity. My mind is much more peaceful and have significantly less troubling and negative thoughts, even when I do have them sometimes, I'm able to distinguish them as just thoughts and not my reality. This is a really helpful app and I'm so thankful to the creators and all those who worked hard to get it working as good as it is.

title: Serenity: Guided Mental Health
description:
Serenity is a mental health chatbot that provides you with expert, confidential, and judgment-free mental health counseling and support, anytime, anywhere.
 
Serenity can help a wide range of issues including anxiety, depression, low esteem, sleep problems, and relationship conflict to name a few, using the latest research in the fields of cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT), mindfulness, and positive psychology.
 
1. Serenity helps you become conscious of the connection between your thoughts, feelings, and actions and how this connection may be preventing you from achieving good mental well-being.
 
2. Serenity helps you track changes in your mood over time as you complete regular check-ins, and helps you identify and address issues early on before they become a serious problem.
 
3. Serenity creates action plans of science-based, hands-on, and practical techniques that help you challenge negative thinking patterns and turn unhealthy coping behaviors into productive ones that improve the quality of your life.

Serenity is your companion to share your troubles--and celebrate your triumphs! Working alongside you to help you become more conscious of the connection between your thoughts, your feelings, and your actions and how this connection may be preventing you from achieving good mental well-being and improving the quality of your life.
 

Ready to gain expert insight and take action to transform your mental health? Download Serenity today and say "Hi"!


Disclaimer:
Serenity is a tool and is not a replacement for a physician, loved ones, or a crisis line.
Please seek a doctor‚Äôs advice in addition to using this app and before making any medical decisions.

comments: You know this is a really cool thing because while it doesn't substitute for going to therapy, if you have an issue that a robot can help you with this is pretty good and it helps you do different exercises and you know makes you think things through before you know coming to any conclusion so I do like this I wish it would check up on me more cuz it doesn't do that
Not very happy with the bots ability to recognize a few things. Nice layout etc. Just feels so scripted. Not therapeutic because of that. Thank you for the effort though.
I wish you would at least fix it so that your coping tool videos would play like they should instead of stopping and not working. Because they don't always work right.

Well this is an impromptu review. With todays pandemic, lockdown craziness and forced isolation.. Everyone is anxious and depressed. This cool app, sits you down and listens! Everyone should keep a diary anyway..who does? This app bends you into positivity and urges you on.
I've signed up but I cant get past putting in my birthday and it keeps saying its invalid

title: Hero Factory - Idle Factory Manager Tycoon
description:
***New feature : Boss Raid Updates!

Dive into the epic world of Hero Factory and unstop the massive hero production from your own factories to challenge powerful bosses.

Dispatch your heroes from the factories to hunt epic enemies down and earn plenty of golds to become a rich enough to expand your hero production lines. 

Various kinds of epic weapons and helmets! Collect unique items and discover new epic gear combinations to define your own hero style.

Merge an enchant stone and make your items more epic and powerful for the heroes

Collect golds from the monsters and upgrade the hero factories for stronger heroes.

Customize your heroes with epic skins and merge them into a united team. 

Hero Factory is an easy-to-play idle tycoon RPG where you can experience incomparable pleasure by managing your heroes and factories to stand against the enemies. Upgrade your heroes and factories with enchant stones and golds to create stronger army and send them to the battlefield for more epic rewards.

Download for free today and begin to make your own heroes and factories!

Swashbuckler, Hunting Queen, Dagger, Witch, Axe King, Gunslinger and more heroes

Go on vacations countless times to increase your heroes‚Äô stats and the factory production

* Exciting Adventure

comments: I find it over all a very enjoyable game and would put 5 stars if not for one really big issue. The ads many time over it has (without asking) download whatever its advertising. It will do it when I dont press anything or when I'm hitting the x button! I've had the weather app 6 times and solitaire 4 times and a few others. I've undownload them all but makes it very tempting to also undownload this game with it sometimes. But I dont want to. Its fun reaching level 365 and playing a great game.

Updates are almost non existent...they haven't added new end game content in over 6 months. They also changed the boost system (watch an ad on demand for a 30m boost to gold and power) to a garbage rng p2w gear system. In doing so, they screwed over the player base that bought the ad-free pack, because the 30m boosts were the main use for the ad-free purchase. The graphics are great, but that's the only good thing I have to say overall.

I was enjoying the game for the first 24hr but now it will not go past 91%. I have to Uninstall it and start over to get it working again. I did that 3 times now and sick of starting over. Please fix!!! I do believe it has something to do with the Google play games log in for that normally displays around 91%.

2.3.3 nerfed high level medal farming into oblivion (96% nerf). 2.4.9 backed it off to a more reasonable 30% nerf. 2.5.2 added in a new raid and new raid gear, and if you get the new medal acquisition set you can now actually farm medals faster than before the first nerf. So if you were holding off on updating to farm medals, no need to do so anymore. Bug: My daily reset seems to randomly creep to later hours of the day when the app crashes sometimes, but that was a problem before the update.

Well can't find a way to contact support so I'm doing it here. Game is fun I keep playing it constantly when I'm not playing my computer. Anyway there's an issue with Bomb Girl on the super legendary bomb to spawn a larger version of herself for more damage. She spawns and dies instantly. Very annoying to waste all those tokens on.

comments: Everything's great about this game, I wanted a hack and slash rpg, I got exactly that and more. However considering all the functions of the game I dont get why it needs an active internet connection to play. Even if it does it should've been mentioned on google play just like many other games.

It is an enjoyable game nice graphics and physics.my only thing would be to make the dpad floating and so can uused by either hand as I have no use of my left it would make it. Easier if all controls could be used by the right.
Love the game so far,it better then alot of the game out there, but having so difficulties with the store right now it not letting me use my gold or gems. Hopefully it will be big free soon.
Needs more character customization other than costumes. Graphics look like a PS2 game. Aspect ratio is messed up on my device with no option to adjust. Creature design is pretty good

2 star for now, world chat needs to be change, players need to talk not only through whispers.. Changing channels is inconvenience, feeling alone and starting to get bored.. Need to invite guild member through world chat..

title: COVID Coach
description:
The world as we know it has changed and we are living in unprecedented and uncertain times. COVID Coach is designed to help you build resilience, manage stress, and increase your well-being during this crisis. The app is free, secure, and helps connect you to important resources for coping and adapting during the COVID-19 pandemic. Customized tools are available to help you cope with stress, stay well, stay safe, stay healthy, stay connected, and navigate parenting, care-giving, and working from home while social distancing, quarantined, or sheltered in place. You can track your mood, visualize your progress, and find resources to seek additional help and support. No account or password is required and user data is not collected.

COVID Coach was made by the mobile mental health team of the National Center for PTSD, Dissemination & Training Division.

summary: Cope with stress & stay well
recentChanges:
* New Learn topics and resources for health care workers
* Some iOS 14 and under-the-hood tweaks
* That's it. That's the update.
comments: Great app. Lots of information to learn about your mental health.

I was excited for this app. Unfortunately this app REQUIRES access to your phone. After downloading, a prompt will say: "Allow Covid Coach to access photos, media, and files on your device?" As soon as I tap on "deny" the app automatically closes and locks me out of the service. How is this supposed to be helping me? You don't need access to my phone. I'm disappointed.
It is similar to other self help. Easy to use. Makes one think. Asks one questions. Offers advice. Keeps tracks of goals. It all come down to how much energy and honesty one puts into it.
Lots of resources. I love that you can save your favorites for easy access. The in app exercises are a life savers for when anxiety takes over
Well designed and useful. Made for vets with PTSD but can work for anybody with stress, anxiety, or depression. Well designed and thought out.

title: Mobile Strike
description:
Become an action hero like Arnold Schwarzenegger in the new game of modern war - ¬†Mobile Strike! Build a base, control the action, and test your elite troops against enemies on the battlefield! With cutting-edge assault vehicles in your arsenal this worldwide MMO game tests your ability to wage a tactical and intelligent war. 

It's not whose arsenal is bigger, it's whose arsenal is best! Design a customized base to reflect the kind of hero you want to be. Amass defenses to protect your base, or manufacture an arsenal unrivaled on the battlefield! In true MMO fashion you can join an alliance and bring to bear the benefits of a multilateral force as you dominate the action and become the Head of State in an entirely new kind of action game!

‚úîJoin with millions of players from around the world
‚úî Forge powerful alliances with elite players against formidable enemies
‚úî Build and customize your base
‚úî Engage with rogue war machines on the battlefield to collect items and experience
‚úîTrain, level up and supply your commander with superior firepower
‚úîUse modern combat vehicles, artillery, and strategic units
‚úîCommand 4 military tiers consisting of 16 troop types

Check out the elite new MMO Mobile Strike, a war game to end all war games!

Just got the game today and already seems to be a lag in the game. Not sure whats going on, internet is working its just the tutorial part of it.

title: MORTAL KOMBAT: The Ultimate Fighting Game!
description:
Experience the over-the-top, visceral fighting action of MORTAL KOMBAT! Bring the power of next-gen gaming to your mobile and tablet device with this visually stunning fighting and card collection game. Assemble an elite team of Mortal Kombat warriors and prove yourself in the greatest fighting tournament on Earth!

MK11 CHARACTERS
The MK11 team is extremely versatile, packed with unique abilities and powerful team synergies to inflict pain onto your enemies. The MK11 collection includes MK11 Raiden, Scorpion, Jade, Sub-Zero, Kabal, and Skarlet, and they are just as deadly as their console counterparts! They even perform the same Fatal Blow!

FIGHT IN BRUTAL 3v3 COMBAT
Create your own team of Mortal Kombat fighters and lead them into battle to earn experience, new special attacks, and powerful artifacts. Team up warriors with unique synergies to get an advantage over your enemies such as Team Ronin, Team Nightmare, and Team Day of the Dead!

CCG - BUILD A MASSIVE ROSTER
This game is the ultimate CCG! Collect over 130 Mortal Kombat characters including veterans like Scorpion, Johnny Cage, Sub-Zero, Cassie Cage, Ermac, and many others. Discover new additions to Mortal Kombat Mobile like the bloodthirsty Vampiress Mileena, soccer champion Kombat Cup Sonya Blade, mysterious Klassic Reptile, and warrior princess Ronin Kitana.

COMPLETE DIFFICULT CHALLENGES
Prove yourself in the best fighting game ever made, and complete a series of matches to bring new Mortal Kombat warriors to your roster! A new challenge begins every week!

MULTIPLAYER FACTION WARS

Experience the over-the-top, visceral fighting action of MORTAL KOMBAT! comments: I love mortal kombat. I have been using this game for a while. I've reached level 47 and I've got a real bone to pick with the dev's. I have bought hundreds of character packs promising diamond characters, but have only recieved one diamond character. And no joke, I've accumulated over 100 characters, only one diamond(mk11 kabal). Come on guys, I'm ready to call it quits because of this. Please increase the chance to get more diamond characters or you'll lose my business. Thanks...

One of my best games ever! But it often asks data connection, even when my device has perfect data connection. Please solve this issue to play nicely, as this thing upsets me more. Even after the recent updates, it still asks for a network connection. It wastes my time a lot more than the time I play it. This is annoying!!! And, to play it, I had to retry several times atleast for half an hour, even when I had perfect network connection!!!üò¢ This is why I gave 4 stars! Or else, it's of 5 stars!!

It's not an overly in depth game... That being said, I enjoy it especially with the new auto functionality. To me it's no different than playing any card type game except this is a little more interactive . You still get to build your characters , you still get to watch Cool fight scenes. I really don't have any major complaints. This is a game that has been adapted for phone play. You can't expect a whole lot. But what you get is pretty cool.

its a great game. and the quests for souls are a good way to save up for gold and diamond packs.....is a bit of a slough though. It also might just be me, but I thought in earlier versions of the game, the faction wars tier rewards for Ruby points (or whatever they're called) was a bit higher? Not sure. Otherwise. Great game.

I like the new feature of being able to select my teams and save them is great so that way I don't have to change character after character to get a new team. Some reason now I can't even load certain teams without it unequipping the equipment cards and now I have to go back and reorganize and re-equip the cards back to characters. I would like to keep the freedom to put equipment cards for the characters I want. Its like one good idea, then you take a step backward with another bad idea.

title: Panic Buddy - End panic attacks
description:
Panic attacks are extremely distressing and often lead to significant impairment. If you suffer from panic attack, this app can provide some much needed relief. This app was conceptualized and built by a mental health professional.

We will help you 

1)Understand panic attacks.
2)Identify the physical and mental symptoms of panic attacks.
3)Identify your panic cycle.
3)Learn relaxation techniques - A breath trainer with voice prompts and a guided mindfulness exercise to help you stay grounded.
4)Journal your progress.
5)Quotes relating to anxiety appear on the home screen to help you stay motivated.

We take you through a step by step process to beat panic attacks via 6 sections.

In section one - We read about what panic attacks are and what our options are.

In section two - We introduce the physical symptoms of panic. There is a checklist you can fill here.

In section three - We talk about thoughts, cognitive distortions and safety behaviors. There is another checklist to fill here.

In the fourth section, we introduce the panic cycle with an example, you may enter your own panic cycle here.

In the next section, we introduce two very powerful relaxation techniques.

1)The breath trainer, which guides you with visuals and voice to take calm breaths. Relaxed breathing in one of the most effective means of terminating panic attacks.

2)A short, mindfulness-based grounding exercise that can quickly terminate panic attacks.

These will be our weapons against panic.

In section six we introduce our plan, with short instructions in regard to what to do before, during and after a panic attack. Putting all this together will help you effectively gain some relief from panic attacks.

The panic button will take you directly to the relaxation exercises. We also have a panic diary built-in. It will help you identify and review triggers, physical symptoms and coping strategies.


The panic button, accessible as soon as the app opens and on the home screen will serve as first aid for a panic attack, this is meant to provide you with instant panic attack relief. This app will remain free forever. This is the first release and we hope to improve it and add further features with your assistance.


We hope you beat your panic attacks. All the very best.

Update - You can now share your panic diary entry with a friend or therapist.

comments: Very good app. It is an all in one solution but I just wish there was a way to view older entries within the plan and panic cycle sections of the app so users can see older entries in order to see a pattern of their triggers/compulsions.

Couldnt use the app. It wouldnt go past the disclaimer. I uninstalled n reinstalled it n still cant go past the disclaimer. There was no scrolling down to read it and no accept option. Just a frozen screen.
Locked up on disclaimer. Couldn't get it to do anything. Had to uninstall.
God bless them. Its very helpful and add Free

title: Gods of Boom - Online PvP Action
description:
‚Ä¢ Easy and intuitive controls: get a hang of the game from the get-go and start climbing up the ranks!
‚Ä¢ Vivid graphics and support for older devices: stunning visuals will keep you glued to the screen, while the hardware requirements remain very moderate.
‚Ä¢ Engaging PvP battles: enjoy team-based fun across numerous maps and game modes. The adrenaline-filled action never stops in GoB!
‚Ä¢ Character customization: create a unique hero by using a combination of various perks and equipment skills, and find the perfect look with hundreds of cosmetic items. Creating a flexible build for your play style is as easy as ever.
‚Ä¢ Regular updates and events: with constant content additions, new features, and colorful themed events, you‚Äôll never be bored. This game just keeps on giving!
‚Ä¢ Pro Play Mode: eSports events with players from globally acclaimed teams. Can a mobile FPS be truly competitive? You bet!

Gods of Boom is a competitive multiplayer FPS with awesome 3D graphics and gripping gameplay. It‚Äôs so simple that your cat could learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to spark the interest of competitive eSports players who‚Äôre used to extremely challenging and clutch tournament-style battles. Engage in online PvP battles on a variety of maps, utilizing different cunning tactics. Get the ultimate FPS experience with fast-paced matches that take less than 5 minutes on average. The game is on!

comments: Way too many updates in too short of time. And unnecessary changes to try and make the game harder. For example, you used to be able to pick up an enemies gun by just being close to it, now you have to be on top of a weapon just to pick it up and they made throwing a knife harder, used to get 10 knife kill per match! It's a decent game! My 1st 2 to 3 years of playing this game i had it rated @ 5 ‚≠ê's but now that they made these unnecessary changes, I dropped it down to 4‚≠ê

Fun to play against people who might be better or as good as me, very competitive but fun. I enjoy seeing new items in the seasons shop comes out because of the accessories and weapons. Its a vs game as we know however I like to play to win most of the time. The controls are simple and over time its gets better because of playing so much. #funtoplay

I've been playing this game for years. Word of advice - Don't buy ANYTHING! I was ripped off for $27.99, and $13.99. I didn't get what I paid for, and Customer Service is ignoring me. I had no problem spending money on this game before. It's harder earning money during COVID, and I decided to spend some here only to be completely ripped off. Don't download. Play Call of Duty instead.

TURN FOR THE WORSE. I've been down since day one, when it used to be fun. I get there's going to b updates and programmers will attempt to satisfy everyone's needs and desires, but as I look thru the comments it seems that most players arent happy with the gameplay. Matchmaking takes forever. Upgrades on guns are difficult to come by. The extra perks for each level of fighting is difficult to understand. It was better when it was just all guns straight up and that was it.

I notice a bunch of people call this game pay to win. It really isn't, they're all just bad. I'm pretty high up there in levels and haven't spent a dime. The game actually feels quite easy. Controls and gameplay are alright, the graphics aren't that bad for mobile, and the items are that busted. All around, it's a solid FPS pick on mobile.

title: Turbo Dismount‚Ñ¢
description:
The legendary crash simulator is now on Google Play!

Perform death-defying motor stunts, crash into walls, create traffic pile-ups of epic scale - and share the fun!

Turbo Dismount‚Ñ¢ is a kinetic tragedy about Mr. Dismount and the cars who love him. It is the official sequel to the wildly popular and immensely successful personal impact simulator - Stair Dismount‚Ñ¢. 

FEATURES:
* Flinch-inducing crash physics
* Crunchy sound effects
* Delicious slow-mo replay system
* Multiple vehicles: cars, trucks, construction vehicles, a skateboard...
* Multiple levels, obstacle types and characters
* Tweak levels to your liking!
* Customize your character and the vehicles with your own photos!
* Game controller support!
* Leaderboards and achievements
* Smooth full resolution 4x MSAA visuals on SHIELD Tablet

Turbo Dismount is the most convincing vehicular personal impact simulation seen on Android!

Follow Mr. Dismount on facebook.com/MrDismount
Follow Secret Exit on Twitter: twitter.com/secretexit

Dismounting (turbocharged or regular) is not to be attempted at home or outside, and should be left to trained professionals. Secret Exit does not recommend or condone dismount attempts outside 3D computer simulations.

comments: I love this game! I like the crushes! Everybody and body part of our shelf! We can change any vehicle we want! Can change our shelf! We want to! It's FUN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

This game is very awesome, there is a slow motion feature, maps, millions of cars to destroy, and more, you can even get a fighter jet, almost like a F-22 Raptor, with cool cities in the background as well, but even better,you can preform dangerous stunts, its really cool.

Very fun, has a bunch of levels, cars, and hats my favorite car is the bumper car and magnum. recommend you get this if you want to see destruction. Edit: And I would want to see another update. Have not seen one for a while, if you are making another game I will definitely play it.

Love this game absolutely amazing. I found out about this game from a lot youtubers and honestly that made me want to play it so I decided to play it and it was great. Graphics are amazing, I love how you can turn the replay into slow motion and everything else! 11 out of 10 perfect.üòÅ‚ù§ü§Ø
Crash! Bang! Crunch! I love the sound effects! I watched Jacksepticeye play this, and while this is more limited, it's still very much the game he played. So nice to see it on mobile!

title: Zombie Forest: Apocalypse Survival
description:
You find salvation in a house on a tree in the thick of a forest lousy with living deads who are not averse to treat themselves to fresh brains.
As you progress through the game other survivors join you, you can improve your weapons, create new buildings, barriers, traps, exchange resources with your neighbors, send brigades to raids to look for survivors as well as resources and weapons. But not everything in the garden is rosy - you have to combat hunger and thirst, lack of resources and bullets, see your partners die and miss and the number of zombies is increasing all the time... How long will it last out? Is death inevitable!?
descriptionHTML:
You find salvation in a house on a tree in the thick of a forest lousy with living deads who are not averse to treat themselves to fresh brains.

summary: Zombie Forest is a strategy game of survival in a zombie apocalypse.
comments: Amazing game but a problem when you run out of zombie places to raid you have to wait or buy to get a refill I think you shouldn't have to wait or buy
Good gameplay. Only problems are that sometimes I will get an upgrade and nothing will happen. Another problem is that spikes and saws never placed. I bought them and then nothing happened.

It gets difficult in the start, but then it gets a little more easier after a few plays. Here's a tip; When some of your people die during raids, you still have their guns with you when you get home. Trade those guns away for bullets. Bullets are the resources you really need, and don't go upgrading your gun until you have enough metal and wood. Always check your guys in the frontlines, because when people come back from raids, their places, with the original men, may change, which could kill ye

While hard at first glance, once you actually get to know the game it is quite easy. The biggest problem I have with the game is that the difficulty doesn't ramp up. Once you get to a certain point you basically can continue forever. But other then that, this game is excellent overall.

It's a fun game and all, but it's too hard to get resources. It's too hard to get through rounds and the game is overall ass. I'm sorry but the game is WAAAAY too difficult. GG fellow gamers, but this is not a really good game.

title: Forge of Empires: Build your city
description:
Forge of Empires - Build a city!

Build an empire & travel through the ages! From ancient civilizations, through medieval kingdoms, and all the way to the future. Rise and rule your lands with pride!

Forge of Empires was originally released in 2012, becoming an award-winning strategy city-building browser game. This RTS MMO sim is live for 9 years now and is full of amazing content with a huge active player base from all over the world!

Features:

- Build your city, rule your empire and experience history! All while travelling through the eras of mankind.

 - Evolve your village into a town and then forge it into a megapolis!

- Be smart and efficient in building houses & producing resources. Make the best of your land!

- Find your own building style! Choose from hundreds of different houses and castles!

- Like to compete? Win tactical pvp battles in the multiplayer mode and conquer their realms!

- Not in a mood to fight? Exchange your goods and trade with your neighbors!

- Discover new territories & develop new technologies!

- Enjoy real life events (Christmas, Easter, Halloween and many more) and win amazing rewards and prizes!

Forge of Empires is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-¬≠app purchases in your device's settings. A network connection is also required.

General Terms and Conditions: https://legal.innogames.com/portal/en/agb
Imprint:	https://legal.innogames.com/portal/us/imprint

comments: You'll hear this a lot. Game is a marathon, not a sprint. If you are ready to spend time to build your own little city you can do it without any diamonds, premium currency. Community is really helpful and good guild can make all the difference for one to stick with the game. It can be played on both mobile and browser, which is great because as city grows more time is needed to get it to run optimally.

Unbalanced game play, players with much a bought stronger army can attack and plunder your items, super slow game play unless you're a pay player, I've been stuck for sometimes a week or more trying gain or trade for items to advance research, like I stated before if you throw real money at the game you can buy your way to the top a thousand times faster.

Great game! If you're looking to "beat" a game, this isn't it. It's a slow roll, even slower if you don't purchase diamonds. The game play is good, and even at a slow pace, I'm entertained. I do have a suggestion though.. I'd like to be able to sell my buildings to other users, especially in my guild. If I could get forge points, goods, etc instead of auction $, the game would be even more interesting.

Great game. However, a couple of suggestions 1. Please add a currently online/offline feature for players to see. Doesnt have to be seen by everyone, maybe just by friends and guild mates. 2. Please add in a last online feature for friends and guild mates to see. It is very hard to manage friends and guild list when you have no idea who are active and inactive players. 3. I find this game compared to most hardly gives out the in game currency(diamonds). Maybe try handing slightly more to players

The game is so bugged I can't even start playing it right, but also I have it's a pay to play game . I've put my 10$ in this game to see if it's worth it, but honestly didn't even reach the point where I use them cause game won't load event or story and so on.... In short- no.

title: How to Loot - Pin Pull & Hero Rescue
description:
Play How to Loot and you will have to solve brain-damage puzzles to pull the pin, help knights destroy monsters, rescue the princess and find treasure.

üíÉThe beauty and countless treasures are waiting for you to pick up. Let‚Äôs play now!

In this pin lock game, you need to go through tough challenges like: pull pin to save man, pull the pin to pick up treasure, rescue the princess. So you'll have to use IQ, all of your wits, to logically pull the pin.

When you pull the pin to save man in a pin lock game, pick up the treasure, there will be scary monsters lurking around, you have to be careful, calculate carefully before pulling the pin to avoid the ugly monsters.

HOW TO PLAY?
üîÆUse your mindset to pull the pin to destroy the monster then come next to the princess and treasure.
üîÆ When you pull the pin to save man, pick up the treasure you have to be careful and use your mindset to draw the correct order of the pins, if you pull out the wrong order of the pins you may lose miserably, do not be subjective.
üîÆ Hold the kingdom's treasure and become the richest and most generous knight

recentChanges:
Happy Halloween!

comments: UPDATE2: As of 10/23/20 the game still won't load while online. It crashes at startup. Not fun. I even tried reinstalling. Didn't fix it. *** Great game - a little easy for about the first 100 levels, but nice light brain exercise. If I was to change anything I would suggest that it be possible to go back and play old levels. Right now once you've conquered a level you can't go back and play it again, which means this game is virtually offline between updates.

Way too easy. And way, way too many ads. I had to play on airplane mode so i wouldn't get an ad after EVERY level. I understand that the developers need money to pay their employees but an ad every 10-15 seconds is ridiculous. Before I turned on airplane mode I was spending more time watching ads than playing the game.

10/19-The game itself isn't bad. Need to make the screen to when you scroll down it stays there until you scroll back up Especially in Gold Mode. Every time I scroll down it goes up while I'm creating a path. Its cost me several retries. And cut down on the ads. After every single level or retry is ridiculous....Or lower the adless version to 1.99. 10/20-Obviously you dont read the reviews, 'cause if you did you would see, that I made suggestions here!

Unlike a lot of games there advertising out there this really is a puzzle game and it's very cute. so far I don't find it very challenging but it is a lot of fun. I'm hoping it gets more challenging as we go along there are several different puzzle games included in this and I find it as well worth downloading there are a lot of ads but you can deal with that

There are a lot of games that are exactly the same, so 0 points for originality, graphics are the bare minimum, kinda cutesy style. The most aggravating part is that the game is ridiculously easy, I'm on level 20 something and a toddler could solve these, plus you can't skip levels without watching ads. Obvious cash grab is obvious

title: EMERGENCY HQ - free rescue strategy game
description:
The new game in the EMERGENCY series - download the rescue simulator EMERGENCY HQ now!

EMERGENCY HQ is a rescue simulation game. Take control of emergency units, including fire and ambulance, police, SWAT and technical services. Head up operations of rescues, crimes, medical and catastrophe management, dispatch and command vehicles and personnel.
Control firefighters, EMTs, paramedics, doctors, police officers and special forces to fight fires, rescue animals, save lives, fight terrorists and much more. Build up your base and put together the perfect emergency services team! Upgrade your fire trucks, hospital, other buildings and units, expand your headquarters. Use the Fire Department, Rescue Service, Police Department, and Technical Units to master the many exciting and challenging missions!

Join forces in a rescue alliance and support friends in challenging missions. 

Do you have what it takes to be a hero? Fight The Chaos! Play the top firefighter game now!

EMERGENCY HQ - the fire fighter and rescue simulator game - is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don‚Äôt want to use these features, please disable in-app purchases in your device settings.
