comments: I've played this game before, and I love it. But now that I've reinstalled it, it isn't loading. Every time it gets to, let's say, 93%, it crashes and takes me back to my phone's home screen. Then I have to restart the game only to see it crash again. I'm going to give it 4 stars once this bug is fixed, but until then it's going to be 2 stars. I love this game, but please fix all the bugs.

The main qualm i have with this game is how expensive all of the buildings are. I played this game for the longest time and stopped. Now I remember why. Buildings are way too expensive and im having to use gems to skip missions that I cant do becuase I dont have the right units. It's either a time consuming grind or spending real money.

Been playing for a few days and i am really enjoying this game, it seems to be more than fair so its not forcing me into making payments i dont want to make ect, there NO forced ads which is amazing too say. The gameplay is smooth and fun. The missions are repeated sometimes but hey, more money, xp and the 3rd time round its all 3x. Its nice to see a committed and fair developer. Thank You üëåüëçüíô

There is no new exciting things and the game is become boring for me. Earning of coins is low and vehicle call cost is high and upgrade charges are too high. Connecting issue even i am connected to a high speed wifi. Every day 3 to 4 missions i have to skip by using 5 emerald because my base is not enough to complete those missions then why it is showing to me. Earning of emerald is too low per day according to its experience. No new events.

I actually like this game but, from 4 star, I made it 2 star. Since you didnt do anything abt this "CONNECTION ERROR" problem sht. In this game, "BUILDINGS ARE EXPENSIVE". So everytime that connection problem appear, I lost the money i spent for the units. FIX IT THIS TIME. PLEASE... I think every player has the same problem. Atleast return the money back.

title: RAID: Shadow Legends
description:
Battle your way through a visually-stunning realistic fantasy RPG with hundreds of Champions from 13 playable factions.
 
To save the world of Teleria, you will recruit its most legendary warriors from the forces of Light and Darkness. You must train them to fight together, mold them into living weapons, and assemble the greatest raiding party ever seen.
 
Download now to join the fight!
 
 ‚ãáFEATURES‚ãá
 
COLLECT POWERFUL CHAMPIONS
Collect hundreds of warriors from 13 factions. Assemble balanced teams of Sorcerers, Skinwalkers, Undead, Knights, Elves, and more to defeat your enemies - then recruit them to your side!
 
FIGHT EPIC BOSS BATTLES
Vanquish dozens of challenging bosses for loot, XP, and special Champion drops! Then go beat them again for more powerful gear.
 
PVP ARENA
Go head-to-head with other players to unlock special gear and climb the rankings in intense arena battles. Two teams go in ‚Äì only one comes out.
 
VISCERAL 3D ARTWORK
Beautiful, fully-rendered 3D heroes offer stunning detail down to the cracks in their armor. Watch them battle through vivid environments with thousands of unique skill and attack animations.
 
DEVELOP AND MANAGE YOUR BASTION
Upgrade your own personal fortress to manage your Shards, train your Champions, and prepare them for arena battles, dungeon runs, and story campaigns.
 
DEEP STRATEGIC PLAY
Make tough decisions and equip your champions with powerful artifacts to aid them in their quest. Rank them up to unleash devastating special skills, AOE attacks, healing powers and more as you lead them in combat.
 
MASSIVE PVE CAMPAIGN MAP
Experience epic dark fantasy done right through 12 spectacular locations spread over a sprawling, fully-voiced story campaign. 
 
HASSLE-FREE AUTOPLAY
Autoplay levels to spend less time grinding and more time exploring Teleria.
 
PLEASE NOTE:
 
‚Ä¢ Items are available for purchase in this game. Some paid items may not be refundable depending on the type of item. 
RAID: Shadow Legends is available in English, Russian, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Ukrainian, Chinese Traditional, Chinese Simplified, Korean, Turkish, Japanese, and Portuguese.
 
Official Website: https://plarium.com/
Support: raid.support@plarium.com
Community: https://plarium.com/forum/en/raid-shadow-legends/
Privacy Policy: http://plarium.com/#/doc/policy/ 
Terms of Use: http://plarium.com/#/doc/terms/

recentChanges:
New in version 2.30.0:

FEATURES:
- New Faction Wars completion reward. Earn 3 Stars on every Stage to get Lydia the Deathsiren. Not available from Shards.
- New Avatars available at the Bazaar.

CHANGES, FIXES, IMPROVEMENTS:
- Mercy System is live. See Info panel at the Portal.
- Added FAQ.
- Classic Arena Rewards must now be collected from Tiers tab after refresh.
- Fixed Tag Team Arena progress bar.
- Giant Slayer or Warmaster Masteries will no longer trigger effects based on target's death.
comments: While the only thing you do in this game is level up characters, it is surprisingly complex. I've played mostly for free(I bought some legendary tomes, they are hard to get). The game is very stingy in what it grants you. You have to be patient, unless you spend money. I've been at it for about six months. He'll hades has some excellent strategy guides on yuotube.

Been playing the game for over a year now, and I had to drop the ratings. I love and enjoy the characters, great designs. Also, the game play is awesome. I don't like how the better characters are coded in a way to where you cannot obtain them if you don't spend money on shards. You need a ton of shards to get them; afterwords, you need more money for gems, enegery for leveling, also making your characters stronger. The tournaments are fun to a point.

It's okay. The campaign gets a bit repetitive where you end up kinda just watching your characters walk down hallways as you tap here or there to attack or buff. That's my only real complaint, the graphics and design is lovely. The various in-game purchase ads are a bit annoying since you'll sometimes have to X out of 5+ windows of them, but I get it. If this is your type of game, you'll most likely enjoy it.

Fun, in depth game play with lots to do. Awesome job on that. The only issue i see is the constant pop ups. Advertising promotional deals is great. However, you take it too far. It's more than just "from time to time". It's ALL the time. Calm down a bit on the advertising and people will calm down a bit on complaining about it.

2 stars for good graphics but that's all that's good. If you have an issue and report it in the "Game bug" forums thread, all they do is ask for screen shots, well the problem with that, mobile phone or Android versions there's no option to add screen shots. I have mentioned this in forum threads and emailed you a s s holes time and time again. What's the point of support? Everyone should record all battles Then replay them in slow motion.. you'll find that you've been screwed since the start.

title: Forest: Stay focused
description:
‚òÖ Google Play 2015-2016 Best App of the Year
‚òÖ 2018 Google Play Editors‚Äô Choice Top Productivity App
‚òÖ Google Play 2018 Best Social Impact App Nomination
‚òÖ 2018 Google Play Best Self-improvement app in Canada, Mexico, France, Russia, Brazil, Japan, Korea, India, and Thailand!

Can't stop scrolling? Keep off your phone with the cutest focus timer, and unleash your productivity along with 4 million satisfied paying users.

üåüWelcome to Forest, the place where procrastination does not exist!üåü

Staying focused has never been harder in this world of digital distractions. From phone calls to text messages, your attention is constantly being diverted. 

Plant a tree when you need to stay focused. If you commit to your task without getting distracted, your tree grows; if you cannot resist the temptation to use your phone, your tree dies. Over time, you will have an entire forest built from your focus and commitment. 

Free yourself from obsessive scrolling and achieve your goals!

GET MOTIVATEDüí™
‚Ä¢ Break phone addiction and form productive habits.
‚Ä¢ Earn rewards by staying focused and unlock adorable trees!
‚Ä¢ Grow your very own forest with each tree representing your efforts.
‚Ä¢ View your daily/weekly/monthly/yearly progress and learn about your own focus habits.
‚Ä¢ Concentrate on a daily routine and manage ADHD.

FOCUS LIKE A PRO ‚úçÔ∏è 
Activate Pro version and access more exciting features that will help you concentrate and procrastinate no more:

‚Ä¢ Plant real trees on Earth with our partner, Trees for the Future - We've planted over 800,000 real trees so far!üå≤
‚Ä¢ Set up a customized whitelist - 
leaving Forest and using apps added to the whitelist will not kill your tree.
‚Ä¢ Categorize your tasks with tags and see how you allocated your time.
‚Ä¢ Track your phone usage and screen time.
‚Ä¢ Compete with users around the world.
‚Ä¢ Plant with friends - If one of you fail to stay focused, you'll all get a dead tree!

Plant a tree and start building life-changing habits with Forest!

NOTICE
‚Ä¢ Forest is available for Android mobile and tablet devices, and can be accessed across all Android devices with Pro version. To download the non-Android version of Forest requires a separate purchase. However, by logging into the same account, your data can be synchronized across all platforms.
‚Ä¢ Due to budget constraint, the number of real trees each user can plant is limited to five. 

Permissions Explained: https://www.forestapp.cc/permissions/en/

CONNECT WITH US
Follow us on Instagram: @forest_app
Follow us on Twitter: @forestapp_cc

We also have a chrome extension. Find out more at www.forestapp.cc!

comments: I've been using this app for 2 years and almost unlocking all the trees. It was very helpful. After the new updates, it lost me as a user. Since I don't have "pro version" all the tress I had unlocked were refund and I lost all of them. The only ones I have are the free version trees. I am very upset and disappointed in changes. Not longer does this app care for their users, they only care about profits.

It's a great app as always. BUT for those who wanna update it to the latest version, DON'T DO IT. The latest system don't allow us to buy other species without paying for premium. Unlocking different type of trees is what keep motivating us to focus on the priorities. Without premium, there left only few typical trees in the store. As a student who's still financially independent like many others, I try not to spend any coins or cash on any apps no matter the price. I wish u can change it back.

Amazing app. Got me to focus during a very difficult time, and has continued to do so ever since. Well worth the cheap price for premium, but completely usable without buying. Brilliant support: Some of my data went missing at one point, and I had a friendly reply and full data restoration within 3 days. Suggestion: Being able to give a single tree multiple labels would be even better.

Simple, cool app. Nice visualization for staying on task for long projects. It's weird that the friends feature is only for premium users. I feel like giving that option to free users would encourage much more people to start using the app, considering how friends get people invested in competitions like this, but aside from that it's worth the download at least. That missing feature is the only immediate reason for giving 4 instead of 5 stars

Someone suggested the app the me and I recently started using it. I LOVE the concept and it's super nice to be able to be motivated to stay focused. However what makes me quite sad is not that I cannot buy different species of trees, it's more that without premium, we can't help to plant real trees... I wish they would allow all user the be able to plan real trees, even if we have to watch an ad for every tree, I think it would be worth it.

comments: My experience with this app has been a very positive one. This is my fall back app to watch movies when cable TV gets stale. I like to escape in an entertaining movie and can usually find that here. Many older and off the wall movies which works perfectly for my taste. Also some newer movies available. The ads are few and placed about every 20 minutes or so with 1 to 3 at a time. Much better than any other service period. Broadcast TV and cable TV should learn from this. Highly recommended !

Tubi is a good app. I had to change to a tablet, and why did I do that. Now I cannot watch anything without that condemned little circle going round and round every 10 secondsü•∂üò¨üò¨ Now I know we already have at least 3 ads going on in between recesses. These are still ok. But that blasted circle really gots*to*go. I don't know how its gonna happen, but its gotta go. If I cannot watch the movies, it makes no sense keeping the App. Same thing happened on a different phone. I'm hoping for the best

I like that I can pause or fast forward. I miss being able to hit the continue watching part because I usually have limited time and then have to start the show over. For example I was in season six of my kitchen rules and for whatever reason the continue watching part was removed and now I have to rewatch episode one or fast forward several seasons to get back to where I was.

I'm surprised by this app. I didn't think I would like it, but, thanks to the new chromecast with Google tv, I'm trying streaming apps I wouldn't have before. The ads aren't too frequent, and they don't last more than 2 minutes total. And the content is pretty diverse -- a nice supplement to the paid subscriptions I have. I just wish 1. The navigation was a bit smoother/more intuitive, and 2. I could exclude certain types of ads (such as political) from my account.

It was a great app I had no trouble. I for some reason the app is not working you should delet it and intall it again. Other wise it is juast google play. It happened to me and I just donlowed it again and it worked. The other time it was every thing in google play that was not working so the app is perfectly fine and great. I am giving it five stars.

title: South Park: Phone Destroyer‚Ñ¢ - Battle Card Game
description:
All those countless hours spent on your phone have been preparing you for this moment.
Fulfill your destiny and become‚Ä¶ THE ULTIMATE PHONE DESTROYER! 
From South Park Digital Studios comes a real-time strategy battle game like nothing you‚Äôve ever experienced before! Take on Cartman, Kenny, Stan and Kyle in all out mobile mayhem!

South Park: Phone DestroyerTM brings you iconic South Park characters, action packed real-time strategy, exploding PvP battles, trademark South Park humor and collectible cards in a perfect mix that‚Äôs spicier than Cartman‚Äôs chili con carne.
Assemble the ultimate team of cowboys, wizards, cyborgs and more and get ready to crush your opponents!

FEATURES
- A whole new South Park experience with never before seen versions of iconic characters like Stan of Many Moons, Cyborg Kenny, Ninjew Kyle, Grand Wizard Cartman‚Ä¶ and many more!
- Beat down opponents in strategic real-time PVP battles. 
- Experience a hilarious single player story written in collaboration with South Park Digital Studios.
- Earn card packs to gain exciting new cards and upgrade materials. 
- Collect and upgrade over 110 unique cards featuring your favorite South Park characters and explosive spells.
- Play weekly events and challenges, each with different themes and crazy rules.
- Join a team and boost your decks by sharing cards with your teammates.
- Take part in weekly Team Wars, strategize with your team and rise to the top of the leaderboard.
- Customize your New Kid to be the baddest looking kid on the block.
- Witness Randy cross-dressing in new and exciting outfits.

contentRatingDescription: Violence, Blood, Partial Nudity, Language, Crude Humor
recentChanges:
The Gnomes have become disillusioned with the society, have realized that underpantsing is for conformist posers, and embraced their deep darkness within, bringing the following updates:

- Goth Kids are arriving to South Park: Phone Destroyer!
- Tutorial improvements!
- Revised in game store!

Update now!
comments: I love it, I got scammed a while back in a raffle but other than that it's a really fun game. It's fun to see that it has been updated and kept alive, it does warm my heart! It's not perfect and it has flaws, such as a lot of micro transactions and all. That wouldn't be a problem if the PVE was just as good as the pvp. It would be amazing if the campaign got some love, I get that it's a farming zone for materials. But it would be really exciting to see some more chapters and more pve content.

Really Good Game I really enjoy playing as you can replay characters to gain more coins if you don't want to spend actual money purchasing coins and notes. This is fun to play since it has maturity of the South Park characters like Kyle, Stan, Kenny, Butters and etc. If you keep struggling you can replay a old level. Enjoy this game since I enjoy watching South Park. Hope to see more things added to this game in the future. Good work.

I've loved this game up until level 12, number 59! It keeps messing up and wont play right. The 1st castle guy wont die or show his health bar. It will just keep going on and on even when I have every card playing. Please fix this. Also I've spent so much money on this game & I thought the updates was supposed to help that. It hasn't! Last thing I'll b@&%h about is the pvp matchup is very unfair. Esp. when I'm not even level 4 & u match me with others who are way higher. I just dont get that!

I give this game five stars because the graphics are great. One thing I really admire about this game is the character selection. They have so many people to collect and upgrade. As some one who really loves South Park it's good to know that they still keep the creativity and negativity, I thank everyone who created the show and this amazing game.

KICK A**! I see all these negative comments, but it looks as though the game has been updated and fixed. And you don't have to spend actual money on this game to have fun, they give you so many options to earn what you need to upgrade your cards, earn money and C points and more. But you guys who complain are the younger generation from me. You don't understand games like I do. Im the keyboard cowboy...ironic name, hu? Lol anyways Creators, just wanna say thnx. But mostly to Matt & Trey.

comments: I love Dragons, so this is very enjoyable for me. Still learning the game only level 86 i think, so still a lot to do to master the game. Update 10/16/2020 I am now over level 110 my dragons are getting stronger and accomplishing more in the gane, it just keeps getting better and better. Definitely worth 5 star rating and if it were possible 10 star. Keep up the great work everyone!!

I'd rate this game 5‚≠ê, but everytime I try to watch an ad (for extra rewards), it keeps saying " No ads available " , then after about 3 minutes of try to get the ad to play, the game crashes, and have to wait another 2 minutes for the game to load again...If this issue gets fixed I'll change my review to 5‚≠ê, but as it currently is, the game is practically unplayable. (Suggestion: if there's no ad available, you could have it auto give the rewards. Rather than having the game constantly crash.)

This is an awesome game with fantastic graphics! The game play is easy to learn and use. I like that the dragons look lifelike versus other games where the dragons look more like a cartoon. I only gave 4 stars because you can't use a dragon's special weapon until a certain criteria has been reached in the game, which I haven't been able to reach yet.

I've been planning this for a couple of months now and I find it fun and easy to play even though I cannot buy anything with cash because Google locked me out of my account. It's super addictive and got some of my friends and family to start playing too. I only need to spend about 20 minutes or so 3 or 4 times a day and I in the top 40% of the server.

Extremely fun BUT... one of the most expensive games if you want to try to support the devs. If things were cheaper I'd actually spend some money, but 25 + a month for auto play and no adds... no one time purchase options. 30+ for battle passes... The high prices forced a bad rating for a great game. I will probably search for another game to support. Dropped to a 1 star, legion chat always disappears leaving you with no idea about who has asked questions or anything. Pathetic devs.

title: Lanota - Dynamic & Challenging Music Game
description:
Play the tunes and follow the rhythm, explore and revive the world. Unlock music of various genres, conquer specially designed boss-stages, and indulge in an artistic picture book!

AWARDS & ACHIEVEMENTS

2016 1st IMGA SEA ‚ÄúExcellence in Audio‚Äù
2017 Taipei Game Show Indie Game Award ‚ÄúBest Audio‚Äù
2017 13th IMGA Global Nominee
2017 Indie Prize Award in Casual Connect Asia ‚ÄúBest Mobile Game‚Äù Nominee

FEATURES

>> Innovative and Dynamic Rhythm Game

Not the rhythm game you used to know: we add unique animation to the plate you'll be playing on. Dozens of fantastic music tracks and amazing boss-stage features, different charts and challenges; gentle or intense, beginners, advanced players and experts can all have their game!

>> Artistic and Refreshing Picture Book

"I trust that you, the one blessed by the gods of melody, can surely revive the former world order."
"Tune" the chaotic energy back to harmony, and the world will gradually reveal. Explore places on the map, read a beautifully handcrafted picture book, and collect items on the way as souvenir!

>> Achievement, Leaderboard,  and More

Collect achievements as the story progress, share your results to friends, and compete with other players on the leaderboard. Supports cloud save.

** To share the result screen, Lanota needs your permission to access Photos/Media/Files. We won't read your existing photos or files in the process.

>> Unlock Full Function and More Contents

The free-download version is a trial version.
Get full version (available as in-app purchase) to: 
- Remove the progress limit to Main Story
- Skip the waiting time between tracks & go ad-free 
- Unlock "retry" function 
- Enjoy free trial for first track in each in-app purchase chapter

Full version and in-app purchase chapters are all one-time purchase items. If any problem occurred to your purchased items, please contact us.

LINKS

Twitter https://twitter.com/Noxy_Lanota_EN/ 
Facebook https://www.facebook.com/lanota/
Official site http://noxygames.com/lanota/

comments: Nice game make me feel better when I was stressed it's better if you add some more musics each music has its unique way. Only problem is sometimes the music is stopping while I'm playing so please rectify this problem as soon as possible. Thank you ‚ù§

Very fun. Slightly different than other rhythm games but very high quality. Good song fidelity as well. Sounds great on a audiophile sound setup and even good on budget audio equipment as well. All around fun game if rhythm games are your style and worth investing in if you enjoy the gameplay.

It's a brilliant story with nice graphic and amazing music. But I just really wish you didn't have to pay to complete the story. You can't go any further into the plot unless you pay money for the full version.
I have some problem. With the latest update, it can't be played because when trying to play some song, the sound is glitchering and beatmap is offset. Please fix this

Came back to the game hoping to have fun but it doesn't even restore my purchases it loads for a fraction of a second then nothing happens. Bought this game since 2018 and this is the first time i felt disappointed in this game please fix this

title: Flow Free
description:
Flow Free¬Æ is a simple yet addictive puzzle game.

Connect matching colors with pipe to create a Flow¬Æ. Pair all colors, and cover the entire board to solve each puzzle in Flow Free. But watch out, pipes will break if they cross or overlap!

Free play through hundreds of levels, or race against the clock in Time Trial mode. Flow Free gameplay ranges from simple and relaxed, to challenging and frenetic, and everywhere in between. How you play is up to you. So, give Flow Free a try, and experience "mind like water"!

Flow Free features:

‚òÖ Over 2,500 free puzzles
‚òÖ Free Play and Time Trial modes
‚òÖ Clean, colorful graphics
‚òÖ Fun sound effects

Special thanks to Noodlecake Studios, creators of Super Stickman Golf, for their work on Flow Free!

Enjoy.

Coral Gables, FL 33134
recentChanges:

Enjoy!
comments: Wow. I am hooked. Since I started playing this game early on in the lockdown I got two of my buddies hooked as well. The game helps me build analogies to two story telling (the journey of the colour dots, their character arcs and what not) and strangely I can see parallels to approaching life as the relationship between various dots that occupy every spot on the board.

I have played this game for years. There is a wide variety of levels of different diffculties, shapes and sizes. Game works on a variety of different devices; phones and tablets. Highly recommend as a casual game to help pass some time. At the bmv? Flow. Long line in a store? Flow. Passenger on a long car ride? Flow. Bored with current level set? Go to a different level set, BOOM, continue Flowing. You can Flow anywhere, anytime. I love this game ‚ù§

I absolutely love this game! It's addicting to me. I've played every board, made sure every level was a perfect play, including all the extra packs I unlocked. I really wish there were some new packs for this game. I used to play this game for hours when I was bored. I miss all the nights where it would keep me up at night in bed while my phone was illuminated with Flow. I could think clearly because there were no distractions in bed. The only medal I need to get is the 365 day player goal.

Such a fun and sometimes challenging game. I can and have spent hours playing this game. It's an excellent time killer, and it's really entertaining. I have completed all the levels, and restarting it felt like an entirely new experience. I could go on forever about the variety of levels and how much I enjoy this game, but I won't. Just trust me when I say that I you're into fun and interesting puzzle games, you'll probably like this one! üòÄ

I love this game, and I have been playing it for years. One thing is that it's great to pass time or just listen to music but still have something to do with your hands. I have the full version, so I'd love it if paid and free packs were uploaded every once in a while (but kind of frequently because you can get through them pretty fast). I know there are other versions with more packs, but I don't want to pay more for every full version. :)

title: My Online Therapy: Find Therapists & Counselling
description:
My Online Therapy is your very own virtual clinic with highly qualified psychologists. Get matched with a psychologist and choose how you get therapy or counselling - by video, live chat or daily coaching. Prices start from ¬£49 for a session. 
 
IMPROVE YOUR WELLBEING EVERY DAY WITH OUR NEWEST FEATURE - SELF-CARE. Using evidence-based therapy skills and techniques written by psychologists, support your mental health alongside, or independent of, face-to-face video therapy. Start your 14-day free trial with an annual subscription, or try the 7-day free trial with a monthly subscription today!

Learn how to:
‚Ä¢ Deal with difficult thoughts
‚Ä¢ Calm your anxiety
‚Ä¢ Get a good night‚Äôs sleep
‚Ä¢ Build emotional intelligence
‚Ä¢ Discover your purpose
‚Ä¢ And much more

Get face-to-face therapy with a highly trained psychologist when and wherever's a good time to tap into you

Quality is what sets us apart. Our team of online therapists are all highly qualified psychologists and only deliver research-backed therapy in the style that best meets your lifestyle.

Everyone is unique which means we all respond to different approaches to therapy differently. Our matching algorithm combines 20+ years of clinical experience, matching you to the best online therapist or psychologist and type of therapy according to your specific needs, symptoms and circumstances. This ensures you get the result you‚Äôre looking for.

We believe in modern therapy for modern lives.

Our therapists

All of our online therapists are qualified psychologists and have been through a rigorous selection process. Many of our therapists also have long-standing academic and NHS careers, alongside their private work. They receive regular supervision from experts in their field and engage in a range of professional development and work to ensure they are always up to date with the most cutting edge, research-led therapies.

How we can help 

Our level of expertise means our online psychologist therapists can help with a wide range of mental health difficulties, including: depression, anxiety, PTSD, personality disorders, phobias, stress, health anxiety, social anxiety, panic attacks, work-related stress, bipolar disorder, eating disorders, self-harm, relationship difficulties, substance misuse, anorexia, binge-eating disorder, OCD.

Types of therapy 

Our focus is on providing cutting edge mental health therapies that deliver results, connecting you to qualified psychologists. This means we only offer therapies that are rooted in evidence-based practices and the best available research.

Online therapies include Acceptance & Commitment Therapy (ACT), Cognitive Analytic Therapy (CAT), Cognitive Behavioural Therapy (CBT), Couples Therapy, Dialectical Behaviour Therapy (DBT), Dynamic Interpersonal Therapy, Eye Movement Desensitisation & Reprocessing Therapy, Mentalisation Based Therapy, Mindfulness-based Cognitive Therapy (MBCT), Narrative Therapy, Psychodynamic Therapy, Schema Therapy, Systemic Therapy.

Get started on your path to better in 4 simple steps 

Step 1 - Download the app and sign up

Step 2 - Complete our free online questionnaire by telling us a bit about yourself and your symptoms. We‚Äôll match you to the best online therapists according to your personal needs.

Step 3 - Choose how you want to connect with your qualified therapists and get therapy (by video, live chat or daily coaching).

Step 4 - Start therapy! You can switch how you get therapy at any time.

---

Support

Telephone: 020 3349 7767 (available 9am-9pm Mon-Fri, 9am - 5pm Sat, 12am - 7pm Sun)
Email: support@myonlinetherapy.com

Privacy policy: https://myonlinetherapy.com/privacy-policy/
Terms of use: https://myonlinetherapy.com/terms-and-conditions/
descriptionHTML:
My Online Therapy is your very own virtual clinic with highly qualified psychologists. Get matched with a psychologist and choose how you get therapy or counselling - by video, live chat or daily coaching. Prices start from ¬£49 for a session.

IMPROVE YOUR WELLBEING EVERY DAY WITH OUR NEWEST FEATURE - SELF-CARE. Using evidence-based therapy skills and techniques written by psychologists, support your mental health alongside, or independent of, face-to-face video therapy. Start your 14-day free trial with an annual subscription, or try the 7-day free trial with a monthly subscription today!

Learn how to:
‚Ä¢ Deal with difficult thoughts
‚Ä¢ Calm your anxiety
‚Ä¢ Get a good night‚Äôs sleep
‚Ä¢ Build emotional intelligence
‚Ä¢ Discover your purpose
‚Ä¢ And much more

Get face-to-face therapy with a highly trained psychologist when and wherever's a good time to tap into you

Quality is what sets us apart. Our team of online therapists are all highly qualified psychologists and only deliver research-backed therapy in the style that best meets your lifestyle.

Everyone is unique which means we all respond to different approaches to therapy differently. Our matching algorithm combines 20+ years of clinical experience, matching you to the best online therapist or psychologist and type of therapy according to your specific needs, symptoms and circumstances. This ensures you get the result you‚Äôre looking for.

We believe in modern therapy for modern lives.

Our therapists

All of our online therapists are qualified psychologists and have been through a rigorous selection process. Many of our therapists also have long-standing academic and NHS careers, alongside their private work. They receive regular supervision from experts in their field and engage in a range of professional development and work to ensure they are always up to date with the most cutting edge, research-led therapies.

How we can help

Our level of expertise means our online psychologist therapists can help with a wide range of mental health difficulties, including: depression, anxiety, PTSD, personality disorders, phobias, stress, health anxiety, social anxiety, panic attacks, work-related stress, bipolar disorder, eating disorders, self-harm, relationship difficulties, substance misuse, anorexia, binge-eating disorder, OCD.

Types of therapy

Our focus is on providing cutting edge mental health therapies that deliver results, connecting you to qualified psychologists. This means we only offer therapies that are rooted in evidence-based practices and the best available research.

Online therapies include Acceptance & Commitment Therapy (ACT), Cognitive Analytic Therapy (CAT), Cognitive Behavioural Therapy (CBT), Couples Therapy, Dialectical Behaviour Therapy (DBT), Dynamic Interpersonal Therapy, Eye Movement Desensitisation & Reprocessing Therapy, Mentalisation Based Therapy, Mindfulness-based Cognitive Therapy (MBCT), Narrative Therapy, Psychodynamic Therapy, Schema Therapy, Systemic Therapy.

Get started on your path to better in 4 simple steps

Step 1 - Download the app and sign up

Step 2 - Complete our free online questionnaire by telling us a bit about yourself and your symptoms. We‚Äôll match you to the best online therapists according to your personal needs.

Step 3 - Choose how you want to connect with your qualified therapists and get therapy (by video, live chat or daily coaching).

Step 4 - Start therapy! You can switch how you get therapy at any time.

---

Support

Telephone: 020 3349 7767 (available 9am-9pm Mon-Fri, 9am - 5pm Sat, 12am - 7pm Sun)
Email: support@myonlinetherapy.com

Privacy policy: https://myonlinetherapy.com/privacy-policy/
Terms of use: https://myonlinetherapy.com/terms-and-conditions/
summary: Speak to a therapist from ¬£49 per session. Get anxiety & mental health support.
developer: Lekta Therapy | Talk to a therapist
developerAddress: 2 Lansdowne Row, Suite 163, London, W1J 6HL, United Kingdom
recentChanges: In the latest version, we've made some improvements to those using insurance as a payment method for therapy.
comments: The app in itself is good, and the price is certainly cheaper than a traditional therapist, but still too expensive for me I'm afraid. I think ¬£50 for 30 minutes and ¬£100 for 50 minutes is a bit of a scam. I had three sessions with my therapist, and had to stop because she was very slow and we still hadn't made any progress and I felt like I was losing my money... Not a great therapist either in my opinion, compared to others I talked to in the past. I didn't really feel understood, or heard.

This app looks great and really helpful for those who need it. But the costs are just too much, it excludes and marginalises those with little money. When most have no access to NHS offerings and no money for private this app offers false hope. Make the costs more obvious before people sign up. Going through emotional questions and 'connecting' with a therapist to then find out that it's like ¬£49 for half an hour!?

Waaaaay to expensive. ¬£99 per 50 minutes is ridiculous money. Don't waste your time. Look online at approved registers. You can get someone as qualified as people on this app for ¬£70 per 60 minutes. Furthermore the app or my therpaists camera/ sound quality was terrible. I couldn't hear or see my therapist but then I contacted family after and it was fine. Good idea but not worth it at all.

This seems like a helpful app and I understand obviously why therapy is rather expensive. To improve it you could have an option for 13 or up or maybe even 5 and up with a parent. Although, I think when chosing a therapist you should have the therapists price range andcertain people may not feel comfortable with and may want to change. What I really liked was the audio tailored to your problem with the name of the therapist.

Poor service for me. You fill in a few automated drop down boxes to vaguely describe your problems and symptoms. Then you get allocated a therapist to choose from then before actually speaking to anyone you're expected to pay before you've spoken to anyone to work out treatment plans and unanswered questions. I called the help line they told me to contact the therapist and told me how the therapist returned my message 3 days last saying I need to call the helpline. Still not answered questions

title: Design Home: Play + Save
description:
Looking for a new creative hobby? Play Design Home today - a relaxing, fun game that allows you to live the life of an interior decorator. Sharpen your decorating skills in daily Design Challenges and style visually stunning three-dimensional spaces with access to real, high-end furniture and decor brands. Unlock 'My Homes' to access bathrooms, kitchens and more customization options to bring your dream homes to life! It‚Äôs quick, it‚Äôs fun and you can connect with a vibrant creative community while learning about diverse d√©cor styles - thus improving your design skills and gaining inspiration that you can even apply in your real life.

* Relax through play and express your creativity in daily Design Challenges.
* Unlock rewards as you polish your amazing abilities as an interior decorator.
* Level up to access 'My Homes' - with dream homes of your very own to design as you wish!
* Play with real life, high-end brands as you learn about different interior design styles.
* Vote on your favorite rooms from a vibrant, creative community.
* Share your creativity and borrow furnishings from your friends when you connect to Facebook.

With new pieces added every day, Design Home lets you play with home furnishings from real-life brands - all available directly at your fingertips. Not only can you discover brands and trends, you can get inspired and build your interior decorating skills! 

PLEASE NOTE:
- This game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items, which will charge your Google account. You can disable in-app purchasing by adjusting your device settings.
- This game is not intended for children.
- Please buy carefully.
- Advertising appears in this game.
- This game may permit users to interact with one another (e.g., chat rooms, player to player chat, messaging) depending on the availability of these features. Linking to social networking sites are not intended for persons in violation of the applicable rules of such social networking sites.
- A network connection is required to play.
- For information about how Glu collects and uses your data, please read our privacy policy at: www.Glu.com/privacy
- If you have a problem with this game, please use the game‚Äôs ‚ÄúHelp‚Äù feature.

Terms of Service: http://www.glu.com/terms
Privacy Policy: http://www.glu.com/privacy

recentChanges:
‚Ä¢ Introducing ‚ÄòDH Inspired‚Äô - an ALL-NEW shopping experience to earn savings on home decor delivered right to your door by just playing the game you love.
‚Ä¢ Don't forget that new real-world items from top brands and unique Design Challenges are added daily!

comments: I really love this game, it is addictive. I recommend a few changes or I need to back away from playing. To decorate the way you'd like, it cost too much money. I think once you've earned an item it should be yours to keep. You only get to use it 5 times then you have to keep re-purchasing. Also, the "My Homes" doesn't keep up with your pace, you can only collect 50 keys then you just lose them. I wish when going through items to purchase you could sort by price. 5 stars down to 3, sorry!

I absolutely like this game. The designs and inventory are pretty. I like the fact that they give you diamonds every day and have a chance to earn money on a design with out having to spend any money. This comment was when I first started playing the game. I have been p!aying for a few months now and I sense the frustration as others do about the voting process. It really needs to be rethought. It is not fair and gives stars when not due and no stars when due. People see differently!

Love this app, but I would love some real review so I can learn how to.get the 5.0 scores all the time. Also, the app expects you to buy too much all the time with what is required. It makes it hard to just play in the app. We need more daily challenges. Update: I really like this app but it is so hard to do more than 1 challenge because everything costs so much in diamonds. Too expensive.

Design home is my daily stress reliever. Although I love this game, I have to say that it is always taking forever to load and it is not my connection though it says I have a bad connection. For the few years I have been playing it I haven't complained but I'm at level 51 and just trying to load an option takes forever and sometimes I'm told item can't be found right nowü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è. It's a little frustrating but still absolutely love this game. Please let me know if there is a way to improve this?

Game is great.. expensive if you want to keep up...but it never ever connects for me the 1st time . and it's not my interent it's your server...One time I have to use my interent then I have to use my data..and most times I have to go back and forth 3 or 4 times to see which it will take...and this is every single day a few times a day .it never is the same and takes forever to load when it finally gets working.. but I do love the game! I am addicted just wish you would fix those 2 things...

title: Brain It On! - Physics Puzzles
description:
Deceptively challenging physics puzzles for your brain!

Draw shapes to solve challenging physics puzzles. They're not as easy as they look. Care to give one a try?

‚óÜ Dozens of brain busting physics puzzles, with more being added all the time
‚óÜ Compete with your friends for the Brain It On! crown
‚óÜ Multiple ways to solve each puzzle, can you find the best solution?
‚óÜ Share your unique solutions and compare with your friends

All the levels can be unlocked for free by earning stars in previous levels. You can always find dozens of new player created free levels each day on the community screen. You can also purchase the game to remove all ads, unlock all hints, unlock levels early, and unlock the level editor.

Please note: purchasing the "No Popup Ads" option just removes the ads between levels, purchasing the "Full Game" will also remove the ads to get hints.

If you like this game, please rate it and leave a comment. As an indie developer your support is greatly appreciated. Thank you for your help! If you don't like something in the game, please email me at support@brainitongame.com and tell me why. I want to hear your feedback and comments so I can continue to make this game better.

You can find me on Twitter at @orbitalnine, see the latest news on the Facebook page at http://www.facebook.com/brainitongame, or get all the details on the website: http://brainitongame.com

I hope you enjoy Brain It On!

recentChanges:
- Added a very hard difficulty levels tab on the community levels screen
- Added black borders to the hint shapes to help see overlapping shapes
- Bug fixes
comments: You will probably give up on some levels because you have no clue. Might even watch a hint still be unsure. Always room for improvement! It's rewarding when you figure it out. The physics overall work well, I had a few issues where the peices glitch through eachother. But it's rare and just requires a restart. No big deal. The levels start off easy, now I'm skipping some levels because I can't figure it out. If you want a challenge. Try this game. It's a lot of fun.

I love this game. Starting off drawing shapes to move balls around the screen, the game developes, becoming a balancing act of inginuity, precision and skill, without adding any additional mechanics. The level design is tight, teaching ideas organically, without becoming impossible, but hArd COrE GaMerS can enjoy trying over and over for full stars. The ads aren't infuriating, and although the objects can clip, it's rare enough to be funny, instead of infuriating.

"Gravity, to Copernicus, is the nostalgia of things to become spheres." - Annie Dillard ....... Sometimes an itch comes along that you just have to scratch. Impressed so far - still rather early in my experience of the game - but thinking a stylus would be quite helpful. Thanks to the developers.

It used to be an rxcellent brain trainer that fotces you to think outside the box. Now it's broken because it wants to force use of "Google Play Games" library to "enhance experience" with useless tie-in with farcebook and other useless social stuff. Uninstall as broken. I corrected, it wasn't "some games library" it's "Google Play Games". It forces me to the Google Play app to install it. I can provide screenshot.

I love it! It does not rush you, if you get it wrong you haven't wasted hours, only seconds.At the moment I feel educated, and with a greater appreciation for physical objects. On Premium you can delete it when you get angry, then reinstall months later unchanged, no penalty. You need a precision stylus if you use it on mobile phone (I must get one!) . The 'hints' and 'restart' buttons are badly placed for right handers, you can accidentally press them during play, I wish I could move them.

title: Word Life - Connect crosswords puzzle
description:
‚≠êÔ∏èMillions of players love this free crossword puzzle game. Join them today! ‚≠êÔ∏è

Word Life is a free crossword and anagrams game. Hunt and connect letters to spell words in this relaxing vocabulary game. Your daily brain training is now called Word Life! 

 More than 6000 levels to play connect word games, anagrams and daily crosswords

Get your dose of daily brain training with this free crossword puzzle word game. Lovers of classic word games like Scrabble, crosswords or anagrams will love this word hunt and spell vocabulary game. You can connect to play words with friends, play a daily crossword solo, or solve and spell anagrams wherever you are! 

Word Life also has many addictive special event word games, such as the Feed Katie event. Katie is a cute cat that eats word cookies! Scrabble the anagrams to connect and spell and feed word cookies to Katie, and watch her grow! 

There's a whole word of wonders to explore in this free crossword puzzle. Word hunt, scrabble & scramble words, to spell and collect word cookies. Build word stacks to win prizes and hints with relaxing word scapes in every level. 

Word Life - Connect crossword word games features:
‚Ä¢ Infinite word connect puzzles: anagrams, word hunt, word scramble and other free word games
‚Ä¢ Daily crossword brain training: collect letters and spell words in this vocabulary game
‚Ä¢ Easy to learn: challenging word game for lovers of Scrabble!
‚Ä¢ Daily crossword events: Feed word cookies to Katie the cat! 
‚Ä¢ Relaxing scenery: Different word scapes to journey through. Welcome to a word of wonders! 
‚Ä¢ Word scramble: scrabble the letters to connect hidden words and spell word stacks 
‚Ä¢ Spell words with friends: connect to word hunt online with your friends
‚Ä¢ Collect personalised word game tiles

Word Life is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases on your phone or tablet settings.

Do not sell my info: https://www.take2games.com/ccpa/

recentChanges:
Word Life keeps on getting better, so your brain can too! We've listened to your feedback and put it into practice in this latest version. Get ready!

- The new events screen keeps you informed about everything that's going on in Word Life. You'll never miss a party again!
- There's also a new social screen that will help you stay connected.
- We've fixed the technical issues that were bugging you.

Isn't it about time your brain had a workout? Update now!
comments: Without a doubt, this game is fun & a brain changer. However, rebooting the game sfter every play is pathetic to say the least. For that reason I am considering un-installing, which I did. Now, 7 months later I thought I would give it a try once again. Nothing has been done to improve the situation. Seems like it worse than before. This time it is good-bye forever.

Love this game! Trivia is my favorite. Challenging questions and not much time to answer!! The tiles offered are really cool, as are the rewards when you win. Puzzles are challenging, too. Overall, game keeps my mind sharp! ***OH, one change I really appreciate is during trivia. When you can't answer in time, the game now shows you the answer before closing out. That used to drive me nuts not knowing the right answer for next time. Thanks for updating!***

Fun word game. Coins (which you can buy with real money) get you very little. I wish you could buy hints with them. I paid for ad-free but I still am asked way too often if I want to purchase coins - no, and stop asking, thanks. Recent updates made the daily game clearer. They added a little bee to help out. It's annoying, and covers part of the puzzle.

Falsely advertised as a different game; plus all extra words gained in piggy bank has to be Bought back by me!..for 3.99- you must be kidding; then I have to advertise on other social media to promote this game!?.. for supposed extra coins! I am totally disappointed...where is the original game that was advertised for choosing the correct word that sound the same but have different meanings?

It was advertised on trivia crack as a grammar game. I love grammar and when I saw that advertisement for choosing different words with same sounds and you had to choose which one would be correct in the sentence, I didn't miss a beat to install. Then when I opened it, it was just the basic word cookies, or swipe to get the words. It's falsely advertised. Uninstalled right away. It also was pushing you to spend money so even if you do like this sort of game, I don't reccommend this version.

title: Criminal Case
description:
Criminal Case - the #1 free hidden object game! Are you ready to solve murder cases?
Download now and discover who killed Rosa Wolf...

Join the Police of Grimsborough to solve a series of murder cases in this captivating hidden object, adventure game. Investigate crime scenes for clues, bring the suspects in for questioning and analyze evidence to catch the killers. Are you ready to prove your detective skills?

FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ Investigate crime scenes in a grim and corrupt city
‚Ä¢ Play with your friends to be the best detective ever

comments: Sorry folks,got to down grade my review. First: New players don't fall into the Facebook trap it's more trouble than it's worth. Second: I agree with other players in regards to the time it takes to get results back from tests, and to many ads. If you're that hard up for $ make the sponcers pay not the players. Third: come on guys, make this more player friendly and more people will play. That's a no brainer

I love this game! I've been playing it for many years. What I don't understand is why it says I have to download a separate app (for Travel in Time) when, in the past, it's let me use just the 1 app for all the chapters (Pacific Bay, Save the World, Mysteries of the Past & the Conspiracy). I would rather be able to use the same app like I have been this whole time than have to not only download another app but not have all of my XP, stars, energy & money not be carried over

They are now putting ads in between plays. Never had them before. Nevertheless love playing CC. I broke down and bought the ad removable app. It works but when I go to send out anything I get..Invalid access_ code when trying to do it. I have contacted Facebook and Criminal Case. They are telling me that I need to contact Google play cause that was the card I purchased the ad remover using. Google play is to fix the problem. So google play.....fix it! Been 3 weeks.

I love this game and the only reason it isn't getting five stars is because recently, the videos to recieve extra time and daily rewards will not play. If this glitch can be fixed, I will gladly change my review. Thanks. This problem still occurs. So I have changed my review to two stars. I will change it to five if and when it is fixed. It is a true disappointment in an otherwise great game.

Was running fine & progressing nicely until it tried to force me to accept a Facebook policy, I cannot accept the cookies as screen won't drag to press accept as screen size has changed, so it means I'm no longer able to send help/ items to friends or ask for help with reports at the end of each case, also feeding pets has changed to adverts only which now takes forever....really disappointed & frustrated so please change it back to 5 min timers & cut the excessive adverts for everything

title: June's Journey - Hidden Objects
description:
Nothing like a mystery! 

Find the hidden objects to crack every case. Solve mind teasing mysteries in the glamorous 1920s! 
Dive into June Parker's captivating quest to unveil a scandalous family secret. Escape to an era of opulent mansions and romance as you search for hidden clues through hundreds of stunning mind-teasing puzzles! 

* ARE YOU READY FOR THE JOURNEY OF A LIFETIME?* 

‚≠êKEEN-EYED DETECTIVES WANTED ‚Äì Engage your sense of observation to find all hidden clues 

‚≠êYOUR 1ST CLASS TICKET TO THRILLS ‚Äì Mystery! Danger! Romance! Where will each new chapter take you? 

‚≠êMYSTERY WITH ADDED GLAMOUR ‚Äì Relax through hundreds of dazzling hidden-object scenes and customize your very own luxurious mansion and garden island 

‚≠ê25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT ‚Äì Don't miss out on the latest hit from the makers of the mythical hidden object classic "Pearl's Peril"

Nothing like a mystery!

Find the hidden objects to crack every case. Solve mind teasing mysteries in the glamorous 1920s!
Dive into June Parker's captivating quest to unveil a scandalous family secret. Escape to an era of opulent mansions and romance as you search for hidden clues through hundreds of stunning mind-teasing puzzles!

* ARE YOU READY FOR THE JOURNEY OF A LIFETIME?*

‚≠êKEEN-EYED DETECTIVES WANTED ‚Äì Engage your sense of observation to find all hidden clues

‚≠êYOUR 1ST CLASS TICKET TO THRILLS ‚Äì Mystery! Danger! Romance! Where will each new chapter take you?

‚≠êMYSTERY WITH ADDED GLAMOUR ‚Äì Relax through hundreds of dazzling hidden-object scenes and customize your very own luxurious mansion and garden island

‚≠ê25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT ‚Äì Don't miss out on the latest hit from the makers of the mythical hidden object classic "Pearl's Peril"

‚≠ê ALL-NEW EPISODES ‚Äì Just like your favorite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new chapter, and a new chapter every week

---------------------------------------------------------------

June‚Äôs Journey is free to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game, for instance to upgrade your mansion. You can disable in-app purchases in your device‚Äôs settings. You may require an Internet connection to play June‚Äôs Journey and access its social features. June‚Äôs Journey may also contain advertising.

comments: I enjoy the game, the storyline and graphics. Like other have noted, not having stored items count towards your flowers seems odd. It's difficult to get compasses at times to open land - sometimes I have literally played about 1500 in points and got only one compass - particularly when having to play a completed scene over and over to just get enough stars to buy something. Which is another thing - I thought 36000 was a lot, then it was 38000, now 72000! Have to spend a lot of money to advance.

Love the many different aspects of the game...*the 'seek n find to gain points, increasing your coin level so you can *buy (houses, animals...), to increase your PRESTIGE, (the flowers you earn level up), *creating your own island! The *story line, following June from level to level! You don't have to make in app purchases; alternative ways to raise your coins to keep active until you meet your goals! You can also *follow JJ on Facebook!! My favorite game!!!

I like the varied parts to the game- mystery, puzzles, hidden items, building. The characters are realistic, not cartoon-like. I have had no glitches/bugs and the buttons to change scenes work easily. I was a bit confused about game play at the first scene but I went to the information and it became more clear. There are many layers to this game.

The game is fun but I have spent too much money to gain power ups, energy and gems go get farther in the game. The % you win for each seen you play to earn stars isn't equal to how well you play. It only gives you 10% increase when you "finish" a "scene" even if you get a perfect. If I get a perfect I should be earning more than 8-10% for playing great. Lots of improvements are needed.

I enjoy this game. The graphics are well done (I did find one typo but in this day and age that isn't bad) and the game play enjoyable. It is relaxing for me. I was also very impressed at the quick response to my inquiry about something that was actually me forgetting an aspect of game play about storing items. I had my answer in one day. I honestly wasn't that confident that something like a game maker would be that attentive to my dumb question. Good job!

title: Hollywood Story: Fashion Star
description:
Here is your chance to become a true Hollywood Star! 

Welcome to the star-studded, stunning and spectacular streets of Hollywood Story! 

Build your own movie star career, dominate the red carpets throughout the city, hang out with fans, friends and followers, create own fashion lines, shoot awesome blockbusters and become a true Hollywood icon!

CREATE YOUR OWN HOLLYWOOD STAR
Make your own movie star! Personalize your avatar, choose your clothing, fashion style, hairstyle and make-up. Leave your own unique mark on the movie industry!

SHOOT MOVIES
Win auditions and shoot blockbusters! Promote your movies and earn fans!

FASHION
Meet designers and wear unique fashion dress made only for you!

GET FANS
Create your own star-signed fashion collection, design own perfume and become true megastar with hordes of fans!

DATE WITH CELEBRITIES
Meet the hottest Hollywood stars and hang out with them at epic parties on fabulous locations ‚Äì it's time to live the dream!

UNLOCK THE CITY
Progress through the game and unlock amazing new locations and engaging new features! Hang out in Hollywood, Beverly Hills, Manhattan, Las Vegas and other exciting locations!

MAKE THE COVERS
With great fame comes great media frenzy! Paparazzi will be waiting in front of your home to get a picture of you, so be prepared for tabloid covers. 

SOCIALIZE, CONNECT, INTERACT
Meet new people, play with your friends, visit their homes and check out their movies. Then share your accomplishments with the world!

comments: This is supposed to be fun, not frustrating or leaving you feeling like you've been ripped off. The new update has changed the payouts on all the games of chance. Even if you get a "special casino night" it's a major rip-off. I started out with over 260 diamonds on my "special" hour and it took all of my money and my diamonds. I've already decided the "Star Club" aint worth it (tried it) The game isn't much fun unless you have diamonds-too expensive -my advice is PASS!! My id is Qpydz542.

I love the game there are no ads in it. You can dress up style yourself your two bff will help you in this journey. Meet many people in the game u can even invite your friends to play with you. But there is 1 thing that I don't like in it that all the things are very expensive gems r less but give amazing dresses that which has to change and there are only 3 eye ball colours and eye shadow colours. Over all it is a lovely and amazing game u should try the game once in your life. üòçüòáüòÅüòÅ

I like it, it's a fun game. I think the price of the clothing cost way to many diamonds, and not enough of them cost cash, mostly everything cost diamonds. And you don't get many with purchase unless you make a large purchase. And the up scale clothing stores should give gift bags. And why do I have to pay for a date? Haha.

I want to take the time to express my thoughts on this very very cool game! I believe that while I am a star member there is really no benefit to it. $19.95 a week is way more then you should be asking for. It is misleading. You still have to spend money to get ahead not to mention the runway battles are REDICULOUS. It is full of cheaters wearing skirts on top of dressed and looking completely silly yet they win. And the ONLY WAY TO BEAT THEM IS TO JOIN THEM HOWEVER IT'S not even fun anymore!!!

I'm irritated that everything that can help you in the Fashion Arena cost diamonds!! I'm irritated that I did the download of that stupid chef game and finished the tutorial but never recieved the reward for it so I had to spend 5 diamonds to skip it so I could continue with the storyline. It sucks that everytime you get "busted" in recieving gifts from fans the price of continuing goes up. This isnt a game. It's a money pit!!!

title: Kill Shot
description:
Welcome to your new First-Person Shooter assignment.

FIRST-PERSON MISSIONS
You are a covert special ops soldier ready to play your part in dangerous military FPS attacks and silent assassin missions.

CHOOSE YOUR FIREPOWER
With access to powerful guns you will rely on your marksman skills to finish the job. Upgrade your sniper rifle to improve accuracy, damage and range.

TAKE THE SHOT
Your job as sniper is to travel deep into enemy territory to locate and eliminate hidden targets. Stare down your rifle scope, zoom in to find and identify the target. Take a breath...and pull the trigger to make the Kill Shot.

CONFIRM THE KILL
We need confirmed kills soldier. Good luck out there.

HIGH VELOCITY GAMEPLAY
- Over 800 first person shooter missions to complete.
- Awesome 3D graphics.
- Unforgettable bullet cam kill shot moments.
- Global Ops event system with prizes to be won
- 50 unique maps and stunning locations.

DEADLY WEAPONS
- 100+ different weapons to choose from
- Maximize your firepower with 4 weapon classes:
+ Sniper Rifle,
+ Assault Rifle
+ Shotgun
+ SAW Gun
- Unlock powerful upgrades for every weapon.

KILLER POWER-UPS
- Spotter - quickly find all enemies.
- Slow-Mo - slow down time to line up the perfect Kill Shot.
- Armor-Piercing Bullets - if you can hit it, you will kill it.

GAME CENTER SUPPORT
- 4 Leaderboards to challenge your friends.
- 50 Achievements to complete and earn in-game rewards.
 
Kill Shot is rated 17+ and contains frequent/intense realistic violence. By downloading this app you are agreeing to be bound by the terms and conditions of Hothead's Terms of Use (www.hotheadgames.com/termsofuse) and are subject to Hothead's Privacy Policy (www.hotheadgames.com/privacy-policy).

comments: Gave 3 stars for 2 reasons. I may have posted this previously. 1. It costs WAY too much to buy weapons, 2. It takes WAYYYY to long to receive upgrades. What's up with having to wait almost 2 hrs for an upgrade already paid for; even if it is game coin. Some of us are on budgets and can't be spending out of pocket. I'm sure I'm not alone inthis thought. How bout making it a little easier on us players. Thanks. I'll add stars accordingly.

First time I've given any game 5 stars...it's probably closer to 4.5 stars but close enough. Has the annoying ads but all games do so can't criticize it too much for that...about .5 stars. This is the first sniper (shooter) game I've played...and that's quite a few...that gives you reasonal means to upgrade and buy weapons. There are missions that are easy enough that you can play them to build up the monies needed for upgrades or new weapons. IMO this is the best sniper game to date.

I always enjoy this game and have never had problems with it before, but it is super glitchy right now. I shoot the target and then the game glitches and I have to close and restart the game a few times before I can move past that level

It's good game but only few things sucks 1the friendlies too are soldiers but they are not shooting instead they are running 2 update costs are too much 3 there is only one type of scope 4 there is no different mission like shooting a target in moving vechile

When i played this game i fell good but there was 1 problem that the game was saying for upgrading the weapon for kill the black opps Bye the way this game is best only areason i will give 4 stars tnks .i never played that tye of game i was very good game .

title: This Is the Police
description:
This Is the Police is a strategy/adventure game set in a city spiraling the drain. Taking the role of gritty Police Chief Jack Boyd, you'll dive into a deep story of crime and intrigue. Will Jack reach his retirement with a nice stack of bills, or will he end up broken ... or worse?

- Your mission is clear: make $500,000 in 180 days before Jack Boyd reaches retirement. How? That‚Äôs up to you!

- Decisions, decisions! This Is the Police is all about a dark story and how you react to it. Whatever you decide, your choices will influence the game ‚Äì and the fate of Jack Boyd.

- The Good, the Bad, and... the Ugly? The Chief of Freeburg's Police Department deals with all kind of people. It is up to you to find the bad guys and decide how to deal with them.

- Carry out your duties. As head of Freeburg PD, Jack deals with all sorts of challenges every day: responding to emergencies, managing his officers, defending the department against City Hall and a corrupt mayor, and much more.

- Solve Investigations and gather evidence against the criminal gangs of Freeburg.

- Deal with the competing powers of the city. Everyone offers you favors, and each one comes at a price.

- Rich and fully voiced story: Jack Boyd is portrayed by Jon St. John, the voice of Duke Nukem.

Supported languages: EN, ZH-CN, FR, DE, JA, PT, RU, ES

¬© HandyGames 2019

comments: I actually enjoyed this, even though I got to two days before finishing and then was stuck as didn't have enough officers (no option to go back a few days had to start from scratch) is a fun diversion but doesn't get a higher score as your actions in the game don't seem to matter to the final story other than very topline stuff. A lot of what you do is painted as important but doesn't affect the outcome.

Too slow and boring, plus it's in landscape mode which is not a natural way to hold a phone, there are tons of excellent potential 5 star games out there that make the mistake of using landscape mode at the very least make both modes so there is at least a choice..

I thought the story was interesting and the game has a lot of character overall, but the gameplay is kind of frustrating. You're constantly asked to make decisions with only limited context, where there's really no way to know what choice will lead to what outcome. As a result, when you choose "wrong" and get a bad result, it doesn't feel like you screwed up, it feels like the game screwed you. Maybe that's what they're going for, sometimes you make a call with your gut and it's the wrong one and people die, but in a game that's just frustrating.

Very different from most games I've played on my phone, when I started I thought I was just going to be a tell police go to go here and go there, but it turns out there's a very good storyline, and a pretty dispatch system in management. Overall a very enjoyable game and much better then excited.
Meh, it's okay, id rather a sandbox mode as well as the story, it's a bit boring but it's a well made game and that's why it's three stars.

title: Fallout Shelter
description:
** Google Play Best of 2015  **
Mobile Game of the Year - 2016 DICE Awards
Winner 2015 Golden Joystick Best Handheld/Mobile Game

"Might just be the best free-to-play game out there" - GamesBeat
"Probably the best game of E3 2015‚Äù ‚Äì Gizmodo 
"Fallout Shelter is simple to play and addictive as hell." - GameZone

BUILD THE PERFECT VAULT
Create a brighter future‚Ä¶underground! Select from a variety of modern-day rooms to turn an excavation beneath 2,000 feet of bedrock into the very picture of Vault Life.

OVERSEE A THRIVING COMMUNITY 
Get to know your Dwellers and lead them to happiness. Find their ideal jobs and watch them flourish. Provide them with outfits, weapons, and training to improve their abilities.

CUSTOMIZE
Turn worthless junk into useful items with Crafting! Customize the look of any dweller in the Barbershop.

PROSPER
A well-run Vault requires a variety of Dwellers with a mix of skills. Build a Radio Room to attract new Dwellers. Or, take an active role in their personal lives; play matchmaker and watch the sparks fly! 

EXPLORE THE WASTELAND 
Send Dwellers above ground to explore the blasted surface left behind and seek adventure, handy survival loot, or unspeakable death. Find new armor and weapons, gain experience, and earn Caps. But don‚Äôt let them die!

PROTECT YOUR VAULT
From time to time, idyllic Vault life may be disrupted by the dangers of post-nuclear life. Prepare your Dwellers to protect against threats from the outside‚Ä¶and within.

Vault-Tec has provided the tools, but the rest is up to you. What are you waiting for? Get started building your Vault today for FREE.

comments: I really enjoy this game! I love the fallout series as well as the elder scrolls games, Bethesda is by far the best. Now this game has some things it could use, one of those is the ability to move rooms around without destroying them, or even widen the vault a bit so you can fit three full rooms along with 2 or 3 elevators. I also wish the rarity chance was a teensy bit higher for legendary dwellers, there are more things, but I only have 500 letters to use. Fix those two and I'll update this :)

Good graphics, good gameplay, no "it is free-to-play, but pay us or wait for years to finish building", no "you will play forever no matter what mistakes you do" (you can lose and it makes you think what to do). You do not have to play each day (do not afraid of missing something or losing state). You can even select difficult level! It is something I missed from old time. One of great games for smartphone, I like it!

It feels like a game to download just to kill time, but I'm addicted to it. I love the graphics and the humor. And the only time you get ads is when you want to skip something for free, there is not a ton of ads like most other games. I love to name the characters and RP what life in the vault would be like and turn on fallout music on youtube in the background. It's the best free game I've played in a long time. Thank you so much to the developers for making us this game for free. ‚ù§Ô∏è

I love this game. And have for years. However upon getting into contact with the developer, days later they've ignored me on multiple accounts. Ive emailed them around a half dozen times and they've only responded 3 times. All of which was not helpful. And now, not only do I feel completely scammed, I feel disrespected as a player. Take this into consideration if you make a purchase. They will suck at communicating back with you.

Would be 5 stars but there's a glitch that adds 270+ hours to the daily reward and that isn't great. Edit: I have now changed my review from 4 stars to 1 star because as of the new update I am unable to actually load the game. It asked for access to media and files, which is fine, but then it started a weird download and once it finishes the game gets stuck in a frozen loading screen. Closing and reopening the app just restarts the download. Please fix and I'll change my review back to 4 star.

title: Sdorica: Puzzle & Tactical RPG
description:
‚ñºFantasy Strategy RPG
Legend has it that the world was once pitch black, all that existed was one giant dragon. Eternity was given to the humans by the giant dragon, but their freedom was deprived...Those enslaved have finally awakened. They went in search of hope, and a knight named "Vendacti" determined to fight against fate...

‚ñºExperience a Story of Heroes and Heroines
Various beasts, an obstinate damsel, a swordsman from the Orient, a female merchant that carries firearms, and many more. Start building your favorite character! Follow the royal princess, Angelia, to protect the kingdom, or follow Leah, the demihuman with rabbit ears and enter the Rune Academy to learn rune magic!

‚ñºCollect Magnificent Characters
Wanna collect all kinds of characters? Sophie, a character done in the Onmyoji style; Kittyeyes, the catty maid; Yamitsuki, the killer that dons a kimono; Fredrica, the sexy witch who's keen on getting married; Law, who claims to be martial arts Grand Master, and many more. Follow these incredible characters and explore continent Vendacti!

‚ñºVariety of Unique Gaming Modes
Sdorica is a classic fantasy strategy RPG that uses the classic team combo of support, attacker, and tank. Remove the orbs strategically to cast spells, save the world, and achieve your fantasy. There are also adorable monsters for you to breed, and a cooperation system that allows you to fight along with friends and guild members. This fun and fascinating gaming experience is awaiting you!

‚ñºMassive, Epic Storyline
Sdorica has an enormous worldview and an unprecedented epic story. Season 1 takes place in the corrupt Kingdom of the Sun that seems perfect on the outside...but darkness lurks within; Season 2 opens up the Desert Kingdom that's constantly engulfed in the flames of war. Besides the compelling storyline, to make the game more lively, we've invited well-known Japanese CVs to do the voices for each character.

„ÄêPlayers can download this game for free„Äë

[Adjustment] Added the required amount of currency to the purchase page in the market.
[Adjustment] Adjusted the new rules for refreshing the guild advisor. The amount of people you can select from the guild advisor list has been adjusted to 20 people.
[Adjustment] Optimized the interface and the look of the game
comments: Not a huge fan of the battle mechanics.. the story is great, each character seems detailed.. my only quam is that I've done easily over 100 pulls for new characters and have pulled the same 10 blue tier the whole time. Not a single purple or yellow besides the one they gave for free. Quite sad to of spent money for literally nothing. I know it's all chance, but I personally wont be attempting this again.

If there is a single game that I have enjoyed thoroughly through the years and have never been frustrated with, its sdorica! From the music to the story (which is a 12/10!!!) You cannot go wrong, give it a try!

Im giving this one star because while I adore this game I can only play on wifi. I have a good 4g connection on my galaxy s9 plus and it keeps asking for a stable connection. Please fix this its terrible and straight up ruins the game for me. Ill delete this post and give back my 5 stars once this is resolved.

The game is beautiful, i've playing for a long time now. But today is different. After i open the app and tap to start, it went pitch black and never showing the game. Please fix this, and i will give you back my 5 star

I dont usually do reviews so I'll keep it short because this company deserves something for its hard work and after playing for almost two years this game is probably had one of its biggest updates just recently so its clear that they really do care about this game and want to keep it revelant and entertaining, and I really mean that despite sounding like a review bot.

Improve your cognitive & problem-solving skills with Unblock Me.  The game is tiny in size but mighty in puzzles. Exercise your brain with over 40,000 puzzles. Choose from 3 challenging modes; Relax, Challenge or Daily. A family-friendly game; suitable for all ages.

Available for all Android phones and tablets!
