developerAddress: service@rayark.com
recentChanges:
DEEMO 3.8
- Removes all free trial version restrictions; after the update the game will open directly to the Full Version.
- Newly added: 3 free songs added in "Shattered Memories 2"
- Newly added: Paid song packs "Feryquitous Collection #2 / Cytus II Collection Vol.1 / DEEMO -Reborn- Collection"
- Enhanced gameplay experience and optimized UI
comments: It's a really good game in my opinion. I love all the song choices and the story. The art is really cute too. I never knew that a music game would make me so happy and emotional. I really love some songs like "Waltz in devils playground" and "I hate to tell you" although, love all of the songs. I would tell other people to play this. I'm so happy this game was made. Thanks for all the hard working people who helped make this game. Also, thank you Rayark for making this lovely game.

This game is incredible. By far my favourite game of its kind due to the high quality unique music, the stunning visuals and art, and the always compelling storyline. I've been playing Deemo since I first started college four years ago and have been playing it since. I listen to the music regularly, have been inspired to learn some of the songs on piano because of this game, and is in general a relaxing and fun game to play when I'm bored. By far one of the best apps I have on my phone. Period.

Simple story, but the way it is told is superb. Just by the way the story is told, it's easily one of the best, if not the best rhythm game of all time. Not to mention how the soundtrack and bgm are well thought out, and fits the player's mood perfectly. The ending moved me so much I cried. Still get a heartache along with teary eyes every time I hear that one song. It's so good that it ruined my experience of other rhythm games as I can't help but find them lacking in comparison.

My first DEDICATED rhythm game, and it slowly is teaching me, a beginner, to properly play and doesn't punish me for missing notes! Each and every one of the music is unique and has meaning. The story is told in a beautiful but short cutscenes, allowing us to piece the puzzle of the story together. I love it and I hope others will too!

So, after few months after my last review which unfortunately was a 1 star, I can give this 5 stars again, my purchases came back and I can play again. If you like rhythm games this is the best mobile one out there. Great sound tracks, amazing challenge but with an easy start for beginners. Honestly you can't go wrong with this game.

title: TuneIn Radio: Live News, Sports & Music Stations
description:
FROM NOW ON, THIS IS RADIO.

TuneIn brings together live news, sports, music, podcasts and radio stations from around the world.

With live and on-demand audio from the voices you trust, on any device, you're never without something amazing to listen to.


ALL YOUR AUDIO IN ONE APP.

‚Ä¢ News: Listen to and stay informed with live 24/7 news from local, national and global news sources, including CNN, MSNBC, FOX News Radio, NPR and BBC.

‚Ä¢ Sports: Listen to your sports team wherever you go with local, national and global sports talk stations.

‚Ä¢ Music: Soundtrack your life with listening to exclusive music stations and channels, including Today's Hits, Classic Rock Hits and Country Roads.

‚Ä¢ Podcasts: We've got all your must listen podcasts right here.

‚Ä¢ Radio: Stream over 100,000 AM, FM and internet radio stations broadcasting from 197 countries.

GET THE FULL STREAMING EXPERIENCE.

When you sign up for TuneIn Premium, our optional monthly subscription service, you also get:

‚Ä¢ Commercial-Free News: The only place where you can listen to CNBC, CNN, FOX News Radio and MSNBC without commercials.

‚Ä¢ Commercial-Free Music: Jam out to nonstop songs without ever encountering an ad.

‚Ä¢ Less Ads: Enjoy more listening and fewer commercials across all 100,000 radio stations.


TOP 5 REASONS TO DOWNLOAD TUNEIN:

1. NEWS FROM ALL SIDES

Experience live 24/7 news from national and global sources like CNN, MSNBC, FOX News Radio, BBC, NPR, CNBC and Cheddar, along with local radio stations like KQED-FM, WNYC-FM, KCRW, WHYY, WTMJ and WAMU. You can even hear many of your favorite news shows as podcasts.

2. SPORTS TALK THAT MATTERS

Listen to your sports team wherever you go with local, national and global sports talk stations with live event streaming, pregame and postgame analysis, and team centric sports podcasts.

You can also stream live play-by-play of the biggest games from stations like ESPN Radio and talkSPORT, along with on-demand podcasts coverering your football, baseball, basketball and hockey obsession from every angle.

3. MUSIC FOR EVERY MOOD

Bounce between TuneIn's exclusive music stations curated for every mood, music taste and activity. Plus, keep discovering new songs with the best online AM/FM radio stations in the world, including WHUR-FM, 107.5 WBLS, WQXR-FM, 97.9 WSKQ-FM and Hot 97 WQHT-FM.

4. ALL YOUR FAVORITE PODCASTS

From trending chart-toppers to all-time favorites, follow classic podcasts shows like RadioLab, Stuff You Should Know and TED Radio Hour, and top-rated podcasts hits like The Joe Rogan Experience, NPR's Up First, NYT's The Daily, Wow in the World, and more.

5. LISTEN EVERYWHERE

In addition to the mobile and desktop app, TuneIn is available for free on hundreds of connected devices, including smart watches, CarPlay, Google Home, Amazon Echo and Alexa, Sonos, Bose, Roku, Chromecast and more.


Subscribe to TuneIn Radio Premium through the free app. If you choose to subscribe, you will be charged a monthly subscription fee according to your country. The subscription fee will be shown in the app before you complete the payment. Your subscription will automatically renew every month at the then-current subscription fee unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the then-current subscription period. Your Google account will automatically be charged within 24 hours prior to the end of the then-current period. The subscription fee will be charged monthly. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your Google account settings.

Privacy policy: http://tunein.com/policies/privacy/
Terms of use: http://tunein.com/policies/

TuneIn uses Nielsen measurement software which allows you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen‚Äôs TV Ratings. To learn more about Nielsen's products and your privacy, please visit http://www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information.
descriptionHTML:
FROM NOW ON, THIS IS RADIO.

TuneIn brings together live news, sports, music, podcasts and radio stations from around the world.

With live and on-demand audio from the voices you trust, on any device, you're never without something amazing to listen to.


ALL YOUR AUDIO IN ONE APP.

‚Ä¢ News: Listen to and stay informed with live 24/7 news from local, national and global news sources, including CNN, MSNBC, FOX News Radio, NPR and BBC.

‚Ä¢ Sports: Listen to your sports team wherever you go with local, national and global sports talk stations.

‚Ä¢ Music: Soundtrack your life with listening to exclusive music stations and channels, including Today's Hits, Classic Rock Hits and Country Roads.

‚Ä¢ Podcasts: We've got all your must listen podcasts right here.

‚Ä¢ Radio: Stream over 100,000 AM, FM and internet radio stations broadcasting from 197 countries.

GET THE FULL STREAMING EXPERIENCE.

When you sign up for TuneIn Premium, our optional monthly subscription service, you also get:

‚Ä¢ Commercial-Free News: The only place where you can listen to CNBC, CNN, FOX News Radio and MSNBC without commercials.

‚Ä¢ Commercial-Free Music: Jam out to nonstop songs without ever encountering an ad.

‚Ä¢ Less Ads: Enjoy more listening and fewer commercials across all 100,000 radio stations.


TOP 5 REASONS TO DOWNLOAD TUNEIN:

1. NEWS FROM ALL SIDES

Experience live 24/7 news from national and global sources like CNN, MSNBC, FOX News Radio, BBC, NPR, CNBC and Cheddar, along with local radio stations like KQED-FM, WNYC-FM, KCRW, WHYY, WTMJ and WAMU. You can even hear many of your favorite news shows as podcasts.

2. SPORTS TALK THAT MATTERS

Listen to your sports team wherever you go with local, national and global sports talk stations with live event streaming, pregame and postgame analysis, and team centric sports podcasts.

You can also stream live play-by-play of the biggest games from stations like ESPN Radio and talkSPORT, along with on-demand podcasts coverering your football, baseball, basketball and hockey obsession from every angle.

3. MUSIC FOR EVERY MOOD

Bounce between TuneIn's exclusive music stations curated for every mood, music taste and activity. Plus, keep discovering new songs with the best online AM/FM radio stations in the world, including WHUR-FM, 107.5 WBLS, WQXR-FM, 97.9 WSKQ-FM and Hot 97 WQHT-FM.

4. ALL YOUR FAVORITE PODCASTS

From trending chart-toppers to all-time favorites, follow classic podcasts shows like RadioLab, Stuff You Should Know and TED Radio Hour, and top-rated podcasts hits like The Joe Rogan Experience, NPR's Up First, NYT's The Daily, Wow in the World, and more.

5. LISTEN EVERYWHERE

In addition to the mobile and desktop app, TuneIn is available for free on hundreds of connected devices, including smart watches, CarPlay, Google Home, Amazon Echo and Alexa, Sonos, Bose, Roku, Chromecast and more.


Subscribe to TuneIn Radio Premium through the free app. If you choose to subscribe, you will be charged a monthly subscription fee according to your country. The subscription fee will be shown in the app before you complete the payment. Your subscription will automatically renew every month at the then-current subscription fee unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the then-current subscription period. Your Google account will automatically be charged within 24 hours prior to the end of the then-current period. The subscription fee will be charged monthly. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your Google account settings.

comments: Used to be 5 stars, but dropped 3 stars because of that annoying notification that never disappears. Killing the app temporarily kills this notification, but connecting a BT device makes it come back again. Been complaining about it for 6 months now. Support says they're aware of it and try to handle, but they don't, which is very lame. Think it's done on purpose.

Gteat selection of radio stations, but, the ads have become too much, especially the last update, 1 hour of talk radio, with 17 minutes of commercials, way too much!! I figured this out when I was listening to a shoe end at 6:17, and I started listening to it at 5. I understand that this program is ad supported, but seriously?? I am rolling back to versio. 13.3, way less commercials!

Nicely done, but one issue: even after I turn it off, TuneIn will still turn on at random times. Sometimes, it's when I get in the car and my phone establishes a Bluetooth connection. Other times, when I'm not doing anything special with Bluetooth or any streaming app. Fix that and it's five stars. OCT 2020: Still doing this. I don't use TuneIn every time I get in my car!

I would NEVER sign up for a free trial of premium right now as I'm struggling financially. Must be a 1 button sign up, because some how I accidently was signed up...of course didnt know it until a month later they hit my empty bank account for 100 dollars. I ask within a week for a refund as it was an honest mistake and my family needs this money right now and I'm told they will not issue me a refund because its past 48 hours. Really?! Thanks, cant pay bills but got premium radio! Aholes....

For weeks now, the app keeps stopping every few seconds to few minutes when casting to my Google Home. It just happened again as I was writing this review. I tried to submit a report through the app, but the email bounced. I primarily use the app for listening to news, and it's worthless when it goes out in the middle of a sentence. UPDATE: I think it's getting worst... It plays the commercials, then stops. If it actually ever plays the news, it only plays for a few seconds. Update: fixed.

title: Best Fiends - Free Puzzle Game
description:
Be the HERO of the story! Join over 100,000,000 people who are already playing this top rated FREE puzzle adventure! Solve thousands of fun puzzles, collect tons of cute characters, and beat the bad guys as you discover the magical world of Minutia in the award-winning, original BEST FIENDS game!

* SOLVE THOUSANDS OF FUN PUZZLES Enjoy casual levels that are easy to play but hard to master!
* COLLECT CUTE CHARACTERS Build a team, level them up, and discover their special powers!
* PLAY DAILY EVENTS Win something new every time you open the game!
* COMPETE AGAINST YOUR FACEBOOK FRIENDS Earn massive rewards!
* EXPLORE A WORLD ON YOUR MOBILE Immerse yourself in dazzling graphics and finger-tapping music!
* DISCOVER FEATURE-FILM QUALITY ANIMATIONS Watch awesome Best Fiends content!
* STAY TUNED Lookout for regular updates bringing new levels, characters, and surprises!

STORY:
The little creatures of Minutia lived in peace and harmony until the meteor smashed into Mount Boom, bringing with it a strange force that transformed the Slugs who lived there into an army of greedy, greenery-gobbling pests. Now, the Slugs are taking over the world, munching a path through Minutia and sliming up everything they touch!

But a brave band of heroes is fighting back! Left alone when the Slugs conquered most of Minutia, these unlikely champions are on an epic quest to solve the mystery of Mount Boom and beat back the Slug advance. 

To get to Mount Boom, they‚Äôll need to become‚Ä¶ the BEST FIENDS!

PLEASE NOTE! Best Fiends is completely free to download and play but some game items may be purchased for real money. To disable this, turn off the in-app purchases in your device‚Äôs settings.

Kaivokatu 10 A
00100 Helsinki
Finland
recentChanges:
PUMPKIN PICKING!
-Complete 30 Challenges and earn the fang-tastic Count Edward!
TRICK OR TREAT!
-Help Reapert with all tasks and he‚Äôll magically appear in your team to lurk there forever!
DAY OF THE DEAD!
-Finish 30 Adventures with Calavera Carmen and she‚Äôll join your team permanently.
NEW LEVELS EVERY WEEK!
-Stroll through the historic streets of Liberty Old Town with 10 NEW levels every Friday, Saturday, & Sunday!
comments: I think the developers are bored with this game. They seem to just be spewing out rehashes of levels and the only updates appear to be efforts to wind back rewards and get as much money as they can out out of players before they cut and run. From a good game to one of the most boring in a few updates. Got a few months free play then zip, uninstall. Don't bother, money grubbers. Not worth it.

I loved this game starting out but now that I'm in the 3000 plus levels I hardly win. The earthworm challenges are almost impossible to beat. Theres some fun little challenges but unless you can beat at least 10 levels you dont get the rewards. Be ready to spend a lot of money to buy gold to be able to beat levels. I've been playing since 2017 but I haven't hardly played in the last couple weeks. Probably gonna be uninstalling it very soon. Feels like more work than fun anymore

This game has become unplayable without buying gold. I'm on level 3650. You can spend hours doing one level which is boring. If they added one move each time you failed a level it wouldn't be too bad, but you have to fail numerous times before a move gets added. The league tables are a joke as well , instead of being called the "Championship of Great Britain" it should be called the "Championship of Who Can Afford the Most Gold". I used to love this game to the point of obsession, not now tho'.

It's a really fun, cute puzzler and the challenge is good. However I disagree with some of the micro transaction tactics. Constantly being left at the end of a level being 1 move short due to the RNG of the blocks dropping from the top where you need them to line up is very frustrating and you are tempted to buy extra moves with real money which I disagree with. The fiend styles are pretty cool though and are maybe worth buying to support the game. Not extra moves!

OMG, you keep changing how the game scores making it harder to earn points. Stop changing how points are earned. After 3 years of playing, I'm about to quit. I play games for fun and pleasure, not to be fustrated by playing a level repeatedly that can't be skipped. I'm going on a long break from this game. Hopefully you make it fun again when I come back. Also, File size is getting too big.

title: Photo Studio
description:
Photo Studio is a powerful multifunctional photo editing application for photographers of any level. It contains the vast editing kit of tools for basic and advanced retouching of your photos. Make each your shot a perfect complete art-work using a wide range of effects, filters, text editing and color enhancement tools and a lot of other ready-to-use features.

Main features:

1. More than 200 unique filters, amazing special effects, a big collection of picture-in-picture effects, rich set of various frames for any event of your life, huge amount of stickers, textures, shapes and correction tools ‚Äì lighting tune, color correction, sharpening, lens boost, tilt shift, blur and more.

2. Use manual correction tools to highlight, fix or improve any part or object on your photo. Use mask correction tool to apply filters, effects or tune your photo selectively.

3. Collage editor allows to combine several photos into amazingly looking photo collages with a wide variety of adjustable frames, shapes, customizable backgrounds, templates and stickers.

4. Magic tools comprising the following outstanding features:¬† Blend feature for combining of two images together using a big collection of masks, backgrounds and blend modes; Color Splash is aimed to highlight objects on a photo; Clone stamp is intended to copy objects, change or erase a background; Shapes editor helps to combine photos with multiple variations of shapes, textures and backgrounds. 

5. Impressive text editing tool is designed for creation of nice-looking messages on your photos with rich collection of customizable fonts, color, textures and shapes.

6. About 50 additional content packages expanding the photo editing process with new effects, frames, textures, fonts and templates. Our team's constantly working hard to implement new stunning features to gain the #1 photo editor title. 

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kvadgroup/
Facebook: http://facebook.com/kvadgroup
Twitter: http://twitter.com/kvadgroup
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMfsIMOqr-FKZnb6yQAltIA/videos

comments: I really like this editing app. It has lots of features and I have found it mostly easy to use. I have used other editing apps but always come back to this one. It would be a great feature in this app to be able to save, search, or favorite certain presets... like the preset texts. Overall, Great App. Good job. Plus, thanks for all the cool things available with this app for free.

This app is really easy to use, and has a lot of options to choose from when editing photos from various filters, to effects. There are so many things to do with this app, even with the free version. The only issue I have is sometimes a picture will become pixelated however majority of the time, the outcome is great. Definitely my favorite photo editing app

You can do alot of customisation and there are presets available for free which are enough to get you going, you can make realy nice edits with what's there you just need to get creative with it. and there aren't any ad pop-ups, insted they're on the side of your editor and don't get in the way of anything which is great. But most importantly you get full detail on the type of image you want to export and it gets saved in high quality. This is the best editor for free and highly recommend it!

App keeps crashing I have been using this app for a long time now, have had problems in the past but now it keeps crashing as soon as it's opens. So I uninstalled it and downloaded it again and it still keeps in crashing. I have purchased a LOT of effects, so I really need this to work. I gave 1 star because of this problem, if you can get this working for me I will upgrade the rating.

Bestest ever... Amazing app with ennumber of filters & effects. I've been using it for 3 years now and I love it! my all time favorite app. Easy to use and very impressive and the great part is that its almost add free. I strongly recommend it to everyone.

title: Wordscapes
description:
üíïPlaying Wordscapes 10 mins a day sharpens your mind and prepares you for your daily life and challenges! üíï

This text twist of a word game is tremendous brain challenging fun. Enjoy modern word puzzles with the best of word searching, anagrams, and crosswords! Immerse yourself into the beautiful scenery backgrounds to relax and ease your mind.

Challenge yourself to connect letters and find as many hidden words as you can! Unlock stunning landscape backgrounds to escape from home and relax your brain.

You‚Äôll never experience a dull moment after you try this addicting word puzzle game! Play this crossword puzzle once and just you won‚Äôt be able to put it down. Enjoy word connect and word find games? This is your final destination!

‚ñ∫Escape and relax your brain by visiting the beautiful destinations of Wordscapes!
‚ñ∫ Show your vocabulary power by connecting letters and finding all the hidden words.
‚ñ∫ Get your word hunt on with over 6,000 crossword puzzles!
‚ñ∫ Challenge your brain and vocabulary ‚Äì this crossword puzzle starts easy and becomes challenging fast!
‚ñ∫ Think you can beat these anagram word puzzles? They start simply but ramp up fast!
‚ñ∫ Take each level at your own pace with unlimited tries. Simply fun and relaxation!

Wordscapes is the word hunt game that over 10 million people just can't stop playing! It's a perfect fit for fans of crossword, word connect and word anagram games, combining best of word find games and crossword puzzles. Not to mention all the gorgeous landscapes you can visit to relax yourself!

The top-rated word game, from the makers of Word Stacks, Word Chums, Word Flowers, Word Mocha, Wordscapes Uncrossed, and Spell Blitz.

Terms of service: https://www.peoplefun.com/terms

comments: Fun game, but the tournaments and the teams ruin the whole thing. In order to place high in the tournaments, you have to spend practically entire weekends on the game because of the poor tournament design. It's also impossible to find an active team, but nobody will join a brand new team. The game should hide inactive teams. If the leader hasn't been on in a while, the team should no longer show up. The tournaments should be unique puzzles, not just how fast you can run through levels.

I love this game. However last week it started crashing every time I tried to open it. There were no updates available and I tried restarting my phone and nothing worked. I uninstalled and reinstalled the app because I didn't know what else to try and it works BUT I'M BACK AT LEVEL ONE!!! I have been playing this for years and was at level 1600 something!! Is there any way to restore at least some of the progress I had made??

Was a great game that I'd play every night to pass the time. Then suddenly the game would hang and freeze for no reason. So I uninstalled and installed the app again, only to discover that not only does it continue to hang and freeze, but now I lost all of my coins and helpers. I contacted support through the app a few days ago and still no response from them. Very frustrating.

The game is good. Only problem is that every other game, you get bombarded with adverts. Now I could let this slip by, if the adverts featured weren't the banned ads of Gardenscapes and Fishdom! While every other game has removed those ads, you've left them in. They were banned for a very specific reason, and that is false advertisement, which is a breach of the false advertising standards. When the ads are removed, I will consider upping my rating.

My longest played game. The visuals are soothing, and not too many ads to distract from the play. Mostly you play against yourself, then occasionally you get a tournament if you are feeling competitive. Very few repeated games, and I've played tons of them. The best thing about the game is the soothing photos though. Ty

title: Chime - Mobile Banking
description:
Welcome to banking made awesome. 

Chime is mobile and online banking with no hidden fees: get your paycheck up to 2 days early* with direct deposit, have fee-free overdraft when you‚Äôre in a pinch, grow your savings automatically, and manage your finances like a boss using the highly-rated Chime mobile banking app.

When you bank with Chime, you get a Visa¬Æ Debit Card, a Spending Account, and an optional Savings Account to help you save money. 

Applying for an account is free, takes less than 2 minutes and it won‚Äôt affect your credit score!

Here‚Äôs what our members love most about Chime:
‚Ä¢ Get your paycheck up to 2 days early* with direct deposit
‚Ä¢ Fee-free overdraft.** We‚Äôll spot you on debit card purchases with no overdraft fees. 
‚Ä¢ No hidden fees: no monthly fees, no overdraft fees, no foreign transaction fees, no minimum balance requirements 
‚Ä¢ Over 38,000 fee-free ATMs with Moneypass and Visa Plus Alliance
‚Ä¢ Real-time transaction notifications
‚Ä¢ Daily balance alerts
‚Ä¢ Block your card instantly in-app
‚Ä¢ Grow your savings automatically with our Savings Account
‚Ä¢ Send money instantly with Pay Friends to other Chime members. 
‚Ä¢ Deposit checks using Mobile Check Deposit for eligible members.^ 
‚Ä¢ Apple Pay‚Ñ¢ / Google Pay‚Ñ¢ for when you forget your wallet
‚Ä¢ Move money between your other bank accounts
‚Ä¢ EMV chip card security
‚Ä¢ Friendly and responsive customer support

With the Chime mobile banking app, you can stay in control of your money. Track your spending, link your other bank accounts, and save money.

How to switch banks:
‚Ä¢ Step 1: Open Your Account: Download the app and sign up. Once approved, we‚Äôll send you your Chime card within two weeks!
‚Ä¢ Step 2: Fund Your Account: Set up a direct deposit with your employer or payer to have funds deposited to your Chime account every payday. You can also connect other bank accounts and transfer funds from your existing bank account.
‚Ä¢ Step 3: Update Bill Payments: Activate your card when it arrives, add it to Apple Pay, and set up recurring bill payments with your Chime card number or with your Chime Spending Account and routing numbers.

‚Ä®For more information please visit www.chime.com.

***Learn how we collect and use your information by visiting our Privacy Policy at https://www.chimebank.com/policies/chime/privacy-policy/.***

Banking services provided by, and debit card issued by, The Bancorp Bank, or Stride Bank, N.A., Members FDIC, pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. Debit card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

*Early access to direct deposit funds depends on the timing of payer‚Äôs submission of deposits. We generally post such deposits on the day they are received which may be up to 2 days earlier than the payer‚Äôs scheduled payment date.
**Chime SpotMe is an optional, no fee service that requires that you receive $500 in direct deposit a month to qualify to overdraw your account up to $20 on debit card purchases. Chime, in its sole discretion, may allow you to withdraw your account up to $100 or more based on your Chime Account history, direct deposit history and amount, spending activity and other risk-based factors. Your Limit will be displayed to you within the Chime mobile app. You will receive notice of any changes to your Limit. Your Limit may be increased or lowered at any time by Chime.
^Not all new or existing customers are eligible to use Mobile Deposit. There are qualifications and enrollment requirements for participation in Mobile Deposit, and we reserve the right to change the qualification and enrollment requirements in our sole discretion at any time without prior notice. We may require you to upload a picture of your driver‚Äôs license or other identifying documents prior to using Mobile Deposit. Eligibility requirements can be found online after you have signed into your Spending Account.

‚Ä¢ Over 38,000 fee-free ATMs with Moneypass and Visa Plus Alliance
‚Ä¢ Real-time transaction notifications
‚Ä¢ Daily balance alerts
‚Ä¢ Block your card instantly in-app
‚Ä¢ Grow your savings automatically with our Savings Account
‚Ä¢ Send money instantly with Pay Friends to other Chime members.
‚Ä¢ Deposit checks using Mobile Check Deposit for eligible members.^
‚Ä¢ Apple Pay‚Ñ¢ / Google Pay‚Ñ¢ for when you forget your wallet
‚Ä¢ Move money between your other bank accounts
‚Ä¢ EMV chip card security
‚Ä¢ Friendly and responsive customer support

With the Chime mobile banking app, you can stay in control of your money. Track your spending, link your other bank accounts, and save money.

How to switch banks:
‚Ä¢ Step 1: Open Your Account: Download the app and sign up. Once approved, we‚Äôll send you your Chime card within two weeks!
‚Ä¢ Step 2: Fund Your Account: Set up a direct deposit with your employer or payer to have funds deposited to your Chime account every payday. You can also connect other bank accounts and transfer funds from your existing bank account.
‚Ä¢ Step 3: Update Bill Payments: Activate your card when it arrives, add it to Apple Pay, and set up recurring bill payments with your Chime card number or with your Chime Spending Account and routing numbers.

‚Ä®For more information please visit www.chime.com.

***Learn how we collect and use your information by visiting our Privacy Policy at https://www.chimebank.com/policies/chime/privacy-policy/.***

Banking services provided by, and debit card issued by, The Bancorp Bank, or Stride Bank, N.A., Members FDIC, pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. Debit card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

*Early access to direct deposit funds depends on the timing of payer‚Äôs submission of deposits. We generally post such deposits on the day they are received which may be up to 2 days earlier than the payer‚Äôs scheduled payment date.
**Chime SpotMe is an optional, no fee service that requires that you receive $500 in direct deposit a month to qualify to overdraw your account up to $20 on debit card purchases. Chime, in its sole discretion, may allow you to withdraw your account up to $100 or more based on your Chime Account history, direct deposit history and amount, spending activity and other risk-based factors. Your Limit will be displayed to you within the Chime mobile app. You will receive notice of any changes to your Limit. Your Limit may be increased or lowered at any time by Chime.
^Not all new or existing customers are eligible to use Mobile Deposit. There are qualifications and enrollment requirements for participation in Mobile Deposit, and we reserve the right to change the qualification and enrollment requirements in our sole discretion at any time without prior notice. We may require you to upload a picture of your driver‚Äôs license or other identifying documents prior to using Mobile Deposit. Eligibility requirements can be found online after you have signed into your Spending Account.
summary: Banking with no hidden fees, fee-free overdraft, and early direct deposit.
recentChanges: Happy Halloween! If you're not out trick or treating, you can have fun reading up on our latest release notes. Instead of leaving you with some tricks, we're leaving a few treats in the form of bug fixes.
comments: amazing bank. love the instant notifications and easy direct deposits. very simple to use. Update: 10/20 Go with a real bank. This bank enjoys doing random maintenance on all accounts. Completely disabling your account for DAYS at a time. So far my account has been disabled for 2 days. There's plenty of money in my account, I just can't use any of it. Dropped to 3 stars simply because it's a free bank account. That's the only good thing about Chime. Its free. They just control your money.

My experience with Chime overall has been a great one. Instead of getting paid on Fridays, I get paid on Wednesdays every week via direct deposit. Two days early! Chime also offers the SpotMe feature, which is basically overdraft protection with no fees. Another cool feature for this being a virtual bank, is you have the option to set up a Secured Credit Builder Card with no pre-set credit limit, up to $10,000. I'm on the waitlist right now, but from what I read, it sounds very helpful!

More honest review today, today marks the third time in two months that time bank has frozen, has had technical difficulties and has no one available to up to talk to customers for hours on end. Now yes time is convenient, but there are other cards like it on the market. Which I am now starting to look into, as well as brick and mortar building type banks because unfortunately I can't let this keep happening especially not during the holiday season.

I have had this mobile banking app for over 6 years and haven't had any problems but recently their have been outages causing the app to be unavailable and my money unusable! I'm extremely furious that they can't keep their app working properly so I can use MY MONEY! Currently waiting for the app to be available so I can take my money and go to another bank! This is outrageous and you get no compensation for the late payments or overall difficulty of not being able to use YOUR MONEY!

I would be rating this higher, but for some reason I am not being shown a history of my purchases on the app. My girlfriend doesn't seem to be having this issue, only me. I have double checked to ensure that I have the most recent update, which I do. I cannot determine the cause for this. Any advice or assistance would be appreciated. The 'support bot' has not been any help at all. Thanks.

title: Lyft - Rideshare, Bikes, Scooters & Transit
description:
Count on Lyft to take you wherever you need to to go. Got an early flight? Need to get to the office to prep for the morning meeting? We‚Äôll match you with a driver, help you find the quickest bus route, or show you the nearest scooter ‚Äî you‚Äôll be on your way in minutes.  If it gets you there, it‚Äôs in the app. 

Save time (and your sanity)
We‚Äôll match you with a driver in seconds.  Your time is your money ‚Äî having to tackle traffic and hunt for parking is a total pain. With Lyft, you can just sit back and relax.

You‚Äôve got options
Choose from 9 different ways to go*, they‚Äôre all available right from your app. Whether you‚Äôre looking for an affordable ride, the most direct route, or a way to treat your crew ‚Äî we‚Äôve got the mode to suit your needs and mood.

Adventure all day and night
Have peace of mind knowing you can always request a Lyft ride 24/7 ‚Äî and share your route with friends. Our Community Safety Program is designed to bring our riders and drivers greater protection ‚Äî from in-person trainings to in-app features.

* Lyft ride types may vary by region. Check the app to see what is available in your city.

recentChanges: Thanks for choosing Lyft! To make your rides even better, we update the app regularly. It‚Äôs like housekeeping: squashing bugs, cleaning up code, and other small-but-mighty improvements.
comments: I have been trying to use my lyft account for about 2 years. When I type in my debit/credit it doesn't not accept it error when I have triple checked it and still won't take it. I typed it in right. It pretty frustrating when you need a ride and can't even access your lyft account for a ride. This has been going of for 2 years now.

Up until tonight Ive loved the app, but as of tonight it charges me for the ride but after I go and order it it just goes back to the select destination screen it doesn't look for a car then it tells me I found a car and be ready in 18 minutes but there's no trace of it inside the app I don't know what's going on right now, I'm very disappointed and kind of stranded not because of this possibly unless this guy just shows up mysteriously in 18 minutes I have no clue if he's going to or not

I have had an account for years but have not used it since 2015. I moved to a new state recently and had re-download lyft and tried to attach my payment methods. I tried to attach every option that is offered and the app wouldn't let me. I even Uninstalled and reinstalled several times. There's is no proper customer service set up. I finally found a number that would keep me on hold then eventually hang up. This is why I prefer uber, I never have these problems with them.

Changed my address a week before downloading. My card didnt match my new address when adding it yet. Understandable. But now that my address is up to date, i still have to use a completely different card. I contacted support who told me my card wasnt working or they dont accept it _. I tried explaining it was my address, they sent me to a link that told me I need to use a new card. Its just very frustdrating. I gave it two stars because the drivers are always awesome and the prices are fair.

Terrible. Added my credit card a day prior and thought it was set to go. Now I request a ride and they want a second credit card that has matching address, provided this unnecessary info and rejected because could not validate, your problem not mine. Dishonest, unreliable, do not use if your ride is a necessity. Unbelievable. 0 stars if I could

title: Idle Miner Tycoon - Mine Manager Simulator
description:
Have you ever wondered how to be an effective mine manager millionaire? Become an industrial tycoon by managing your mine and idle profit, and earn enough money to become rich!
Expand your millionaire mining empire and give your productivity a boost with specialized miner managers who will automate the workflow of your mine! Take on this challenge and discover the manager strategy to invest in and earn as much cash as possible in this simulator - online and offline! Strike gold now! This is not a clicker game, and there's no need for endless tapping like those other online clicker simulators.

Idle Miner Tycoon is a simulation game that mixes mining management with money investment to gain profit and become a famous rich millionaire. The aim of this miner strategy simulator is to build and optimize resources to gain as much productivity and idle benefits as possible: With the income you make from the mine, you will have to hire and pay managers and miners, upgrade your mines and mining buildings and equipment as well as optimize your workflow for the perfect timing of the whole mining and management process. What makes this different from the other idle games is that you can become a mine manager tycoon capitalist, build a millionaire empire, and earn profit by optimizing the mine workflow in this manager game like in an online clicker simulator. Gain some revenue and invest now in this miner manager simulator until you become a rich tycoon full of wealth and gold! Enjoy in this Tycoon games!

IDLE MINER TYCOON SIMULATOR
‚òÖ Automate your mining workflow to increase your idle income: No need to tap and tap like in an online casual clicker simulator!
‚òÖ Get idle cash and earn money & gold: Continue the business even when you are offline!
‚òÖ Profit from a smart money investment or two to boost your economy, win rewards and become rich! You'll be a millionaire!
‚òÖ Hire managers to increase your miners‚Äô motivation! Enjoy in this simulator among manager games.
‚òÖ Every manager has a special tycoon booster: Increase worker productivity!
‚òÖ Build up your idle billionaire empire simulation!
‚òÖ Manage more than 20 cool mines like a real boss: Become a mining tycoon magnate by managing this mine business simulator!
‚òÖ Mine for more than 15 different resources: coal, gold, ruby, moonstone, amethyst, crystal, and jade, making this game different than all of the other idle games.
‚òÖ Collect masses of coal and gold in this money and mine management simulator! It's not like other money games!
‚òÖ Increase your money online or offline in this tycoon games!
‚òÖ Climb and clash in the leaderboard and become the richest industrial manager tycoon in this idle miner simulation! No mindless tapping like the other online clicker games.

Seize the chance to become a miner tycoon billionaire by automating the mine workflow simulation of your magnate business without needing to tap constantly. Get rich, purchase new mines and buy buildings, invest cash and gold, and become the greatest mine manager tycoon ever in this mining strategy simulator! No need to tap like the online clicker simulators or tap games! Try this money games and manager games!
Gain some revenue and invest now in this miner manager simulator. Dig out the gold and become rich without endless clicking! Become a millionaire! Welcome to this Miner Tycoon game - not like the other idle games!

Like Idle Miner Tycoon on Facebook! ‚úîÔ∏è

‚Äì We are always happy to receive our players‚Äô feedback!

comments: I've played this for about a year. It's very addictive. Only reason I will not give 5 stars is because of the adverts. Although this game does not thrust adverts at you after every level like some games do, you can optionally watch an advert to get a boost. Only problem is with some adverts they start forcing you to install another app/game, or sometimes the adverts freeze, or sometimes they cause the game to restart, they have even caused the phone to reboot. This is not good.

Been playing this game for a couple of years now. I like how the daily rewards don't reset if you miss a day. I love that there is always something to do. Standard mines, event mines and the mainland. It would be nice if the prestige for the standard mines wasn't so expensive. I've only managed to prestige 2 mines in 2 years although I do spend most of my time on the event mines to be fair. Nice game to spend some time on. I like how you can upgrade your miners too.

The game is fun enough, but I gave it 1 star for two main reasons. The game has recently started asking me to rate it at _least_ once a day. This is incredibly annoying, but here's your review. The other reason is that I was just offered the "no-ads" offer for $15, and coincidentally the game now freezes nearly every time I click on an ad for a boost. I keep having to exit the game, try to watch an ad again and hope maybe it works. I feel like maybe the two things are related. ETA: I did email.

great little clicker, perfect for when you have a few minutes to spare, fast user interface and heaps of things to do, lots of freebies and a steady (if not a little slow) way to make premium credits however some of the in game purchases are fairly expensive, but honestly they're not necessary to progress in the game.

The game is designed to kill time, it does that. Puzzles are my favorite, but when I'm on hold and still have to pay attention to my world this kills the time. Don't expect to be grabbed by how in depth or awesome this game isn't. Just click to fidget. Do I love it, no. Does it work as planned, yup.

title: iHeartRadio: Radio, Podcasts & Music On Demand
description:
Your Music, Your Stations, And #1 For Podcasts. All Free.

Stream unlimited music, thousands of live radio stations, podcasts and playlists for any mood or activity, all in one app. The iHeartRadio app for Android Phone and Tablet is easy to use and best of all, it's FREE.
 
Download the iHeartRadio Android app today and start listening to your favorite live radio stations, podcasts and music playlists!


The Best Live & Local Radio Stations
‚Ä¢ Discover thousands of local AM and FM radio stations live near you and from cities across the globe.
‚Ä¢ Our Radio App allows you to tune in to top radio stations, music, breaking news, sports, talk and comedy radio shows.
‚Ä¢ Hear sports radio stations like ESPN Radio, Fox Sports Radio, FNTSY Sports Radio, and more.
‚Ä¢ Listen to top sports personalities discuss the latest news around the NFL, MLB, NBA, NHL, NCAA, Soccer, Golf, and Tennis.

The iHeartRadio Podcast App - now #1 for Podcasts
‚Ä¢ Our Podcast App features the most popular podcasts from NPR, Gimlet, How Stuff Works, ESPN Podcasts, Big Money Players Network, TED, Wondery, and from popular personalities like The Ron Burgundy Podcast, Anna Faris Is Unqualified Podcast, The Herd with Colin Cowherd Podcast, The Joe Rogan Podcast, Ben Shapiro Podcast, Bobby Bones Podcast, Armchair Expert with Dax Shepard, Chelsea Handler Podcast, and more.
‚Ä¢ Follow your favorite podcasts and download podcast episodes to your Android device to listen offline, without the need for WiFi.
‚Ä¢ Explore popular and trending shows with our iHeartRadio Podcast App charts. The Top 100 Chart refreshes every Monday.
‚Ä¢ Our podcast app and podcast player allow you to experience podcast playback at your desired speed of 0.5x, 1x, 1.25x, 1.5x, and 2x.


Free Music Playlists - perfect for any moment
‚Ä¢ Listen to thousands of hand curated song playlists on the free iHeartRadio Playlist App. Organized by mood, activity, decade and genre to make it easy to find something that‚Äôs the perfect soundtrack for any moment.
‚Ä¢ Enjoy the sound of 'Your Weekly Mixtape' - music discovery made easy. A weekly playlist of songs we‚Äôve curated based on the music you love and the music you‚Äôre listening to right now. We‚Äôll refresh your mixtape every Monday with a new batch of tracks we know you‚Äôll vibe to throughout your week.
‚Ä¢ Explore our Cloud based audio options directly from your phone.

Play Free Artist Radio Stations
‚Ä¢ Use our library of millions of songs to create personalized music stations based on your favorite artists and  genres like Country, Top 40, Pop, Hip Hop, R&B, EDM, Rock, Alternative, Classical, Indie, Folk, Gospel, Christian, Dance, and more.


The Ultimate Station Made Just for You
‚Ä¢ 'My Favorites Radio' collects all of the songs you love in one free personalized station.

Premium Features
Listen absolutely free with ads, or take control of your listening experience with iHeartRadio Plus‚Ñ¢ and iHeartRadio All Access‚Ñ¢.
‚Ä¢ Search and play any song, album and playlist with our library of millions of songs on demand
‚Ä¢ Save and replay any song with our music app from the radio
‚Ä¢ Enjoy unlimited skips
‚Ä¢ Download music to your Android Phone or Tablet to listen offline from Google Play
‚Ä¢ Create unlimited music hits playlists

Join our community!
‚Ä¢ Facebook: http://on.fb.me/1F1TcFX
‚Ä¢ Instagram: http://bit.ly/1e1AOUS
‚Ä¢ Twitter: http://bit.ly/1HZk5KQ
‚Ä¢ Blog: http://bit.ly/1GiT59D

For Feedback and Help
Tell us how we can improve by sharing your thoughts at https://help.iheart.com


iheart.com/terms
iheart.com/privacy

¬© 2019 iHeartMedia, Inc.

recentChanges:
Thank you for choosing iHeartRadio. We update our app regularly to improve your experience and make it faster and more reliable, as well as bringing diverse radio stations, new and popular podcasts and music. This update includes:
* Listen to what your favorite stations love. Radio Stations can now build their own playlists or promote their favorite playlist on their Live Station Profile page.

comments: The app works most of the time but does get hung on occasion. The worst part is that even though it recovers, every time it happens it replays extra commercials instead of continuing the audio stream. I did read response from the author, and brief connection interruptions may be occurring. The interruptions occur most frequently during a popular segment so might be backend. My main point still stands, a less than 2 sec interruption should not have the app replay extra ad, just recover stream.

This app doesn't work at all. It keeps on giving me a message saying try again later. This was my very first time installing this app. I tried to purchased the "All Access" version, but I kept on getting a message that said try again later. So this is the reason I gave it one star. I wished I couldn't get it no stars. Fix asap!

I use the app a lot and have enjoyed it for many years. One of the stations I enjoy listening to is The Tchaikovsky Large Symphony Orchestra. It used to be amazing and play a great variety of classical composers. Lately, it has started playing a lot of other genres, like classic rock, Lynard Skynard, rap, Snoop Dog and Dr Dre, and country, Johnny Cash, just to name a few. I believe someone adjusted the algorithm, it would be great of it could be fixed.

The version on device is up to date. The device is less than a year old. It crashes often - like just stops in middle of broadcast. Often cuts top of the hour news short - usually during the weather it just jumps to a commercial. Constantly asks user to upgrade to premium. Since this review originally posted, it has crashed about a half dozen times. All these problems are relatively new. Needs quite a bit of improvement.

app is good but avoiding the subscription pop up is annoying and video ads playing 30 secs every time you switch stations is a bit much. Ads already play on the stations so it's overwhelming and is much less enjoyable than listening to a podcast show on other apps. I only use free versions of news and talk apps. I'll use more if app becomes better.

title: Two Dots

comments: My favorite game, I literally deleted my other games because this is the only one I play now, I love it so much. Everything from how positive it is, to the perfectly fitting audio that plays. I love how simple and easy going this game is and I love how this games helps you succeed. The levels where you can locate items are super fun as well, recommending this game to everyone I know literally!!

Caution. This game is really nicely crafted, very visually rich, and enjoyable to play from levels 1-10. After this, things start to go absolutely mental. There is pop-up after pop-up, harassing you about another new feature. You quickly get to a point where you're bamboozled - everything on the screen is shouting at you. This appears to be by design, hyper confusion and attention hijacking to nurture addiction. This app is nefarious and should be enjoyed only with huge restraint.

Never log into Facebook. It causes you to lose the prizes from any contest you won. I had tons of things coming from a dots race and they vanished the second it connected to Facebook. Also, the game freezes and crashes a lot when watching videos to get a bonus box. You have to be patient when you open the app. It can take over five minutes to come up.

Honestly was obsessed with this game for awhile, but they made a bunch of updates and now every time you view the map about four or five different windows pop up to tell you about the different games. It used to just be the daily bonus. Tired of exiting out of a bunch of stupid notifications just to be able to click on the game I want. They ruined a good thing.

You get to a certain point and you can't win anything without spending money. With prices on everything else in life steadily increasing the last thing I wanna spend money on is a silly phone game. If you could just spend money once or twice, maybe no big deal. But you have to constantly spend money to get perks to help you thru the levels and clearly this is by design. It's a really cool game, and very disappointing to have to delete, but I'm just not up for money hungry games like this.

title: Zillow: Find Houses for Sale & Apartments for Rent
description:
Take control of your next move with the Zillow app. Our best-in-class features help you unlock life‚Äôs next chapter by getting into a home you love. 

BUY A HOME ‚Äì Find your place with immersive photos, virtual tours, and the most listings, including things you won‚Äôt find anywhere else.

SELL A HOME ‚Äì Whether you sell directly to Zillow with Zillow Offers‚Ñ¢ or take a traditional approach, we‚Äôll help you navigate the path to a successful sale.

RENT A HOME ‚Äì From shopping on the largest rental network to automating applications, we‚Äôve created a seamless online experience for renters.

The Zillow app gives you resources and tools you won‚Äôt find anywhere else, so you can shop smarter for your next home:

‚Ä¢ The most listings and constant updates so you never miss out¬π
‚Ä¢ 3D Home Tours so you can picture yourself in a home and narrow down which houses to visit in person 
‚Ä¢ Self Tour for Zillow-owned homes, with no appointment and no pressure. Stop by when it‚Äôs convenient and unlock the door with the app
‚Ä¢ Zestimate¬Æ, the industry-leading independent home valuation tool, calculated daily
‚Ä¢ Robust filters for school districts, views, pricing, pets, HOAs, and more
‚Ä¢ Easier co-shopping: Tag your favorite home features and share your favorites to coordinate your search with a partner or roommate
‚Ä¢ Push notifications to let you know when houses come to market, have a sale pending, or drop in price 
‚Ä¢ Neighborhood details including restaurants, grocery stores, parks, and coffee shops
‚Ä¢ Easy access to Zillow Premier Agents, local real estate experts who meet Zillow‚Äôs bar for quality customer service
‚Ä¢ All the pricing and details you need to compare homes & apartments for rent 
‚Ä¢ A personal renter profile so you can visit a house rental and engage directly with potential landlords and property managers who rent homes

1. Most listing based on direct site comparisons

comments: Its ok. Its best for home window shopping. If you're seriously looking, it's less convenient. It assumes how much you're going to put down and what interest rate you've been approved for. There's no way to set those things so it gives you a more accurate idea of what you're paying each month. Plus, in my area theres a lot of 55+ communities and theres no way to filter those out, which is irritating.

I like this app, overall, but would really love to have the ability to hide or dismiss a property from my search, if it's not one that meets my needs. I like that I can save homes, but when searching later, homes keep popping up that I would rather not look at again! Also, if there is a way to get HOA/Space rent to be mandatory when there is one for the property, that would be great. I've looked at many that stated there was none, but that wasn't true. Thanks!

Zillow gave the option to turn off cookies, but did not bother to mention that it will erase all of your data when you do this. I went ahead and typed everything in once again, and it erased it AGAIN. Also, you can't add photos, videos, or tours with any Android phone -only i0s I want to know what kind of incentive apple is giving developers to leave these flaws in their designs..

I use this app almost daily, it keeps me up to date on homes that I am very interested in. We will be buying or building in the next 5 months, we are looking forward to building or buying our dream home. I love Zillow, I have found it to be more up to date than a Real Estate office. I highly recommend Zillow. Thank you, carolintallahassee

While the interface is the best I've seen out of all the other real estate options, the information is not accurate or up to date. If you try to get information from the listing agent on the app, a third party starts messaging you and sending your information to unrelated agents. I simply messaged asking about an open house and some random dude was trying to get me a new buyer's agent even though I already have one.

comments: It has everything I want to watch from Disney! I love it sooo much. I had this service since Day 1 and there used to be multiple issues but now it has been a year and it is perfect, no issues whatsoever. I do wish the algorithm for movies recommended to you were on the level that Netflix and Amazon Prime Video has, but I'm sure that will be more finetuned in the future. Overall, I'm very happy with this app and service, and will continue its patronage into the foreseeable future.

Slow. Doesn't load. Says it's my internet but all my other streaming services work great. Hulu, Amazon, Netflix. Wish they would work on that. Also not everything comes up on my watchlist that I have saved. If I manually look for it. It shows in my watchlist but when I go to my watchlist. It isn't there. Downloaded movie to watch on the plane. Didn't work. I like the old Disney movies but not all of them are on here. They say they switch them up but never do.

The app worked great for the first 10 months but over the last month when we're at home watching a movie, the movie will freeze up and then the app will reset. After that, we have to navigate back to the movie. UPDATE.. PLEASE FIX THIS F@UCKING APP! We're paying for a monthly service in which we can't even watch the programing. A corporation like Disney should have a flawless app. The app was perfect and now it sucks.

I love watching my favorite shows on here, but this only works on my laptop and will not work on my phone. I have tried everything to get it to work and the only thing that keeps coming up when I try to watch something is "sorry cannot play if error keeps happening please contact disney support with code 39". But like I said works perfectly fine on my computer. I want to watch it on my phone as well, please fix the problem!

This app is pretty good I have enjoyed it so far. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is the app runs a slow sometimes but that could be on my end so I wouldn't take that into consideration too much. I also like the shows that are on there now but I was watching the marvel movies and they don't have Spiderman or The Hulk which isn't that big of a deal but if you wanted to watch those you would need another app +subscription. Overall its a good app and is cheap compared to other streaming services.

title: The New York Times
description:
Understand the world through award-winning independent journalism, expert reporting and multimedia storytelling with the NYTimes app.

Favorite Features:

‚Ä¢ A redesigned Top Stories provides a more consistent experience across all our apps and  website. Our new home page groups similar stories together so you can easily return to sections that interest you.
‚Ä¢ Breaking News alerts that link directly to developing stories.
‚Ä¢ Save articles for offline reading on any device.
‚Ä¢ Share articles, photos and videos through your favorite sharing platform.
‚Ä¢ Watch exclusive videos and browse our award-winning photography.
‚Ä¢ Experience NYT stories through innovative formats, like augmented reality and 360¬∫ video.
‚Ä¢ International coverage of current events and cultural stories from our 50 bureaus around the globe.
‚Ä¢ Podcasts: Listen to audio series including ‚ÄúThe Daily‚Äù and ‚ÄúModern Love.‚Äù
‚Ä¢ The Mini Crossword: Enjoy wordplay every day with the daily mini puzzle.
‚Ä¢ Read our Spanish-language coverage with NYT en Espa√±ol.
‚Ä¢ Reading at night? Turn on our experimental Night Mode for a dark-friendly app theme.

The NYTimes app for Android is built responsively and is formatted from 4" phones to 12"+ tablets. The app works on all devices running Android OS (5.0+).

The New York Times offers the following subscription options: 

‚Ä¢ Basic Digital Access, which includes unlimited article access. Cancel anytime.
‚Ä¢ All Digital Access: Basic + access to The New York Times Crossword and NYT Cooking. You also receive one bonus subscription to give to anyone you‚Äôd like. Cancel anytime.

The NYTimes app requires certain permissions to provide you with the best possible reading experience. Here‚Äôs a little bit about what each one does:
‚Ä¢ In-app purchases: This allows you to make purchases within the app.
‚Ä¢ Location: In exchange for the free content provided through the NYTimes app, we compile demographic information about our readers in accordance with our Privacy Policy. This information is no more specific than the state in which you are located.
‚Ä¢ Photos/Media/Files: This permission allows the app to cache images locally, reducing load times for pages you revisit.
‚Ä¢ Wi-Fi connection information: This item gives the app permission to use available Wi-Fi networks rather than your mobile network. In the absence of trusted Wi-Fi networks or if Wi-Fi is disabled, the app will make use of your cellular network (if available). Normal bandwidth and usage charges apply as detailed in your service agreement with your wireless carrier.


Privacy Policy: https://www.nytimes.com/content/help/rights/privacy/policy/privacy-policy.html
Terms of Service: https://www.nytimes.com/content/help/rights/terms/terms-of-service.html
California Notices: http://www.nytimes.com/privacy/california-notice

As of version 9.18 of the app will save and honor your privacy preferences across devices when logged in to a New York Times account

Feedback? Suggestions? Issues? Please contact our support team at android@nytimes.com. We‚Äôll do our best to assist you. Your feedback is important to us.

comments: This isn't supposed to be a review of the news itself. The app works well for the most part, but does have bugs loading images and sections when in landscape on my tablet (i.e. it won't load some randomly but does load others). I would also love something like "Download print issue" where you could digitally see exactly what the print newspaper looked like that day, which is a feature for some other papers. Overall, it's a good app, but it does need some improvements.

I love the app interface on my cell phone. Home page is basically just stacked articles w/o any real organization, but every article has a byline and they squeeze a lot of pictures and graphics on the homepage. Still, somehow they make it look very clean. It does lead to more scrolling than most other news apps, but I think the trade-off is worthwhile. And content aggregation is quite good. This is definitely my go-to news app, even over multi-source aggregators. What keeps this from being a five-star review is notifications. Frequency and importance are fine, but often when you expand the notifications they will all (or mostly) be duplicates, even when unexpanded they are different articles. Occasionally the notifications will point to different articles. This used to be a much larger issue, while this has been fixed for the most part it still happens on occasion. I'd also like the search to be included on the main page action bar. But if they fix the notification thing I'll update to five stars.

Love the journalists but hate the app. They put up notifications with interesting leads, but when l click on the notice I am sent to an entirely unrelated story. Of course by then the notification that peaked my interest is gone. The only way to find the story is to locate search (which is buried) and then remember some key words from the notification. Washington Post does not have this problem. Why can't the Times get it right?

App performance issues have improved over the last year or so. But is this app actively under development? I don't see many new features. One request: Night mode has to be manually turned on and off. Can this be done automatically, similarly to the Android system feature that can detect when it's nighttime?

Love this app & The N Y Times. Keep it going. The apps are a fantastic addition to newspapers and may be their salvation. We cannot allow the newspaper industry to die. TV is fine but deep insights can only be gained from quality journalism. Were key newspapers to disappear then very soon the quality of TV journalism would plunge and become less than worthless.

title: The Survival Hunter Games 2
description:
The game comes fully loaded with amazing features! Our new game interface is extremely user friendly, and boasts easy to play touch screen controls that allow you to effortlessly run, jump, sprint, reload, aim, shoot and more! 

The new menu screen includes map style level select and settings screen. Gain game insight in between maps during loading with tip screens, and begin each game with mission style instructions! Before you begin your first level, you can watch a short video ad in order to earn a power up. You may opt not to watch, but you'll lose out on the advantage. 

As soon as the game begins, a timer will begin to count down. If you are able to beat the level quickly enough, you will earn a permanent weapon, which can be used in all other levels! If you do not beat the clock, you can still advance through the game, just without the permanent weapon. 

Fight stronger, more intelligent enemies, who make this game an intense battle of wit, stealth and skill! Enjoy hand-to-hand combat and precision aiming to take down enemies. Collect your blocky weapons and get ready to aim and shoot!!

Features:
-User friendly interface with touch pad controls
-Timers
-Power-ups
-Ammo and weapon collection
-Jump, aim and run
-Mini-map to spot your dangerous foes
-Mission orders
-Hand-to-hand combat

title: Summoners War
description:
An action-packed fantasy RPG with over 100 million Summoners around the world!

Jump into the Sky Arena, a world under battle over the vital resource: Mana Crystals.
Summon over 1,000 different types of monsters to compete for victory in the Sky Arena.

Assemble the greatest team of monsters for strategic victories!

Summoners War: Sky Arena

https://www.facebook.com/SummonersWarCom2us/

***

[Strategic Gameplay]
Witness the dazzling display of each Monster's unique skills.
21 different Rune sets to pick and choose additional abilities for your monsters!
Come up with the best strategy to win battles.

[Endless Fun]
Decorate your Village, battle other summoners, explore Dungeons, fight in PvP battles, expand your Collection, train Monsters, and more.

Fire, Water, Wind, Light and Dark!
5 different attributes, and 1000 different monsters!

You can Evolve the skill of your choice with this special Monster.
Summon Homunculus and show off your strategy.

You can Craft more than 100 items at the new Craft Building!
Craft High Runes, special Buildings, Statues and more with the new Craft System and install them wherever you want.

[World Arena]
Enjoy a real-time battle with users worldwide!
Experience a breathtaking battle that starts from Pick&Ban!
Reveal your unique strategy to the world!

[Guild Content]
A sensational Guild PvP in the Isle of Conquest!
Explore the Tartarus' Labyrinth with Guild Members.
Make your Guild the greatest of all.

recentChanges:

- New mode added to the Trial of Ascension

Got feedback? Leave a review or visit http://customer-m.withhive.com/ask and drop us a line!
comments: I've been playing this game on and off for 3 years, and this is the first time I've ever had issues getting onto the game. Lately, the game opens up in portrait mode. Nothing is accessible in portrait. My phone doesn't lock in portrait. I click, rotate my phone to landscape, opens in portrait, and I force close, just to open back in portrait. 9 tries in a row.. all portrait. I've held my phone in portrait mode multiple times this year, and it would always open game in landscape...till now.

I love this game so much. Its so fun and you something to do pretty much everyday. The monsters are so adorable and I love the feeling I get when I summon a monster I have been wanting for awhile. I recommend this game as it has kept me coming back and all the events are so amazing. Summoners has got to be my favorite mobile game out there!

Nostalgia. Played for 2 years since beginning. Coming back after 2016 because of lockdown. So many memories. Would really appreciate if the battle slow-mo animations could be manually turned off. For someone who's working and has limited time to play, it would be a great thing as it will enable one to progress and make it possible for one to spend all arena points, dimensional energy in that time. That's my one and only wish for the game. Edit: Auto farm has made a good game many times better.

I had originally rated this game as 5* however i now feel this to be too high. The game overal is great but certain things let it down: Summon rates too low; Violent Rune procs destroy the game; The recent Street Fighter event was nice however i got every Street Fighter scroll possible from the various events and TOA, they all gave me Wind Chun Li. To say i was frustrated by that was an understatement, surely rng would mean getting at least a different version (water/fire/light/dark) but no.

They don't respect your time, and they respect your wallet WAY too much. You'll grind for hours, days, weeks, months, and make very little progress. The drop rates are the lowest of any gacha I've played, and the game is very much pay to win. Except you can't even guarantee rewards for your money, so if you like to spend on these games prepare to spend a LOT to make up for low rng. If you have problems with spending or gambling in any way, DO NOT get this game.

title: Bubble Witch 2 Saga
description:
From the makers of Candy Crush Saga, Bubble Witch Saga & Farm Heroes Saga comes Bubble Witch 2 Saga!

Stella and her cats need your help to fend off the dark spirits that are plaguing their land. Travel the realm bursting as many bubbles as you can in this exciting bubble shooting puzzle adventure. Win levels and free Witch Country piece by piece. Play this epic saga alone or with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Bubble Witch 2 Saga is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

Bubble Witch 2 Saga features:
‚Ä¢ The next exciting instalment to the Bubble Witch franchise 
‚Ä¢ New and improved game modes
‚Ä¢ Enchanting graphics that will leave you spellbound
‚Ä¢ Hundreds of magical bubble shooting levels ‚Äì more added every 2 weeks!
‚Ä¢ Easily sync the game between devices when connected¬† to the Internet
‚Ä¢ Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
‚Ä¢ Collect stars to unlock special items to help you on your quest 
‚Ä¢ Special boosters & bubbles to help you pass those tricky levels
‚Ä¢ Free & easy to play, challenging to master!

Visit https://care.king.com/ or contact us in game by going to Settings > Customer Care if you need help!

Follow us to get news and updates;
facebook.com/BubbleWitchSaga2
Twitter @BubbleWitchSaga
https://www.youtube.com/user/BubbleWitchOfficial
http://bubblewitch2saga.com/

Have fun playing Bubble Witch 2 Saga!

If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in game help centre or by going to https://soporto.king.com/

comments: I did an update last night causing me to lose lives I had stored up, gold bars and even though I beat level 734 over 6 times it will not let me move past. On the Bingo like game it will not give me credit when I clear a space. Unloaded and reloaded no help. Had this game for a long time and this is the first time i had this big problem.

I've been playing ALL the Bubble Witches for years now and I COMPLETELY fell in love with all of them! ü•∞ I have a panic disorder and these games help so much to soothe my anxieties and let me focus on the fun! I absolutely LOVE the sounds and watching all the super colorful bubbles fall into the cauldronsüíû EXCELLENT JOB, KING'S BUBBLE WITCHES! YOU ARE ABSOLUTELY MAGICAL üí´üîÆ

I love this game yet, level 136 can't be passed! The game doesn't give enouh bubbles and with no boosters, it's not passable! Three days trying to advance, is just irritating! I am fixing to uninstall if I don't pass it after today. Ridiculous!

I love bubble witch saga games. However I've wrote twice now about being screwed out of extra bubbles I've purchased and I'm unable to send or receive extra lives from anyone. None of my friends even show up to send lives to and I know a bunch of my friends who play. Fix these issues and give me back the gold I was cheated and ill change my rating.

I love this game but got to level 812 and can no longer pass this level I do not understand what happened either nor where to go to find out why I can not move forward in this game..worked hard to get this high so do not want to start over.but had a blast getting to this level

title: Star Wars‚Ñ¢: Galaxy of Heroes
description:
Live your Star Wars‚Ñ¢ dreams as you fight with your favorite dark and light side heroes across iconic locations to become master of the galaxy. Create and customize your battle squad strategy using characters from every era, including champions from Star Wars‚Ñ¢: The Rise of Skywalker, Star Wars‚Ñ¢: The Last Jedi‚Ñ¢, and Rogue One‚Ñ¢: A Star Wars‚Ñ¢ Story. Engage in turn-based RPG battles, master the Squad Arena, wield Luke Skywalker‚Äôs lightsaber, join a Guild with friends, and take your strategy to the next level!

CREATE THE ULTIMATE TEAM
Rebel leaders? Imperial stalwarts? You‚Äôre free to choose as you construct elite light and dark side teams while collecting heroes and other champion RPG characters from the Star Wars‚Ñ¢ universe. Develop your strategy and make key moves in this epic RPG battle arena. Pick teammates with complementary abilities and go to war with an unbeatable squad!

BECOME MASTER OF THE GALAXY
Defeat opponents and rise to the top as you dominate the galactic hologames based in a far-off cantina. Improve your RPG combat strategy by upgrading your Star Wars‚Ñ¢ heroes‚Äô abilities as you play for even more powerful attacks and bigger wins. Then fight other players in Squad Cantina Battles, PvP Squad Arena, and Squad Tournaments to conquer the galaxy.

PLAY WITH POWERFUL CHAMPIONS
Make smart, tactical decisions and equip your Star Wars‚Ñ¢ heroes with cool gear to enhance their damage and improve your RPG strategy. Unlock fun abilities to make your champion team unstoppable as you unleash your lightsaber in Luke Skywalker‚Äôs Destined Strike, destroy enemies with Darth Vader‚Äôs Force Crush, and outsmart your opponents with Young Han Solo‚Äôs Trick Shot.

ENGAGE IN EPIC STARSHIP BATTLES
Collect iconic Star Wars‚Ñ¢ starships, including the Millennium Falcon, and massive Capital Ships, like Admiral Ackbar‚Äôs Home One, to construct your champion war fleets. Keep your cool in fast-paced RPG-style space combat, deploy reinforcements, and turn the tide of battle with the right strategy. Face fun new challenges and compete in the Fleet Arena to test your prowess. Gather unique upgrade materials for characters, available only as rewards for starship battles. Each starship has its own squad and strategy, adding special skills to individual starships. Recruit powerful pilots to create the strongest armada in the galaxy!

RISE TO THE TOP IN A GUILD
Grab your lightsaber and enter the Raid arena with friends. Fight against bosses like the Rancor, AAT Tank, and the Sith Triumvirate when you create a customizable Guild. Collaborate to form a strategy with your Guild in Territory Battles where members unleash their entire squad of champion characters and starships against a progressively evolving battlefield. Show your dominance in this RPG when you face off in strategy-based battles against other Guilds to conquer territories and top global Guild leaderboards in Territory Wars.


Terms of Service: http://terms.ea.com
Privacy and Cookie Policy: http://privacy.ea.com

Game EULA: http://tos.ea.com/legalapp/mobileeula/US/en/OTHER/

Visit http://help.ea.com/en/star-wars-galaxy-heroes/star-wars-galaxy-heroes/ for assistance or inquiries.

EA may retire online features after 30 days‚Äô notice posted on www.ea.com/1/servic//e-updates.
