developerAddress: Geneva, Switzerland
recentChanges:
Hey, Galaxy of Heroes fans! We‚Äôve made a few game tweaks to enhance your experience in battle and beyond.

Have fun and thanks for joining the fight!
comments: This game is insanely good!! I have an underaged account, which is very annoying because it blocks some features, but it is still the BEST game I have ever played!! The graphics are very good and the gameplay is even better! All these people that say that it is PTP (Pay To Play) are WRONG!! I am at the max level and am very good, I have never payed anything! Hope anybody who plays this game enjoys it! Thank you very much EA for making such an amazing game!

I love this game. I don't spend and still enjoy it, although it is a grind, so don't expect any quick progression without spending. My one suggestion would be to have a randomized pull in the beginning that gives you a random but guaranteed character. Doesn't have to be anyone amazing. 1 or 2 star character that then makes your experience of the game unique. I know you can try and pull from a chromium card but no guarantees and gems are too valuable as f2p.

The game goes out of its way to ensure you're not making any decent progress without spending huge amounts. In the first 3 1/2 years of the game, new content and characters were frequent, though in the past year or so this has seen a rapid decline. Game modes have grown stale and repetitive. Any new characters have ridiculous requirements to obtain them, we are talking 6 month to a year to unlock. The game lacks balance, leveling up/gearing characters is an endless grind with little reward.

Collect Star wars characters, what more can I say. Have had the game over 2 years now and don't see myself leaving anytime soon. The game has its ups and downs, and of course there is a pay to win element, but it's in no way essential. Metas change fairly regularly and all eras of star wars are given their fair share of attention. The game also offers a great variety of game modes: Single player PVE, guild based PVE, single player PVP and guild based PVP. A fan of star wars must have this game.

STAR WARS: GALAXY OF RIP OFFS. Just ok. Starts out fun, but then the game becomes total pay for play. The prices they ask are ridiculous. Supply drops r a joke since 99% of what you get, is fairly useless. No really special stuff gets dropped and updating characters & ships, unless you're willing to drop serious coin - isn't happening. The new characters are impossible to get without $. Don't bother trying to contact the developers - you'll never get an answer.

title: Home Designer - Match + Blast to Design a Makeover
description:
Train your brain with challenging puzzles and awaken your inner stylist with a perfect design!

Welcome to Home Designer - Makeover Blast, where dreams of the perfect home designs are realized!

Help your clients turn their drab living space into fantastic rooms! Solve matching puzzles to design and decorate the perfect home with beautiful furniture! From Rustic to Modern, from Contemporary to Victorian,  from Shabby-Chic to Industrial. We're counting on your home design expertise! Do you have what it takes  for the most addicting puzzle game ever? Your clients are counting on you to make their dream home comes true!

Features:
- Play hundreds of addicting BLAST puzzle levels and unravel interesting stories of each client!
- Bright colored levels, one-finger gameplay, satisfying POWER-UP animations!
- Design and decorate a variety of rooms from Living Room, Bedroom, Dining Room and many others in the home to come!
- Enjoy puzzle gaming that gets just a bit more difficult gradually as you progress through the levels!
- With free and regular updates, you‚Äôll always have fresh and new content to play every day!

recentChanges: This update brings you the seasonal Halloween Hallway; help Ryan makeover his home just in time for the spooky celebrations! But that‚Äôs not all! Play our new time-limited Halloween Design Contest from October from 19th until November 1st and win exclusive furniture items!
comments: I loved playing this game but for some reason the fortune wheel & extra 2 lives is not working after the last update. Also having done all the levels it has become boring.

No other issues since your help. Great game, was wondering if you are adding more rooms. I have just about finished all the rooms available completely. Are there going to be any more rooms added, I have almost finished the rooms completely even getting the 100 gems in each room.
So far it seems pretty good but I really wish there was a design game like this one with word games instead of matching.

It would have been worth 5 stars if you hadn't added the votes section. It's a match 3 game! If I wanted to be forced to vote on other people's designs I would be playing redecor which I also have on my device! When I play match 3 Renovation games I want to play by myself without other people! But since you added this feature I will be permanently deleting this game as you have ruined the experience for me! You should be ashamed of trying to turn a match 3 game into a sad version of design home!

I love this game I really can not complain I know that I have just installed it but I have no problems with the game so that is why I gave the game 5 stars I would seriously advice people to install this game because you can play it without data(offline) üåüüåüüåüüåüüåüüíìüíì

title: Beggar Life 2 - Clicker Adventure
description:
‚óÜ Beggar Life 2 is done in the following way:1. Making money
[Click]: You can make money using a click (tab). 
[Part-time]: You can increase money automatically by hiring Convenience store part-timer . 
[Asset]: You can buy assets and get a market profit.
[Company]: You can acquire a company to gain market profits and profits.
[Country]: You can take over a country and collect money from the people.
[Bank]: You can deposit in a bank to get interest.2. Spending money
[One penny village]: It is used to use various places in one penny village.
[Others]: Money is spent on upgrades and employment, purchases, costumes, and so on.3. Collecting
[Story Card]: Collect story cards of people you meet in one penny village.
[Item]: Increase boss beggar's capacity.
[Background]: Modify the background screen with the background you get when you travel at the airport.
[Costume]: Buy and collect various clothing of boss beggar at a shopping mall in one penny village.
Be the richest man in the world with a dynamic clicker adventure system!
Questions: manababagames@naver.com

comments: Its a really good game, the two reasons I chose 4 stars is well.... lets just get right to it, number 1, when i get on the loading screen it kicks me out and thats happened all the time. But if go in it again it works. Number 2, im kinda sad that the part-time-workers from beggar life are not there :( But otherwise everythings amazing!

Bit Grindy but overall good but I prefer the first. It gets pretty boring after a little I suggest I little bit more action. Like say a boss fight every once a while and more part timer you have it's easier because they do damage to and say if you win you get 10% money boost every click. Remember this is just a suggestion. Feel free to actually do this.

Amazing idle game. It's like other idle games except it has buildings to purchase. A city you can go into with multiple things to do. And not filled with a ton of ads like Alot of other games. I personally love this game and the people who made it. Well that's all. Great game.

Dev replied with game requiring "minimum rights". Here is what they want from you when you start the game. Storage game data, view and manage google drive data, associate with personal info, see your personal info including your email address and your public data. Your game does not need to know all this dev. You can use cloud saves and that is it. You do not need to know what my real name is and where I live. Change it to cloud saves like every other idle game on the app store that is 4 stars and up.

Some ads are just a picture with 0 seconds and the game thinks I did not watch an ad, so I get 0 mana (failed to view ad) Please fix! I am really enjoying the game. I cannot read the price for the upgrades, it is to hard to see (blue + green) Please make Blue and Red, I cannot read the price for part timers!!! please fix, will give 5! thank you

title: Bloomberg: Market & Financial News
description:
Get comprehensive access to global business, stock market and finance news, and trending topics like bitcoin and cryptocurrency.

You can customize the app to monitor your personal portfolio and receive continuous alerts on global stock positions and summarized financial, economic, and corporate information that meets the needs of the global business and financial professional. 

Whether you need to monitor your stock portfolio or just want to discover breaking financial news, Bloomberg provides the news and analysis you require, whenever and wherever you need it. 

FEATURES:

- News: Featured and trending stories in Markets, Industries, Technology, Politics, Luxury, Personal Finance, Opinion and more. 

- Market Data: Latest market data on your customizable portfolio and personalized for your region including Equity Indexes, Futures, Bonds, Commodities & Currencies. 

- Watchlist: Easily track your portfolio by adding a security (stocks, mutual funds, ETFs, currencies, etc.) to your personal Watchlist(s).

- Video: Watch Bloomberg Television Live without the need of any Cable or Satellite subscription. Watch featured videos specifically chosen for top news categories.

- Audio: Listen to interviews and analysis from around the world by the smartest names in Global Finance, Business, Economics & Investment from our radio shows and podcasts.

More Features: 

Markets data in your region and a Watchlist summary with leaders and laggers. Introducing a bold, new look for Businessweek including issue downloading for offline reading.

Download the app now for accurate and concise finance news, stock market intelligence alerts and everything you need to know about currencies, commodities and futures‚Ä¶

A subscription to the Bloomberg app gets you unlimited access to all Bloomberg content within the app and on the website (after linking your account). You can start with a 30 days free trial and then a monthly subscription for $34.99/month.

Your payment will be charged to your Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. You may manage your subscription and auto-renew may be turned off by going to Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. 

Terms of Use: https://www.bloomberg.com/notices/tos
Privacy Policy: https://www.bloomberg.com/notices/privacy

Visit us at:

http://www.bloomberg.com

recentChanges: ‚óâ Performance improvements
comments: Content great but app very clunky and slow, and loads of ads despite subscription. Main missing feature for me is ability to replay, pause & fast forward interviews. I watch it for an hour or two day, more some days. Ads feel like 30%, and I assume they are filling the time between interviews. Mostly I don't need to watch the interviews live; they should all be available to watch later, skipping the ads, or most of them. (They only have a repertoire of 4 or 5 ads, endlessly repeated)

The app will not get past the loading screen upon opening. It just continually loads and never opens. I read businessweek primarily on my phone and since the new app doesn't open it makes it pointless to have a subscription. Shame because content itself is great.

The app has no dark mode. Big No-No in today's day&age! The app has no video PIP - so I am stuck in it. They should take inspiration from YouTube's PIP allowing one to switch over to another app to read other news in app, or take notes in another app while watching the Live TV. The app's ads are a problem. It starts with 6-10 ads but it horrible because the button of 'Skip ads' has no effect. üòÇ The ads are repeated again if you had to leave app, go to another app and come back. üòÇ
I love watching Bloomberg in the mornings it helps me understand the market before I do my daily analysing also the app makes it easy to be on the move and still keep and eye out on critical news

Intelligent productive news experience Well sourced and a calm effective vocal experience with a neutral voice command ..made the news not only sound archaic but also progressive at the same time ..broad appeal .and yet I'm not a fan of apps in general .I'm not addicted to tech as much as most tech companies and apps for $ think the common occasional user ..I'm not addicted to updates but if I was ..I would be listening to your voice cast

title: TextNow: Free Texting & Calling App
description:
*NEW FEATURE* Now you can use TextNow without WiFi! Get unlimited calling and texting in the US over the Nationwide Sprint Network -- for FREE.  Check if your phone is eligible, and get phone service without the phone bill by clicking on "Free Coverage" in the app menu.

Local US or Canada Phone number
Give your friends your very own phone number they can call!

Unlimited Text & Picture Messaging 
You can send as many text messages as you want to US & Canada - FREE!

Unlimited Calling to USA and Canada 
Make unlimited free phone calls to any phone number in the US & Canada!

Cheap International Calling
TextNow offers low-cost, international calling to over 230 countries. Stay connected longer with rates starting at less than $0.01 per minute. Add money or earn free money by completing offers to your account and make low-cost international calls.

Features:
- Make and receive voice calls
- Emojis, stickers and gifs
- Full picture messaging : send, receive and save pictures!
- Video messaging: Send videos to your friends and family
- Voicemail Transcription: transcript of your voicemail
- Caller ID
- PassCode: keep your messages under lock and key
- Google SmartLock: no need to remember your password
- Call Forwarding
- Conference calling
- Signatures: add your own personalized signature to each text
- Customizable text-tone, ringtone & vibration
- Customizable backgrounds
- Assign individual contacts their own ringtone & background
- Quick Reply to easily (and quickly) respond to friends
- Home screen widget to launch TextNow, compose a new message or quickly make a call
- Unified inbox: send and receive your texts, SMS and GIFs directly via TextNow - use TextNow as your one-stop SMS texting app!
- One number, multiple devices ‚Äì Send messages and make calls on your computer or tablet, then access them from your phone while on the go.
- TextNow.com - text from your computer too! All messages seamlessly synchronize with your mobile device.
- Turn your Wi-Fi enabled tablets into a phone.
- Elastic calling to protect you from dropped calls. Elastic calling is TextNow‚Äôs unique ability to have our calls choose the best possible route for your call to improve quality

Is it really free? 

There is no catch. No yearly or monthly fees! It is completely free! Download today and start sending and receiving your unlimited texts, pics, videos, and SMS messages.

How can all this be free?

The app comes with a few ads. If you don't like ads, you can purchase a subscription to remove them. Join the 100 million people who have already found a better way to talk & text free.

comments: Ever since the update it made it worse. It rings again, that's good. Problem is, people can't hear me but I can hear them. I have to use LINE for the time being until it gets fixed. Dont tell me to get the latest update either etc. I did all that. You guys need to update this again because my callers can't hear me when talking. It works then I stops working.

Its great! Actually free. Ive had it for a 2nd private line since like 2016. But you have to pay attention to your account. Because I didn't use mine for a while, lapsed & I still had an account sort of. But I lost my phone number. But its totally not a big deal! For real only actually free. When I lapsed I didn't renew right away because textnow had changed with how it had always been. But now that I renewed, its like it was before and even better! Katy

Totally free for calling, texting and calling landlines and toll free # also when I traveles overseas I could call landlines and office numbers with ease and for free. I use this as a number to give out to people who i buy stuff from online or when companies ask for my # to send ad text, as wel. If it is not used, you will lose the number. I do not recommend using for sensitive data as it is easy to lose the number assigned . that said it is easy to get any # in any area code within the US. üëç

I love this app. Been using it for about 3 years now. I always tell people about this app. It's a great way to have a secondary phone but on same device. Plus it works really well and offers great plans and If you cant afford a plan you can still use it and keep your # for free if needed. Even free for all incoming/outgoing calls with voicemail and text messages also. So you can stay in touch with friends, family, and/or work anytime needed!! Awesome app!!

Beautiful app. I have been using this app for several years and find it very useful and stable. My only reservation is the possibility of losing your phone number if it is not used for a while. The time needs to be extended as sometimes people are unable to use the phone for extensive periods either because of illl health or because the device the number was loaded on has become temporarily unavailable.

comments: Its... OK. The whole reason it's 2 stars instead of 3 or 4 is because of the ads. There's always ads all the time, but when you really need the ads to access the puzzles, there's always "no ads". And then there's the fact that you NEED to watch ads to even move forward. I mean, you can't even remove the ads. Edit: Well, you CAN, but you need to buy premium for that. And who would pay real money for this kind of game?

Fun game concept but horribly overbearing monetization. Within the first 18 levels 2 require you to pay either a subscription fee or a flat 30$ for the full game. Other levels require you to watch 30 second ads to play. I figured I'd just skip these but levels are put into groups and you have to finish a set amount to unlock the next group which forces you to watch all the ads if you wish to progress "for free". It's just a basic phone game demanding way more money than it's worth. Just awful.

I hate this game! There are levels in which we can't play them and we are forced to watch an ad to complete it for free!!!! Why can't we play those levels!!!!!!! And when I clicked on those level it showed video unavailable!!! And because of these I can't go to the another level!!!!!!! Please deal with that üò†üò†üò†üòíüòí

It is a little tricky but is fun that way I read it you are for but I would make you some a little more easier for new Bergen is does like me is easy to do the the on pencil and stuff but it to watched a lot like a glitch a lot um I don't know the not to say no to say but is a fun game to play and super super super super fun thank you For the game by super friend thank you for game again

I love this game vut there is just to many ads. The ads are not contatible for me so, pls remove all of the ads. Every apps always needs to pay to remove the ads. But also its quite fun andits relaxing after all. Pls downloed this app but do not downlied this app.

title: Space Decor : Dream Home Design
description:
Welcome to the design studio and show your design talent here to decorate different houses!üè†

As a young designerüë©‚Äçüé®, you dream to become one of the best architecture in the world. One day, you met the greatest architecture in the design circle, and your legendary stories get started!üòò

Here are tons of decorations for you to choose fromüéâ: Mediterranean style, European style, Modern minimalist style and so on. It‚Äôs all up to you to design the houses. From apartment to villa, restaurant to hotel, your work will cover all over the world. It sounds great, does it?üòç

Except choose the decorations, beat the match-3 levels is another missionüéØ for you. Here are many delicate levels waiting for you! Switch, match and crush hundreds of tiles to challenge funny puzzles and make high scores with your families and friends!ü•∞

-HOW TO PLAY-
‚óèSwap to match 3 or more similar tiles in a line to crush them.
‚óèMake a square of four to create the paper plane.
‚óèMatch 5 or more to create amazing boosters
‚óèFind different kinds of powerful combos is the key to solve puzzles and beat the levels.
‚óèBeat the levels to get more coins which are the necessary sources to buy decorations
‚óèChoose the styles you like and become the greatest designer in your friends

-FEATURES-
‚óèüÜìCompletely free game to play;
‚óèüé®Many houses are waiting for you designing;
‚óèüéâVarious interesting events in every week;
‚óèüòçVivid character and attractive detective story;
‚óèüèÜPlay with your families and friends and share your works;

comments: I'm addicted to decor games and this is one of my favourite...BUT why are there so many ads? I recommend this to my siblings and they had already uninstall it because of the ads! extra ads than any other games! AND I've been on level 549 and WHY do i need to finish upto level 630 just to unlock the next room? it becomes boring and tiring ! I'm üëå this close to uninstall it though I'm addicted to it and the designs are great! it becomes more boring and boring !!!!!!!üò¢

It is ok but I don't like the way you have to do a puzzle as without them you would be able to enjoy the game more. Some people do like puzzles but there should be a choice button. Also we should press on things and change it without doing puzzles not just the first few.

This was actually enjoyable (too many stuffed animals for it to feel like you were designing for real), but the thing that kills it is non-consensual ads. It would be very easy for them to up the bonuses that you get for watching ads, but they decided not to go that way.
Fun game. I gave four instead of five stars only because it glitches too much on my tablet. I finished the kitchen and now it won't connect to server. Darn. I really enjoy the game play.

I Really Like The Game. But I would change a couple of things. I would like to be able to decline picking some furniture. I don't like rugs and paintings. We picked beautiful flooring and walls and then have to cover them up. Also sometimes we pick a color scheme such as pink or lavender and then a furnishing is not the same colors. Maybe a choice of the color scheme at the beginning with the cleaning etc

title: Candy Crush Jelly Saga
description:
There's a new player in town, the wiggling, jiggling Jelly Queen and she's here to challenge you to a game of Candy Crush Jelly Saga!  Whatever your favorite moves, you better hope they're Jellylicious enough to take on the mighty Jelly Queen.
 
The unstoppably spreadable game!  New Candy Crush Jelly Saga is full of delightful game modes, features and boss battles featuring the Jelly Queen!  Playing as Jenny, show off your Jellylicious moves and take turns switching Candies against the jiggling Jelly Queen. Every sweet move will spread more Jelly and whoever spreads the most will win the level!
 
There are splendid new Candies, a marvelous new booster and a dreamy treetop world to explore in the Candy Kingdom too!

Royal Championship is the new VS Mode in Candy Crush Jelly Saga. Players will compete 1:1 in fast paced game rounds in real time! Win a big bundle of rewards by completing a consecutive win streak and finishing in the top half of the leaderboard. The higher the position, the bigger the reward! Have you got what it takes?

Take on this delightful Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!
 
Candy Crush Jelly Saga is completely free to play but in-game currency, to buy items such as extra moves or lives, will require payment with real money.
 
You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device‚Äôs settings.
 
Candy Crush Jelly Saga features:
> Over 3000 Jellylicious Levels
> Real Time VS mode   	
> Boss Modes   	
> Marvelous game modes including: Spread the Jelly & Release the Pufflers  	
> Tasty Color Bomb Lollipop booster    
> Mesmerizing new Candies  	
> Dreamy new treetop world and a host of quirky characters led by the Jelly Queen and her stooges.  
> Easy and fun to play, yet challenging to fully master

For players that Facebook Connect, there are leaderboards for you and your friends to compare your Jellylicious scores
 
Easily sync the game between mobile and tablet devices and unlock the full game features when connected to the internet	
 
Now you can express yourself, jelly-style! Be sassy like the Jelly Queen or cool like Cupcake Carl with our sweet Candy Crush Jelly Stickers!
 
Facebook @CandyCrushJellySaga
Twitter @CandyCrushJelly
Instagram @CandyCrushSaga
YouTube @CandyCrushOfficial
 
Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Candy Crush Jelly Saga!
 
Do not sell my data: King shares your personal information with advertising partners to personalize ads. Learn more at https://king.com/privacyPolicy. If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in game help centre or by going to https://soporto.king.com/contact

comments: I enjoy this game, very addictive!Recommend it to everyone wanting to play and improve their brain. I disagree with those claiming that at some level you must use money. I have played this game for years and refuse spend a dime. I have patience and detrrminationand try to learn from the failures. Usually do.Just give us more FREE weapons. Great game!

Very beautyful game. But in the championship game i want not to lose my progress.Why? As in football, and in other games , and in this championship ,the tickets that we collect is not, good to cancel.The best player,is he , who , for 48 ours ,play and win more games that enother player. .For example ! I collect 3 ,tickets in, 3 games.When I go in 4 game ,the colors are not in my favore ,so the progress stop.But is not right, to lose the tickets.

Hello King. GLITCH! Level 730! I beat a player and it still will not let me progress. Why incorporate sudden forced competitions into a game I've been playing for so long? AND if you're going to do so.. why not make it optional only? If this issue isn't cleared by morning I am uninstalling and KING won't get another dime from me. Ridiculous and unfortunate. It was a good game.

The game is fun to play but the Royal Championship is somehow unfair. It always unfavor players who are one win away from getting the treasure boxes. The other player would have an advantage because they would be given opportunities for combos and would normally win after a few moves. There should be fairness in giving out combos so that the game should be fair. Edit:It's so unfair that everytime I'm near getting the chest box, I always get disconnected or there's a problem with the game.

Stuck at level 60. It's blatantly obvious that this is one of those levels that is intended to make you pay. They will not give you what you need to progress until after 30 to 40 times of going through this level they get sick of looking at you and give you what you need until you hit the next one which is intended to force you to pay. I've found this with this company many times before and I'm not surprised it's in this one as well.

title: Digital Secure
description:
Protect your private information from digital threats. 
Digital Secure is a one-stop suite of privacy and security tools for your mobile devices and home computers. Safeguard your internet connection and personal data with antivirus, anti-malware and identity theft protection so you can browse with peace of mind. 

Here‚Äôs what you‚Äôll get with Digital Secure.
You‚Äôll get free security and privacy tools, plus you can get advanced protection for $5/mo per line or $10/mo per account.

1. Security and Privacy
Protect your device from online threats and get around-the-clock peace of mind. 
Get warnings when connecting to an unsecure network, visiting risky websites or attempting dangerous downloads. Plus, you‚Äôll be able to see how installed apps are currently using your personal information. 

2. Safe Wi-Fi 
Connect with confidence to any public Wi-Fi. 
With Digital Secure, it‚Äôs easy to make any Wi-Fi connection private. You‚Äôll get an on-the-go secure VPN connection so you‚Äôll be able to keep personal data and online activities to yourself. 

3. Identity Theft Protection (IDTP)
Take control with always-on IDTP and social media monitoring, dark web surveillance and theft alerts.
24/7 cyber monitoring means you can be notified if we detect any personal information you‚Äôve asked us to monitor is shared online. You‚Äôll also get step-by-step guidance from recovery and replacement specialists if essential items such as credit cards and IDs are lost.

developerAddress: One Verizon Way, Basking Ridge, New Jersey
recentChanges: Bug Fixes
comments: I straight up didn't install this app. I've never used it or opened it either but it was taking up lots of my battery (about 1% which is a lot for an app that I have literally never opened). I'm assuming my provider (Verizon, surprise, surprise) downloaded this app automatically during an update to my phone which is fantastic, since I was never alerted of this (read: sarcasm).

Complete Battery Hog. I have to disable the web protection settings or it chews up my battery life in a matter of hours. According to my battery usage stats, Verizon's "anti-virus scanner" uses up more battery than Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and Mobile Games. On some days, Combined. Samsung Galaxy S10.

I have been a subscriber with VERIZON for about 14 yrs. I have been more than satisfied with the cell svc, their products they sell, the support teams, and most of all the protection products they offer. This particular app is of the highest quality out on the market. Can't go wrong with this one!!!

This is trouble some to me I have a 1 in the app window all of the time I do not know what to do of the 1 in the app window need help clearing the 1 in the app window . Cause of this happening to people much in proving is needed to correct the problems with this app here????? Unknown if app window problem location/link & intternet problem double check from your end.

Since the app was installed i cannot access my printer to print emails from my phone. This app sucks. I originally thought it was my printer now I am finding out it is my phone. I have been a Verizon customer for years. I am considering a switch to another company.

title: Guns of Glory: Build an Epic Army for the Kingdom
description:
The cardinal has seized power and is blaming the king's death on the musketeers! Fight to protect the throne and clear your name! The musketeers cannot do it alone, you will need to build your own army and strategy to achieve glory. Prepare your guns and swords, and triumph in this RPG! For the king!

Get ready for the next stage of this MMO war with the free Guns of Glory! GoG's thrilling multiplayer and RTS gameplay enable you to build your own powerful army and team up with friends from around the globe to shoot down enemies. Take your guns, prepare your strategy and army for battle, fight against the enemy and improve your castle! Prepare your guns and defend your castle.

In Guns of Glory, you take the lead as a rising Lord in a Kingdom thrown into war! To become supreme ruler and seize the Crown of Destiny from the devious Cardinal, you'll ally yourself with the famous Three Musketeers, slay ferocious beasts (infernal bull, king rat, or a zombie farmer), build your own magnificent Castle and engineer an Airship. Destroy enemies in this guns RPG game!

This RPG kingdom game is set during the industrial revolution, as the origin of the first pistols and more deadly weapons. Be a legend on the battlefield and get the winning shots. Create soldiers and guns and upgrade them to complete the missions. Get gold and improve the stables for your horses to be faster. It's all about time!

This RPG game is for kids, both girls and boys, of all ages. Learn team management and complete each mission. Manage resources to create a strong soldier and improve your zeppelin. It is a real-time battle, build your army and dominate the war field. You are the last guardian of the castle. Get your guns ready and defend the castle.
Build a safe camp with different buildings to get better soldiers and beat the beasts. The castle must be the priority. Protect your kingdom!

FEATURES:

Strategy Warfare! Protect the throne and the kingdom. Prepare your guns and defend your castle. Train an army of Musketeers, manage your resources, construct traps, and raid your enemies into oblivion, all in order to claim the crown and turn your Alliance into an empire in the best of the kingdom games!

Powerful Airships! In an era of emerging progress and science, shoot down enemies and lead the attack with deadly advanced aircraft for a new level of RTS. Defend the castle by using guns!

World War! Seamless chat translation features make GoG's multiplayer RTS and RPG gameplay richer than ever before. Build your empire and a strong army. Use all your guns to defend the castle.

MMO World! Guns of Glory brings the world of the Three Musketeers to life! Rendered HD graphics and a vivid, beautiful empire make all the action in this free strategy MMORPG!

Advanced RTS Combat! Set your own strategy to attack enemies and aid allies! Guns of Glory's MMORPG gameplay lets you customize your Airship, Estate, troops, buildings, equipment, tactics, and more. Develop an MMO game strategy to fit your own army in GoG and claim victory! Protect the throne now, in the best of kingdom games! Make guns and protect the castle.

Empire Building! Construct a fortified empire, master a range of skills and arm yourself with weapons to ensure your survival in this MMO strategy war!

SUPPORT
Privacy Policy: https://www.centurygame.com/privacy-policy/
Facebook fanpage: www.facebook.com/gunsofglorygame
Terms of Service: https://www.centurygame.com/terms-of-service/

PLEASE NOTE: Guns of Glory is completely free to download and play, but some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please enable password protection for purchases in your Google Play Store app. A network connection is also required. Will you be able to claim Glory with the right strategy?

comments: The Game is frequently updated to force players to spend money - alot of money - if they want to be competitive! Otherwise progress is painfully slow. With frequent updates glitches are generated which destroys enjoyment of the game. Slow the update rate down, and give the smaller castles (with little spare cash) time to catch up with the 'big boys'. If not more players will leave in droves and the kingdoms will become more stagnant than they currently are! You must prove the game environment!

The game can be fun, but do not play unless you want to spend money. It requires a lot to be able to play with any kind of semblance of a chance. There are people who spend so much money that you can never ever ever ever keep up and that means you will always be dead in the water no matter what. Edit: Typical response by developer which does not address the issue which is that they encourage this behavior with the way they do updates and game play is implemented. Docked one more star.

Not really a fair game for new players. Peace shields are limited and don't last long enough. Kill events literally end your passion for this game. They need to enable a join feature not an FFA. I cannot beat a kingdom of 30 when I just joined 1 week ago and am at 10. As soon as I pop shield, homophobic and racial slurs blasts the announcements. TL;DR new players gets CC'd and if you don't let others attack you, you get abused with controversial slurs. More work needed.

It is absolutely awful that I've been forced to tap and follow some stupid hard to follow "tutorial" that isn't teaching me ANYTHING because of its poor design literally dozens of times FORCED TO TAP WHAT YOU WANT and STILL can't turn that God awful "music" off or the sound for that matter. This is extremely horrible and the "story" isn't even going at a pace or way I feel remotely like I care to be forced to tap through either. It's terrible. Really terrible.

Been playing since the beginning and this game is a dumpster fire now. Constant updates that make it more more expensive and introduce more bugs than fixes. Also they like to reset major aspects of the game so they can charge you for features that you already had. And if you contact customer service they will tell you whatever is broken is supposed to be like that. Don't waste your money

title: Love Choice: Interactive game, new stories&episode
description:
Love Choice is a great collection of story games!
It is an episode of the story of each of us. We are inspired by this feeling to make choices, to accept decisions, and to be romantic. Love awakens dreams and imagination. It drives our passion to write more great chapters, and capture all the moments of love journeys.

And remember: Moments of love is the greatest moments of your journey!
 
 üíúüíúüíú

So what will you do for love?
- choose your interactive stories;
- Change fate through your choices;
- make your storyline full of drama, romance and dreams;
- Develop relationships with your favourite characters;
- Customize your avatar and design outfit;
- seek the best way to make good choices;
- Immerse yourself in thousands of diverse worlds!
- remember, every decision and every choice matters;
- Discover all of the different endings of each episode;
- so keep romance and find a true love


üìöüìñHere are some of top stories: üìñüìö

üòàüçìüë†Demons in High Heels
Lily works at "Helluv", the fashion industry giant in New York. The closer look at the job of the dreams reveals that the company is actually is a battleground for supernatural powers. And those powers are really interested in Lily.

 üèÉ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüåπüíÉRunway Runaway
Caroline's boyfriend has cheated on her, but her life couldn't get better. The ex offers her to design a runway show in Pairs. Her boyfriend is feeling remorseful and misses her. Charming and suave gentlemen are all around her. Caroline takes up on the offer, takes her best friend and goes to conquer the City of Love.

üåÜüíÑüé¨Stardom is Priceless.
If you can't conquer Hollywood and become an actress, there's always a plan "B". A simple midwest lass Mary decides to work as an agent, so she could get meet the celebrities, get her hands on the juiciest productions and get to know the glamourous movie industry.

üéäüëóüßπMade Maid
In this episode Jennifer lost everything almost overnight and found herself in her personal "hell". Now, the only way to break free of this life is the invitation from a handsome and rich young man with a very picky family...

üå∂üíçüïµÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èMy Roommate is a Spy
Lucy looks for a new roommate, the rent could help her make ends meet. The best candidate is a handsome and serious young man. But he has a terrible secret. And before it is even revealed, Lucy finds herself being hunted down by international spies.

üßõ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüîÆ‚õìVAMP U
Lisa is studying mythology, history and urban legends at her university. The subject of research becomes dangerously real when she realizes that she's surrounded by hungry vampires, and the only way to fight them is somewhere in her late father's journal...

üëë‚öîÔ∏èüç∑Love and Duty
Medieval French is very unpredictable. Today Juliette helps her dad with chores in his tavern. The next day, she's abducted by a count's son and imprisoned in his family castle. A knight sympathises her, but he's too loyal to his master to betray him, and people at court don't appreciate Juliette's company...

Plus lot of other books.
More chapters and episodes are coming soon.

üíúüíúüíú
As one of the oldest game companies, we decided to bring our experience in storytelling genre. Love Choice writers worked with famous directors in Hollywood, had worked on top-rated tv shows and movies. 

 Written with passion, the choices game is simulation game is for everyone, just like dating sim or great storyline romance movie, but you can choose your style, pick every dress you want and act the exact way you want to act: be billionaire, bad girl vampire, or seduce an arrogant prince. Your choices can change the whole storyline! 
Try romance, adventure, thriller, drama, horror and more‚Ä¶ Love Choice is one of the interactive story games that gives you the opportunity to simulate your own story, just like in date sims! You can get everything you desire in relationship, the very destiny is in your hands.

Meet in this update:
- Improvements and bugs fixes.
comments: DON'T PLAY, DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME! It would be a nice game but unless your willing to spend money your not going to get anywhere. Its ridiculously difficult to get any üíé's to move along in the game. I couldn't even get past creating my character because I didn't have enough üíé's. And watching a bunch of ads to try and get gems no thanks.

The app is good for casual play, I usually have a couple of books going at the one time to build up diamonds. The only criticism is things cost too much diamonds and sometimes the videos for free keys and diamonds don't work.

For how expensive this game is, you would think that they would update their stories. It has been two months since some of the stories received a new chapter. Choices are normally 20+ gems EACH and you're not even given that many through the free options they keep mentioning. It will take days to reach that amount using the free gem options. PLEASE don't waste your money on this game. You'll be doing yourself an enormous favor and saving yourself a load of disappointment, frustration and regret.

Fun game, but it's completely ridiculous just how expensive it is. You need a TON of diamonds to play, and there is no way of collecting nearly enough for free. You need to buy and even with that, they go so quickly it's not worth it. It's not a choice game when there are 2 options and the one you want costs you at least 20 diamonds, almost every single time. Clothing changes also cost 20 to 25 diamonds. I would be willing to pay a reasonable monthly unlimited amount to play, but this is insane.
Awesome game....just not enough free options. The game is initiated with you're having to purchase.

Very well designed App. Good food for brain. But lots lots of Ads. Once ¬Ω of levels are completed more Ads (we can skip after 5 secs) will be pushed in between the levels. After completing ¬æ levels, App hangs after playing AD (these are 30secs Ads). For designing, complexity this App deserves 5 stars, but for Ads that are being pushed 2 stars is more than enough. Ads are killing the interest.

Good game I have fun playing during downtime when I go to school but way to many ads after 1 round theres a ad and when you skip it, it gets stuck loading and I have to close the game over and over again.

Best mind relaxing game ever. Whenever I fell bored I always one option to play which is this one. The creator has made it upon the mind of an artiststic person because every artist wants some interesting thing to do as this game.

Very fun game and the ads aren't terrible. But it keeps freezing (loading forever) after almost every ad watched, requiring me to close and report the game. So, when I try to earn extra spins by watching an ad, I get screwed every time.

title: Alarm Clock for Me free
description:
Alarm Clock for Me turns your Android device into an alarm clock that plays your favorite tunes, a bedside clock with gorgeous themes, and a reliable daily helper perfect for every timing situation.

Main features:

‚Ä¢  Alarm clock: wake up to your favorite music and decorate your home screen with beautiful alarm clock widgets
‚Ä¢  Sleep Timer: fall asleep to your favorite songs or sounds from our collection;
‚Ä¢  Current temperature: check it in the morning to pick out a perfect outfit for your day;
‚Ä¢ Unlimited support: set as many alarms you need ‚Äî  and you‚Äôll never oversleep or miss an important event; 
‚Ä¢  Nightstand mode: see what the time is at night while your Android is charging;
‚Ä¢  Background support: alarm will go off even if the app is not running;
‚Ä¢ Two new ways to turn off an alarm: math alarm clock to kick-start your brain or shake alarm option to wake up your body;
‚Ä¢  Vibrate / Fade in / Snooze options for making your awakening more gentle.

Other features enhancing the overall experience:

‚Ä¢ Use the customizable clock widgets on your Home screen.
‚Ä¢ Adjust the screen brightness so that it doesn‚Äôt blind you after a good night‚Äôs sleep.
‚Ä¢ Take advantage of Perfect Bedtime Reminder to go to sleep at the right time in the evening.
‚Ä¢ Enable Gentle PreAlarm to enjoy easy and gentle awakening in the morning.
‚Ä¢ Use the shortcut on the main screen to go directly to the app‚Äôs settings and all active alarms.
‚Ä¢ You can also choose between vertical and horizontal modes, or prevent the main screen from auto-rotation by fixing the position of the clock on your screen.

Enjoy a perfect balance of beauty and functionality with this beautiful and reliable alarm clock app!

comments: I loved the app until it started draining my battery. And when I did a maintenance to make it stop draining the battery, the app stopped working altogether. I have to keep uninstalling and reinstalling in order to make the app work. Then it starts draining my battery again. That sucks! First edition that I installed prior to this new one did not do that.

Ive been using this app for years. This app used to open the screen automatically with the "STOP" button at the bottom when the alarm went off. Now the alarm goes off and nothing comes up on the screen anymore, I have to open the app and wade through the ads before I can open the alarm itself and turn it off. About 30 to 45 seconds of the alarm bells ringing before silence. Not feeling this at 0500 anymore. Please fix this issue. Im about to switch apps.

A good app, I am considering buying the full version when I have a decent phone. The only thing I would add/change is the 'Fade in' time; it would be ideal to have an option to adjust the 'fade in' time. Personally, I prefer to have the alarm 'fade in' period set at 5 minutes: the current 'fade in' setting does not give me enough time to switch off the alarm calm and collected, instead I fumble and create a noise waking everyone up. Having said that, it is still a good app.

It works really great as an alarm clock and it's the only one that can wake me up but it's super glitchy. Like sometimes alarms won't go off and sometimes alarms will go off at random times. Sometimes alarms will go off at the wrong time so my experience it works well as an alarm clock and it can wake you up amazingly but is super glitchy.

Pretty intuitive. Only cons - lots of ads & notifications drop bar says wrong day (for the alarm) sometimes. Ex: I set an alarm last night, for the following morning; woke up prior to the alarm going off and in the pull down, the alarm says: "next alarm set for tomorrow at 7:45." (When in actuality, it is only hours away, not over 24 hours away..)

title: Modern Combat 5: eSports FPS
description:
> ‚ÄúIt plays as good as it looks.‚Äù ‚Äì IGN
> ‚ÄúAmps everything up to the next level.‚Äù  ‚Äì 148Apps 
> ‚ÄúSharp controls, impressive graphics.‚Äù  ‚Äì Pocket Gamer 

War has evolved, and so has the best online FPS on mobile! 

Step onto the battlefield and answer the call with the title that raised the bar for first person shooter games with its great graphics, high-powered guns and intense online multiplayer action. Create a squad from 9 classes, add your friends for team play and test your skills in dynamic warfare against online rivals from around the world!

Prefer to work alone? Then feel free to step into the thrilling solo play campaign as you shoot your way through one dire situation after another to save the world as you launch an attack against a lunatic‚Äôs apocalyptic plans.

You won‚Äôt find more first person shooter fun in a free game anywhere!

9 CLASSES WITH UNIQUE SKILLS
> Customize and level up any of the 9 classes across solo play and team play modes. 
> Find the playstyle that suits you: Assault, Heavy, Recon, Sniper, Support, Bounty Hunter, Sapper, X1-Morph, or Kommander.
> Activate class-specific skills by earning and spending Skill Points.

HIGH-POWERED ONLINE MULTIPLAYER 
> Watch players engaged in live online FPS battles and eSports competitions with all the great graphics you expect in the new Spectator mode.
> Epic guns-a-blazing team play in Squad vs. Squad matches.
> Talk to other players to plan your online multiplayer strategies and coordinate an attack in the Global and Squad Chats.
> Top the individual and Squads leaderboards as you master your eSports skills.
> Win free rewards and cool prizes in limited-time events.

UNIFIED GAME PROGRESSION
> Accumulate XP and level up by playing both solo play missions and team play matches.
> Unlock higher-tier guns and other weapons by mastering lower-tier guns.
> Customize the perfect weapon using a host of attachments and jump straight into the free game action.

INTENSE SOLO PLAY CAMPAIGN 
> Engage in fast-paced story missions where the call will take you from Tokyo to Venice for a variety of first person shooter challenges.
> Play the new Spec Ops missions for a real online FPS adrenaline rush.
> Great graphics, music and voice performances perfectly adapted for a first person shooter game.

HIGHLY CUSTOMIZABLE CONTROLS
> Intuitive, highly customizable controls so you can play the game just the way you want.
> Modern Combat 5 supports HID game controllers. MOGA Pro is also supported, in mode B (HID Mode).

Modern Combat 5 requires an Internet connection.

So if you‚Äôre ready for the online FPS of your dreams, dive into this unparalleled free game that takes online multiplayer to new heights. Perfect for anyone hungry for solo play first person shooter fun, or team play eSports competition.


_____________________________________________

Visit our official site at http://gmlft.co/website_EN
Check out the new blog at http://gmlft.co/central

Don't forget to follow us on social media:

comments: Forced ads. Everytime I go to play a mission I get forced to watch a 30 second ad. I learned that its faster to just close the game and try again, and hope I dont get another ad. And none of the ads are skippable. I once replayed a level and got an ad while I was getting shot at. The game did not pause while the ad played.

I played this game once in 2019. I unlocked many classes like sapper ,marauder. Now I reinstalled it but I can't retrieve the data from the previous attempt. I logged in with the Google play account today but can't load the previous progress , I also checked the Google play account it still shows I made some 14 achievements.

Gameloft should be shivering with embarrassement at this failure of a game and someone needs to be fired. The disrepect they show to the players is unreal. The game is overrun with cheaters who stand outside the maps and kill everyone. Turrets still fire through walls. Every other game is filled with players who stand still but you can't shoot them but they shoot you. This game is unplayable and the european staff responsible should be fired. Scum, just scum.

I Installed this game after around 1 year, i thought this game is not p2w anymore but i was wrong this game is still filled heavily with p2w stuff, matchmaking system sucks, take my advice go ahead for call of duty mobile, there is no mean to play greedy gameloft's games where activision is giving you console like f2p games Really disappointed of gameloft

The graphics are fairly good, and so as the story line but there is a major issue that is server. I could barely play a complete match before it says network lost even when I have Wifi router connection. I don't think it's network issue may be it's your server issues...

title: Icing On The Cake
description:
From the makers of I Peel Good, Icing on the Cake is your next obsession. Put your cake decorating skills to the test! Relax and channel your inner baker in Icing on the Cake. So many fun pastries for you to rotate, pipe, decorate and smooth out? Can you make the perfect cake? Fun and easy to pick up but don‚Äôt miss a spot... Will you be the first one to finish them all?


Color and decorate the perfect wedding cake or birthday cake. The tasty end results will leave you feeling hungry for more! Any time is cake time.

Game Features:


1. Zen Out

Ice ice baby! Take your time and relax and create the perfect cake


2. Smooth Smooth Icing

The most realistic food simulation game there is. The realistic cakes will leave you hungry.


3. Bake ALL the cakes

Endless amount of cakes for you to ice and smooth. Can you put the icing on all of the cakes?


4. Feel the smooth

Play, relax, and feel satisfied with every cake you ice. Feel the realistic sensation of icing and spreading.


Whether you like icing, like smoothing or just want to spin and color, Icing on the Cake will take you there. This is the best and most zen cake simulation game there is. Good luck putting Icing on the Cake down!

title: Block! Hexa Puzzle‚Ñ¢
description:
üî∑üî∂Block! Hexa Puzzleüî∑üî∂
The perfect game to build your spatial intelligence and geometric skills!

Your puzzle skills will be put to the test with this new angle on the classic dissection puzzle game! Our unique hexagonal pieces will stretch your mind in ways you never imagined in this addictive puzzle game. Enjoy the satisfaction of pieces fitting neatly in place, filling the board with a burst of color! With each block that fills the gaps, your ability will grow ‚Äì but so will the challenges! 

Are you ready to push your limits??

HOW TO PLAY
‚Ä¢ Arrange the blocks to fit them all in the grid frame.
‚Ä¢ Hexa blocks can‚Äôt be rotated.
‚Ä¢ Collect block pieces to level up!
‚Ä¢ Be careful of the blockades.
‚Ä¢ No time limits!

SPECIAL FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Simple gameplay you can master in seconds, but be warned! Levels can get tricky!
‚Ä¢ Thousands of unique levels to get your brain going all day long! What a BRAIN stretch!
‚Ä¢ Don't forget to get your daily rewards & earn even more with SPECIAL QUESTS!
‚Ä¢ Stunning, colorful graphics & themes for pure entertainment & excitement!
‚Ä¢ Perfect brain-teaser & perfect for small pockets of time 
‚Ä¢ Play stress-free! Your game will automatically save.

NOTES
‚Ä¢ Block! Hexa Puzzle‚Ñ¢ contains ads like banner, interstitial, video and house ads.

comments: Game is quite good but so many ads! I got to level 17 and uninstalled, only because after every two levels you are being forced to watch an ad. Considering that the first levels are very easy and only take 2-3 seconds to solve each of them, basically after 10-15 seconds of playing you have to watch 30-35 seconds ads, and you can't skip or go back to the home menu, unless you quit the game. I understand that it is a free game and you rely on ads for your income, but man! Let us play a little bit!

I'm getting use to it and I really do love the game that I will keep playing it. You better fix the bug in this game I get to playing then it comes up with a white circle that goes around and I half to turn my Phone off to star it again so please fix it. Thankyou
An absolute fun puzzle game!This game is one of the best puzzle games I've ever played,plus I don't have to worry about ads because i could just turn off my wifi on my tablet!Absolutely love it!

I got hooked as soon as I started playing! I love the style, the puzzles are progressively more challenging but in a gradual way. I wish the developers spent more time optimizing the game for modern screens, the hole-punch cutout on my screen makes the game render with a large black bar instead of a simple fill around the hole. Also, since I've paid for an ad-free experience, I would expect the notification in the corner to watch an ad go away, but they're still there
more ad than game. continual ads. ads on the screen when you play, ads between each puzzle, ads, ads, ads. neat concept, but experience is ruining by continual ads EVERYWHERE.

title: Looper!
description:
Take a trip through Looper - a joyous, melodious casual game that puts your sense of rhythm and timing to the test.

Every tap starts a colourful new beat that travels along increasingly complex constellations - get your timing wrong and the beats could crash and burn. Get it right, however, and experience the simple satisfaction of looping harmony.

Featuring hundreds of unique levels, each designed to sooth and satisfy your puzzling needs. Looper is a music puzzle game like no other.


SUBSCRIBE TO LOOPER!
 
Subscribe to Looper! for all of the following benefits:
* 3 NEW beat skins to use in the game
* 3 NEW Exclusive audio tracks
* ALL Levels unlocked, PLUS, 20 special levels 
* FREE solution hints for ALL levels
* The Remove Ads product, which removes non-optional adverts from the game
 
SUBSCRIPTIONS INFORMATION:
 
Looper! VIP Membership access offers two membership options:

1) A weekly subscription costing $5.49 per week after a 3 day FREE trial period.

2) A monthly subscription costing $14.49 per month.

After buying this subscription, 3 new beat skins to use in the game, 3 new and exclusive audio tracks, all levels unlocked, plus, 20 special levels you will be able to play in the game, free solution hints for all levels and you will unlock and remove non-optional ads product, which removes non-optional adverts from the game. This is an auto-renewable subscription. The payment is charged to your account after confirmation. The subscription is renewed unless you unsubscribe 24 hours before the period ends. Your account will also be charged for renewal
The prices notes are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may change and actual charges may be converted to local currency.
End of trial and subscription renewal:
- The payment is charged to your iTunes account after a confirmation of purchase
- The subscription is renewed unless you unsubscribe 24 hours before the end of the current period
- The account will be charged for renewal 24 hours before the end of the current period at the standard cost of the weekly subscription
- The user may manage the subscription and auto-renewal by accessing the user's account settings after purchase in the store
- No cancellation of the current subscription is permitted during the active subscription period
- Any unused portion of the free trial period will be forfeited when the subscription is purchased
Cancelling a trial or subscription:
- In order to cancel a subscription during the free trial period you need to cancel it through your account in the Store. This must be done at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial period to avoid being charged.

Looper! VIP Membership access offers two membership options:

1) A weekly subscription costing $5.49 per week after a 3 day FREE trial period.

2) A monthly subscription costing $14.49 per month.

After buying this subscription, 3 new beat skins to use in the game, 3 new and exclusive audio tracks, all levels unlocked, plus, 20 special levels you will be able to play in the game, free solution hints for all levels and you will unlock and remove non-optional ads product, which removes non-optional adverts from the game. This is an auto-renewable subscription. The payment is charged to your account after confirmation. The subscription is renewed unless you unsubscribe 24 hours before the period ends. Your account will also be charged for renewal
The prices notes are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may change and actual charges may be converted to local currency.
End of trial and subscription renewal:
- The payment is charged to your iTunes account after a confirmation of purchase
- The subscription is renewed unless you unsubscribe 24 hours before the end of the current period
- The account will be charged for renewal 24 hours before the end of the current period at the standard cost of the weekly subscription
- The user may manage the subscription and auto-renewal by accessing the user's account settings after purchase in the store
- No cancellation of the current subscription is permitted during the active subscription period
- Any unused portion of the free trial period will be forfeited when the subscription is purchased
Cancelling a trial or subscription:
- In order to cancel a subscription during the free trial period you need to cancel it through your account in the Store. This must be done at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial period to avoid being charged.

comments: Wow, this is a great game! Idk y people are saying it's bad and it lags. Well I can give some tips: Switch on airplane mode, it will stop and and prevent lag. Also whenever you are going to a new level, close the game open it again and press the next level. Do this for about 3-4 times and lag will reduce. I followed all these steps and now it's very smooth! Also you have to feel the beat in the game, and go accordingly. I mix sounds and audio, so I'm good at that. Great time killer and gr8 game!

This game used to be great, I hate to say this but now it is horrible! The game gets to about level 8 then on level 9 u get to the last part and guess what, it freezes! I tried redownloading it, restarting my phone, and going in and out of the game but nothing worked! Dont waste your time playing for 2 minutes, freezing then wasting more time trying to get it to work.

I love this and all and I love the app, but why 1 star? Well it is simple, I love this before, BUT then it all got laggy and stuff. And also, it freezes in your screen, sometimes even my phone would glitch and my phone is FREAKING BRAND NEW!! And so, I give it 1 star cause of that, sometimes it also stops popping out any balls. I keep clicking yet, nothing is coming out. So if you wanna play this, go a head, but I wouldn't so I am just deleting it. If the glitch and freezing isn't there, 5 star.

This is an amazing game, but what frustrates me a lot is the extreme lag i get whenever I open up the game and start playing a level. You may not get as much lag if you have a phone or tablet with VERY good connection.

The game is a really cool and fun concept but theres so many ads. Everytime you complete a level an ad pops up. I use to have this game and it use to run great little to no lag and it had a few ads but it wasnt constant.

Travel all over the world.

comments: I really liked this game! At one point I was upset from the losing messages, but then they started to be funny! This isn't a game I would play all day but when I only have a couple of minutes it's fun to blow up a pinata!

Fun and interesting game design which can easily be addictive. The downside is the constant ads. For example when you finish a level you get an ad and after that you get asked to watch an ad for additional rewards.
I like it its a fun wacky game but just add more weapons and make everything more in reach and add like different modes other than that its a great game!
So far so so, game is slow at responding at doesn't add points properly game lacks the variety I would expect from this kind of game. Will play a while and repost. At a later time...tony
This game is very funny üòÇ and relaxing but I don't like how you need to restart everything to get diamonds 4/5

title: AT&T Secure Family‚Ñ¢
description:
Peace of Mind Just Got A Lot Easier

As seen on Good Morning America, AT&T Secure Family‚Ñ¢ puts parents in control of their children‚Äôs phone use.  Find your family, control your child‚Äôs screen time and manage their phone use.

Features
*	Locate Family -Track your child on demand or on a regular schedule, for example every day after school
*	Location Alerts - Receive alerts when your child enters or leaves a location, like school or practice. 
*	Location History - Review where your child has been over the previous seven days.
*	Limit Screen Time - Block your child‚Äôs mobile data and Wi-Fi, on demand or on a schedule you choose.
*	Content Filters ‚Äì Block inappropriate Apps and websites by age or customize your own settings.

AT&T Secure Family is free for the first 30 days. After the first 30 days, you will be billed $7.99 each month (includes support for up to 10 lines.)  Service auto renews every 30 days unless cancelled.

AT&T Secure Family Companion App

AT&T Secure Family is designed to work with AT&T Secure Family Companion, a free app in the Google Play Store.  Download it to your child‚Äôs phone and pair it with your phone to get all the features.

AT&T Wireless customers ‚Äì pairing with AT&T Secure Family Companion is recommended to get all the features of Secure Family.  If you do not pair a device, features are limited to AT&T network-based location, scheduled location alerts and location history.
   
AT&T PREPAID wireless customers and customers on other wireless carriers ‚Äì pairing with AT&T Secure Family Companion on the child device is required to use any of the Secure Family features.
Other important information about AT&T Secure Family:

AT&T Postpaid Wireless customers billed by AT&T:
  -   View, modify or cancel anytime within the app.  
  -   Secure Family and Companion app users must be on the same account.  Only authorized app users have permission to locate a family member.
  -   There is a compatibility conflict that can prevent the addition of AT&T Secure Family Companion to your companion device if you have AT&T Mobile Security Plus running on the same companion device.  If you wish to continue with the purchase, you must either remove AT&T Mobile Security Plus from your account or downgrade to AT&T Mobile Security Basic on the companion device before adding AT&T Secure Family Companion. 
  
AT&T PREPAID wireless customers, and customers of other US Wireless carriers billed by Google Play Store:
  -   After first 30 days, $7.99/mo. will be charged to your Google Play account.  Subscription will automatically renew each month unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current month‚Äôs billing period.
  -   To view, modify or cancel your subscription, go to account settings in Google Play Store.  No cancellation of the current month‚Äôs subscription is allowed.  No refunds or credits for partial subscription terms. 

General:
  -   Devices running the Secure Family App or Secure Family Companion App require Android v. 5.0 or higher.
  -   Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically reduce battery life.
  -   Availability, timeliness or accuracy of location is not guaranteed. Coverage not available in all areas. The collection, use, and disclosure of any personal information through this application is governed by AT&T's Privacy Policy found at: att.com/privacypolicy. View the AT&T Secure Family website at att.com/securefamily

recentChanges: Release includes bug fixes plus improved pairing between the parent and child phones for those using the App for location tracking only.  A VPN will not be installed for location tracking alone.  VPN will be required for parental controls features such as pause internet or content filtering.  Includes icons on the Map indicating use of cell towers for network location (lower accuracy) or GPS (higher accuracy).  We continue to listen to our valued customers and work to improve your experience.
comments: Quality just keeps going downhill. Seems like bugs get bigger with each update. Lately, when trying to locate another phone on our plan, it can only tell me the county that the phone is in - which is absolutely useless information. Other times, it can't locate the phone at all. AT&T....if you want people to pay for this app, then you need to get it together.

9/25/2020 Has been much more stable. 7/1/2019 I don't get it, I have many apps but this is the only one that regularly has problems. 11/14/2018 What idiot would discontinue an app that was working perfectly fine before the replacement app was ready? Someone at AT&T is really lacking. Update: And the comedy continues! The new replacement app, "Secure Family", is finally here. Location improvements? Can't even locate anyone at all in my family. Now let's see how long it takes AT&T to fix it.

App wont open, keep getting notifications saying the app is updating...been doing this for 3 days..why is it updating for 3 days....not able to use it at all. This type of problem happens all the time, in the past I have had the problem of it opening and then it immediately closes. Even uninstalling and reinstalling does not help. So frustration.

I keep having the app pause and freeze. It states update and freezes. Everytime it updates that happens and it seems to update often like often. I also placed 3 phones on gps and connected their phones for some reason one phone says it is no longer connected since the update and I dont have phone to fix this error but I need this program because the people that have these phones need to be found if they are lost. And I depend on this app to help do that. That's why I have every 1 hr schelduled

This app is terrible. Att Smart Limits was a much better app. Each time I unpause my sons internet access, he has to restart his phone for it allow him internet. Also the GPS is not accurate. His phone was turned on at 9am and at 1pm I get a notification he arrived at school when he had been there all day. You cannot block specific phone numbers like you could in Smart Limits.

title: Dead Empire: Zombie War
description:
Dead Empire: Zombie War is a real-time war strategy game set in the late modern period. The story is about a group of unique and fascinating women with different life experiences, who help the Allies fight against the invaders and the evil zombie forces created by the invaders in the war. You will play as a Commander in the game. Train powerful troops and recruit beautiful female Officers to lead. Unite other Commanders to eliminate the Invaders and evil zombie forces and finally achieve world peace by establishing a stronger Guild!

1. Brand New Troop Control System
The game uses a new free control system that allows players to command multiple troops to march, garrison, and change targets and marching routes on the battlefield. Strong troops cannot prevail without excellent leadership and strategies!

2. Vivid War Scenes
We have created vivid cities and battlefields based on actual geography from late modern Europe, including landmarks that people will recognize. Plus, we have also simulated the famous war machines used during the late modern period, which aim to bring you back to the era when legends emerged.

3. Real-time Multiplayer Combat
Fighting against real players is always more complicated and appealing than battling the A.I. You still need help from other players, even when you're strong because you won't be fighting against one opponent. It could be an entire Guild, or even more.

4. Multiple Countries to Select
You can choose different countries to play in the game. Each country has its own Country Trait, and the combat units unique to each country are all famous war machines that served the countries throughout history. You can lead the army that you want in the game, and launch attacks on your enemies!
Millions of players have joined this legendary battlefield. Expand your Guild, show your power, and conquer this land!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/zombiewar.tap4fun

recentChanges:
- New Base Decoration "Halloween Castle"

- New Avatar Frame "Scorpio"

- Added a new Readiness Confirmation mail to Guild Mail. Guild members can vote to approve or oppose the contents of the mail, and the mail sender can view the voting results.

- You can now view your opponent's troop info in Normandy Arena.

comments: Pretty lame considering you can not delete your account. Simply Uninstall and supposedly solves the problem. Why is this feature not at the beginning at base of the game? I should be able to delete my stuff. It is my stuff to delete if I want to. Played both versions and it is not so friendly to f2p. I mean I thought it to be a real RTS but not nearly close.

Too many potty mouth kids INSULTING each other and PLAYERS without any reaction from developers on report. Stopped playing, uninstalled. It's basically like any other PAY game. The more MONEY you spend, the more you can HARASS others. Not the most elaborate strategic war games I've seen but its ok. Gets a little boring with all the waiting around. Horny sounding and looking animated girls narrate the game progress. Whatever floats one's boat...

It's a good game. But still needs some adjustments. Like, it unecessarily cuts my 1500 game golds in the name of HQ transportation, when I tried to transport it to a nearest place of my guild member. After deducting the above amount, it simply says it cannot be done due to some kind of boundries. I mean, which type of game is this when I am unable to help my team members, couldn't arrange a rally or be a part of it? Seriously, a lot more work is required to improve this game.
Great, attack heads could be improved, it's hard to pull the troop from the crowd and then you get annoyed.

This is Kiss of War with Zombies. That's it. As far as I can tell, there are very minor differences, such as you can't choose the United Kingdom, Helena isn't available in the beginning, and Pandora is now Chimera (though a lot of the spoken dialogue still references Pandora). Really lazy re-skin, but that music makes all of the difference. Stick with KoW is you've put any significant time in it, otherwise play this for the awesome music. Oh, and zombies!

title: Injustice: Gods Among Us
description:
Build an epic roster of DC super heroes and villains and get ready for battle! INJUSTICE: GODS AMONG US is a free-to-play collectible card game where you build a roster of characters, moves, powers, and gear and enter the arena in touch-based 3-on-3 action combat.

FIGHT
Use the touch screen mechanics of your mobile device to battle your enemies in 3-on-3 action combat. Swipe and tap to perform combos and build your power to pull off special attacks and super moves taken straight from the console version of the game.

LEVEL UP
Build your move set, increase your powers, upgrade your characters and gear, and beat your competition. Constantly evolve your card collection to fit your style of play and put your best team forward as you take on a series of DC super hero and villian combatants.z

ONLINE MULTIPLAYER
Take on real opponents in Online Multiplayer Battles. Compete against players worldwide on the leaderboards, and in tournaments filled with awesome rewards. Watch replays of your previous offensive and defensive battles to hone your skills and your team lineup. Lead your team to victory!

MASSIVE ROSTER
Collect and play as your favorite DC Comics icons: Superman, Batman, Wonder Woman, The Joker, Green Arrow, Flash, Bane, Green Lantern, Doomsday, and many others. With each alternate version of these iconic characters you get a new set of powers and moves, and a whole new fight!

AMAZING GRAPHICS
Delivers best-in-class graphics on your phone or tablet, with custom animations for every single super hero and villain. Take the battle to Arkham Asylum, the Batcave, The Watchtower, and other iconic locales from DC Comics, fully rendered in 3D.


Please Note: INJUSTICE: GODS AMONG US is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money.

comments: It's a great app, it doesn't take that long to master, the community is great (especially on the reddit, it's full of players helping eachother), and when you're ready to tackle the weekly challenge, you get a great free character! I've been playing since about late July, and I already have about 6-7 gold characters, the majority I got for free! Also, the MP mode is a little off-balance, since the Nth Metal characters screw it over, but it's still just an incredibly fun game.

In my oppinion, this is by far one of the best free to play mobile games of all time. Game was highly unstable when I picked it up, patches have greatly improved performance and crashes are rare now. There is an offline mode, survival mode, and online battle mode, in addition to the relatively new "breakthrough" and "phantomzone" modes for increased unlock potential. Also, did I mention there are zero ads??!! I do think the new Nth metal heroes are slightly overpowered, and expensive to level.

A simplified version of the console game. Fighting animations are smooth (compared to the second one). It might be just my phone but there is something robotic and off with the injustice 2 mobile fighting animations that doesnt feel normal compared to this one. Gameplay is simple.You get to play, collect and level up your favorite DC characters on the go. Having this game available offline is very convenient too. Granting easy access so that you can continue grinding even without wifi.

This game is awsome the fighting is simple and easy to understand and the range of characters and their depictions are super cool. The only thing that would make it better is if they had updated the graphics and save system instead of making a whole new game that is not as fun in my opinion because of the massive amount of commands you have to memorize inorder to fight.

Good game, only problem is the survival rules regarding changing characters. How is putting a character in and subbing them out to maybe use later regarded as an elimination, huh. I lost 20K coins and some other stuff, all because I mistakenly put a character I didn't want to put at the time and confirmed before going back to change it. When I finally lost, I was banking on using it to clear round 9 before cashing out. Alas dumb rules cost me. MXM what a stupid rule, seriously.
