comments: Absolutely stunningly beautiful game. A piece of art in video game form and easy to maneuver. Though the different obstacles & beautiful scenery coming at me at such a fast pace made me dizzy & semi nauseous. It's sad because I really could've delved into this game for hours on end. The music is relaxing as well. Keep doing what you're doing Noodlecake studios!! 5/5

Another beautiful adventure with Alto & friends, don't miss out on this amazing fun game, challenging slip & glide fast ride down slops scoring high points along the way by pulling off a few flips & tricks!! Love the beautiful scenes backdropped behind with a wonderful soundtrack, super chill, wicked game, I love Alto characters, this game rocks!!

Really fun, it's the same, just running but the challenges can be difficult so it's not bad at all. I always play it on the bus to school because I don't have mobile data so I can only use non Internet stuff. This is really good and you should install it.

Developers, I really love your game but i have some ideas that may do this game better. I think it's a good idea to add all the features of Zen mode in a main mode because the combo score and another numerals distract you sometime and this beautiful musical composition from Zen mode deserves to be heard in a simple mode. And the second idea is to add kilometres score in Zen

The ads ruin it! Clicking X still opens the ads!!! FIX IT! The game itself is nice and fun, ads finance it, makes sense. But these ads are too often (debatable) and when they are done, clicking the X to get back to the game opens them in the browser. This is borderline harassment! A second click after. going back to the game app, clicking the X closes it. So it is intended by the developers to get more money as your click is now also triggering their website. FIX IT, this is cheap!

title: Unburden ‚Äì Anxiety, Stress, Depression Chat App
description:
Introduction ‚Äì
Unburden is a community of people who are fighting Depression, Anxiety, Panic Attacks, Relationships issues etc. and want to talk to someone. Listeners can also sign up on unburden and help the people who are dealing with mental health issues.

You will always remain 100% anonymous on unburden and chat 1 ‚Äì to ‚Äì 1 with listeners any time. On Unburden, speak your mind without the feeling of being judged.

What it IS?
This depression chat app provides a safe and confidential space to all those who need to talk to someone about anxiety, depression, stress and loneliness, confine into someone but do not have access to professional psychologist, psychiatrist or therapists due to economic or social reasons. 
Here you can get help from all the kind hearted people around the world, or you can choose to help others get things off their chest.

We believe in community service, and unburden is just a medium of bringing sharers and listeners together. 

What this app is NOT
Unburden is not a replacement for professional Mental Health Experts, psychologist, psychiatrist or therapists. If you have requirement & have access to professional services then it is highly recommended that you visit them, Mental Health is Important!

Why we NEED it?
We Believe that everyone who needs help should get it. And all of us together can make this happen. We can atleast virtually be there for each other when we are feeling down (or jolly). Users are the core of unburden app. Users willing to help each other are what make this app what it is.
- Keeping things BOTTTLED UP is a very unhealthy practice
- Talking to people about what‚Äôs been stressing and worrying you will help you
- Comfort of having someone to share thoughts with is of healing nature

Who Needs it?
WHO NEEDS UNBURDEN ‚Äì ANTI DEPRESSION APP?
1. People who require support to deal with 
- Depression
- Anxiety
- Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder (OCD)
- Panic attacks
- Post Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD)
- Mood disorders
- Stress 
- LGBTQ
- Gender identity crisis
- anything which is not good for your mental health
2. People who feel lonely and are hesitant to reach out due to social stigma and economic concerns.
3. People who have saviors in them and love to help community, they can join as listeners, because all heroes don‚Äôt wear capes.
4. People who want to speak their mind without worrying of being judged.

Confidentiality and Privacy
"Confidentiality" and "Privacy" are two of the main Pillars of this app. We have taken all the necessary measures to ensure that nothing hampers your privacy (we respect your privacy) and once you complete sign-up process, only thing we will know about you is your 'username'.
Your email-id and password are encrypted in a way that even we ourselves can't decrypt it.
- We won't know your email-id so you will never receive any annoying promotional emails.
- Your chats will NEVER be stored.
- We will NEVER share your username with anyone.

recentChanges:
- Ready for some Hogwarts Halloween fun? Then check out our special spooktacular activities going all month!

comments: Good graphics (mouth movements need some help.), good storyline, some inconsistencies, but, not too bad. EXPENSIVE! Unless you have A LOT of patience and timing. The 8 hour conversations, that take 30+ energy to complete 1/5 of it. Ridiculous. And , forbid, you can't make it back in time to finish it..... all that time and energy wasted. I spent some money in the game and regret it. It really isn't worth it. Do the math.

I love this game! The storyline, characters mini games and more. However I do have a minor issue with the energy. It runs out really quickly and takes quite a long time to recharge again. Another small thing with the energy is sometimes if I'm over the energy limit, the excess energy I collect does not count and sometimes I lose a bit of energy because of this. However amazing game! Definitely worth downloading :)

Frustrating at times, when it comes to events. You either have to be willing to put in real money or accept the fact you aren't going to win. Dueling spell chances are overpowering against you, only getting 1 stun in three matches (which is often)! While the opponent can get it one every 2-3 spells to maximum effect. The story is good and thrilling, good character relationships and lore. I've been playing since day one but you can see where the money grab is, which I have fallen into?

New review: I've been playing this a lot since lockdown, and am contantly impressed with the creativity and new stuff the devs come up with, for what is essentially a free game. Yes, they do push real money transactions, but if you don't mind spending more time on it, you get everything anyway. This game has an interesting story, lots of side quests, animals to interact with and loads of options to customise your character and dorm. And all of it in Hogwarts! :)

The game can be fun sometimes so I put 2 stars. However, its really just a scheme to make as much money from the players as possible. While the idea is a free to play concept, the amount of time it takes to recharge energy is actually ridiculous. They are constantly releasing time sensitive events that give the players less than 5 days to complete which on the surface is fine and kind of fun. But it is literally impossible to complete all of the tasks with the limited energy = pay to win game.

title: Episode - Choose Your Story
description:
Our newest update gets you to the good stuff 2x faster!
We‚Äôre talking faster load times, smoother animations and juicier stories.
 
Episode lets you LIVE your stories through love, romance, adventure, and drama. Wouldn‚Äôt it be amazing if YOU were a character in your favorite story? Episode lets you do just that with over 100,000 gripping stories, where you make choices that matter.

With billions of reads, Episode is the world‚Äôs largest collection of interactive stories where YOU choose your destiny. Or become a creator and write your own!

How does it work?
‚Ä¢ Customize your avatar and design your outfits
‚Ä¢ Develop relationships with your favorite characters - will they be rivals or lovers?
‚Ä¢ Change your fate through your choices
‚Ä¢ Discover all of the different endings
‚Ä¢ Immerse yourself in thousands of diverse worlds, the options are endless!

Not only can you read your favorite stories, you can also write your own! Write and publish your very own interactive stories on Episode‚Äôs platform, amassing millions of reads yourself.

Some of our favorites reads:

LOVE ON FIRE: You‚Äôve been selected to join the ultimate dating competition. You‚Äôll live in a luxury beach-front mansion with other hot singles and look for your true love! 
 
RULE BREAKER: Find out what happens when you start crushing on someone who's technically "off limits." Will you pursue that romantic spark?
 
THE K*SS LIST is here! Kentwood Academy is ripe for taking over. Continue your perfect streak of ruling schools by kissing 10 of Kentwood's hottest singles.
 
IT‚ÄôLL BE OUR SECRET: Fighting infertility becomes easier when you and your super cute neighbor start a secret affair. The drama that comes with it...not so easy!
 
I MARRIED A MILLIONAIRE: Do opposites attract? You‚Äôve never believed in love... but when you marry a sexy millionaire, you begin to think otherwise.

FRIENDS WITH BENEFITS: Things between you and your BFF are suddenly...changing. Everyone says you can't cross that line, but what if the love is real?

Other goodies include:
‚Ä¢ Pretty Little Liars
‚Ä¢ Mean Girls: Senior Year
‚Ä¢ Clueless: School‚Äôs Out
‚Ä¢ Demi Lovato: Path to Fame
‚Ä¢ Falling for the Dolan Twins

PLUS‚Ä¶more new stories EVERY WEEK!

PRETTY LITTLE LIARS and all related characters and elements ¬© & ‚Ñ¢ Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc. (s18)
TM & ¬©2018 Paramount Pictures. All Rights Reserved.

PLEASE NOTE: Episode lets you purchase items within the game for real money. Please disable in-app purchases on your device if you do not want this feature to be accessible.

You're a contestant of a STEAMY new reality show starring 7 broke girls and 7 BILLIONAIRES. Once you get to the mansion, will you find love, or just fortune?

comments: its okay, but you need so many gems to get the stuff and like you got to wait THREE HOURS, to get only TWO ticket things to play again. Also when you finish a thing it only gives you ONE gem. Overall its a good app/game but it's just not as fun when you have to wait 3 hours, and then save your gems because some people don't have or don't want to spend money on a app/game for gems and a good story thing. Then to get all stories is 17 gems, which isn't bad at all, I get why it's 17.

I like how many stories there are and that you can choose where the path takes you but I do not like that all the more well thought out stories have so many choices that are gems. Either you spend your money or choose the option that is so bad. There are stories that have no gem options but I feel like most of those dont even have as many things you can choose. Overall I will give this a three star mainly because of the gem/giving money.

I enjoy reading the stories on episode. I don't have a major problem with gems, however it would be better if we started with a certain amount of gems. Also, I'm not sure, but I don't think you can see the rewards, e.g. after you read 50 episodes and you get 4 tickets every 3 hours. It would be more motivating if you could see how many episodes you have to read to unlock certain things.

Love this app and all the amazing storys. However, it becomes very frustrating when you want to pick an option but you have to pay for it with gems, no only this but I think it is ridiculous that you have to wait hours to get 4 passes, you should change it so you get one pass every couple of minutes (once you use a pass a 30 minute timer counts down to give you another one) as once you are very engrossed in a story you have to wait a while to continue on with it. But the app is great.

It's actually a fun game. But... Why we can't replay the only episode like episode 5 but need to replay from episode 1. Sometimes we might make some mistake, but we need to replay all the game again. Overall its actually fine. But sometimes I watch finish an ad to get the deducted of 30 minutes from waiting the pass, it told me that it have no add available now. So I just waste my times and get a not available??

title: DINO HUNTER: DEADLY SHORES
description:
Hunt or be hunted! Embark on the dinosaur hunting expedition of a lifetime to kill the ultimate game in Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores.

HUNT DINOSAURS
Journey to a hidden, untouched Jurassic island and kill the most ferocious animals in history.  Encounter Jurassic beasts long thought extinct, from the docile stegosaurus to the terrifying T. rex.

VISIT EXOTIC Jurassic LOCATIONS
Kill dinosaurs in lush and dangerous Jurassic environments like the shipwreck-strewn coast, overgrown jungle and dinosaur boneyard!

EQUIP POWERFUL WEAPONS
Load up on firepower with destructive weapons like the rocket launcher and shuriken crossbow.  You‚Äôll need a powerful arsenal and an expert shooter strategy to kill these dinosaurs!

MASTER A UNIQUE SHOOTER CHALLENGE SERIES
Progress through varied shooter series to win rifles, shotguns and assault rifles. Make your kills and complete them all for even greater rewards!

EXPERIENCE AMAZING GRAPHICS
Dynamic shadows, hi-res textures and realistic Jurassic models all combine to make this one of the most beautiful dinosaur shooter games on your mobile device!

High-end, immersive tablet gameplay!

‚ÄúIt‚Äôs as if Glu Mobile was listening in on my mind as I imagined how good Deer Hunter 2014 would be with dinosaurs.‚Äù ‚Äì Kotaku
 
‚Äú‚Ä¶ I am totally, absolutely, 100% completely behind blasting dinosaurs with guns until they explode, and happily that's exactly what Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores will let you do.‚Äù ‚Äì AppSpy
 
‚ÄúDino Hunter: Deadly Shores dishes up tons of behemoth-shooting action. It‚Äôs an easy game to enjoy.‚Äù ‚Äì Gamezebo
 
‚ÄúDino Hunter: Deadly Shores is a solid shooter. The dinosaurs in the game are very well detailed and the game allows you to jump right in‚Ä¶‚Äù ‚Äì Modojo

PLEASE NOTE:
- This game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items, which will charge your Google account. You can disable in-app purchasing by adjusting your device settings.
-This game is not intended for children.
- Please buy carefully.
- Advertising appears in this game.
- This game may permit users to interact with one another (e.g., chat rooms, player to player chat, messaging) depending on the availability of these features. Linking to social networking sites are not intended for persons in violation of the applicable rules of such social networking sites.
- A network connection is required to play.
- For information about how Glu collects and uses your data, please read our privacy policy at: www.Glu.com/privacy
- If you have a problem with this game, please use the game‚Äôs ‚ÄúHelp‚Äù feature.  

FOLLOW US at
Twitter @glumobile
facebook.com/glumobile

comments: I have played this game for 6 years now (even though I have had to start from the start again due to getting a new device) and I think it's just a great game over all it's always got something new for you and it never gets repetitive! (Oh and Logi Bear I read your review and that's a problem with the device not the game)

10/10 my phone isn't the greatest and even with such high graphics and quality it is lag free. Almost no ads, the pay is amazing, and there is an equal balance of easy quests and hard quests. (T-Rex is no joke. That thing is tough.) Overall great game. Used to play it a lot on my iPad a few years ago. I'm biased a bit cause of nostalgia lol.

My experience with this company is misery, i personally have had over ¬£40.00 in credits to which i have been passed from Google play store and the game builder time after time. I'm writing this review to tell others what sort of company this is, it is a good game but as for the after service that SUCKS! I have told every gamer i know to boycott this company for your future peace of mind, do the same these people need to be taught not to steal other people's money, thank you for your ears!....

This game was the best game, but the energy thing is very bad you just have to waste 1 or 2 hours, and sometimes one day, and also it says that you can upgrade your weapon but then when you press the button to upgrade it just says ( PURCHASED ) and then i just have to watch those time wasting ads and it then even purchases 100 of my money seriously. Thought it is the and sometimes you shoot the dinosaur and it just shoots but doesn't damage and the dino just runs by it self . But the best game !

It is a very good game, but the energy thing is pretty stupid, that and all the guns almost cost good and there is pretty much no way to get gold, other than that though great game! Would definitely recommend this to a friend!

title: Piercing Parlor
description:
Can you handle the pain?
Become a piercing perfectionist and spread the bling!

Are you ready to experience your inner rebel? Ever wonder what it is like to get a piercing but your mom and dad said no? Wonder what you would look like with a piercing on your nose or lip? Now you can experience it all without feeling the pain! Fill in hundreds of different piercings and styles. Try to get the line up the requests as close as possible for them and don‚Äôt mess up! Get ready to feel the satisfaction of watching your needle slide right in! Relax and use your precision to point and aim the needle to make those holes. So many satisfying vibrations! Fun and easy to pick up but don‚Äôt miss a pierce... Will you be the first one to ring them all?

Hundreds of objects and styles for you to carefully size up, outline, design and pierce your customers. The final results will leave you feeling satisfied!
Game Features:

1. Simple but addicting mechanics
Feel the satisfaction without the pain? Customers will request what they want and it is up to you to match their desires

2. Run your own Piercing Parlor
Keep the customers coming. Whether it‚Äôs a heart, a zombie, or a skull, there are so many ear ring designs for you to give them.

3. Don‚Äôt miss
Ouch that hurts! Be careful of those soft spots

4. Feel the experience
Feel every stab with the best haptics experience there is.

Whether you like tattoos, needles or just want to pierce some people, Piercing Parlor will take you there. This is the best and most rewarding piercing simulation game there is. 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       


Visit https://lionstudios.cc/contact-us/ if have any feedback, need help on beating a level or have any awesome ideas you would like to see in the game!

Follow us to get news and updates on our other Award Winning titles;
https://lionstudios.cc/

Instagram.com/LionStudioscc

Youtube.com/c/LionStudiosCC

Our award-winning shopping app helps you save time and money.

The Walmart app is the most convenient way to check off your shopping and your groceries list. Get it done all at once from our store to your door.

The essential Walmart app offers many great ways to shop for everyone:

Shop millions of items, available for delivery and pickup

With Walmart as your local grocery store, getting groceries have never been easier - do your grocery shopping through the app and select the best option for you: curbside pickup or delivery

Our pharmacy makes ordering a prescription or getting a flu shot quick and simple, too

Walmart+ is here! It‚Äôs the membership that helps you save even more time and money.

With the Walmart app, you can easily access your member-only benefits.

Free unlimited delivery
This is grocery shopping made simple - save time by getting groceries while you shop for electronics, home goods, and more, from our store to your door

1-hour delivery windows as early as the same day on fresh food
Same everyday low prices you love.

Member prices on fuel
Save 5¬¢ per gallon at Walmart and Murphy stations.
Available at over 1,500 convenient locations.

Mobile scan & go
Shop and check out with your phone in-store.
Contact-free checkout.
‚ÄØ

Do Not Sell My Personal Information

‚ÄØPlease scroll down to the footer of our Privacy Policy below to find the "Do Not Sell My Personal Information" link.‚ÄØ

https://corporate.walmart.com/privacy-security‚ÄØ
summary: Easy shopping, plus grocery delivery or pickup.
recentChanges: This version contains stability fixes, making your shopping experience more seamless.
comments: The newer versions have a lot of glitches and is extremely slow. For example, sometimes I add items to my cart and then they all disappear. Sometimes the app will suddenly have every item listed as out of stock and you have to restart. When you add items and hit + to increase the number of items it takes forever. Hopefully they fix these issues.

This new update is buggy and I can't check out. It took me an hour to fill my cart due to all the bugs and when I finally clicked check out of course that failed too and I lost the last pick-up slot of the day and have to go grocery shopping in the snow now... I have a Samsung Galaxy. The bugs were: search wouldn't work, browse by category wouldn't work, the app kept crashing and removing most of the items in my cart, and when I clicked check out it said "failed to fetch payment."

This app gets slower everytime I use it. It's more like a glitch generator, and an anger creator. But, compared to going inside of that level of hell, there's really no difference, other than not dealing with the public clowns and Karen's. I continue to use this app though. Am I a glutton for punishment, or a slave of this corporate world that is left no other options?......yes.

This ap is FRUSTRATING and is getting worse! The screen constantly freezes, it won't allow you to side swipe when you are supposed to be able to and right in the middle of looking at something the screen will go blank to "update" the page and sometimes it will come back up to the page you were on and sometimes take you all the way to the very beginning of opening the ap. And it's not my internet because it's very reliable and the ap does this no matter what service I'm using.

I thought it was me!! I literally bought a new phone to see if it would fix the issues. When uninstalling and reinstalling the app I just happened to take a look at the reviews, lo and behold every single person in the world has the same problem I do since they combined the websites,hece it completely sucks. I like everyone on here I'm going to have to use a different online shopping app for a different store because this app is useless.

title: Star Tracker - Mobile Sky Map & Stargazing guide
description:
Hey, get outdoors with your friends and enjoy star gazing! Let StarTracker guide you to explore the universe.

Just hold up and point the device to the sky and have fun! You can see any stars, constellations and deep sky objects you are watching in real time.

<< Please REMOVE the metal case or magnetic cover to avoid interference and get accurate orientation! >>
<< Calibration follow: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zrEzMggOnFQ >>

Features:
‚òÖ All data is offline!
‚òÖ Fits all screen sizes from 3.5 inch to 12 inch for any resolution!
‚òÖ Sun, Moon, Planets in Solar System, 88 Constellations and 8000+ stars visible to the naked eyes.
‚òÖ 12 Zodiac Constellations Art & some famous deep sky objects with magnificent graphics.
‚òÖ Location auto set by GPS, or set manually.
‚òÖ Auto hide all menus and enter AR track mode when you point your device to the sky.
‚òÖ Smooth motion flow and quick response which is realized by cutting edge signal processing technique.
‚òÖ Superb high quality graphic display by enabling the retina display of the device and the full screen anti-aliasing technology employment.

Pro version ($2.99 to unlock):
‚òÖ No ads & full main menu.
‚òÖ Full 88 Constellations & 100+ deep sky objects with magnificent graphics.
‚òÖ Search and guide you to stars, constellations, planets and deep sky objects.
‚òÖ 3D compass in AR mode, indicates position of objects you searched.
‚òÖ Time Machine menu and location menu to let you explore more on time and location dimension.
‚òÖ Night mode switch, protecting eye when doing star gazing outdoor.

recentChanges:
1.6.70:
- Bug fixing and performance tuning.
1.6.65:

comments: I love this app and how easy it is to use. Of note, though: if you have a magnetic case on your phone, take it off before you use this app. It kept giving me the sky for Central Africa when I'm in Arizona, USA! I love that I can turn features on and off, and the night vision is great for studying the night sky. Great for a layman like myself!

I LOVE this app. I think it's great. The compass works really really well, and it's usually pretty accurate when it comes to finding stars and constellations. My one complaint is that when I click on a notif it doesn't show up anywhere in the app. So if I see a notif and I don't read what it says or I don't really understand what it's saying I can't find out more about it after the app opens. If this one thing was fixed it would be 5/5 perfect app.

Just wish there were more options, such as when I see a notification I can close it but when the time comes I can see it again. I would also like to toggle back and forth from seeing the constellations' outlines to just seeing the stars. Overall it is a pretty cool experience when you are out in the open fields of rural Canada and can see a stellar experience.

Great app. Fun way to introduce my children to the wonders of the night sky. Just started astro photography, helping me find Galaxies of interest. My first stacked image turned out extremely well. Family and friends were very impressed.

A great app with plenty of detail & easy to use. It seems to be a lot more accurate than other similar apps I've tried. The only thing that seems to be missing is a red filter so your night sight isn't affected by looking at it. This would make it perfect & 5 stars.

title: Hello Stars
description:
Hello Stars is a puzzle video solving game.  It's easy to learn but very diffcult to master.

The job of each level is to guide a ball from a predetermined start point so that it touches all of the stars placed on the level. The ball and nearly all objects on the screen are affected by gravity. The first few levels are almost too easy, but as the difficulty increases you'll be thankful that you were able to practice the fundamentals of draw. As the game progresses, you'll have to use all sorts of theory to figure out a solution for each puzzle. 


The Game Features:
‚òÖ Hundreds of ways to solve each puzzle, can you find the best solution?
‚òÖ 220 of physics puzzles, more levels are comming soon!
‚òÖ Flexible thinking is going to become the key to victory.
‚òÖ Solutions can be found in the end of each level.
‚òÖ Play 100+ of challenging
‚òÖ Interesting physics puzzles, they're not as easy as they look.


We need translations
Please help us translate Hello Stars into your language like Spanish, Portuguese, French, German, Italian, Russian and other languages.
You can contact us via this email: üìÆcashgamesteam@gmail.comüìÆ. Thanks for your effort to help us.

Feel free to contact us by cashgamesteam@gmail.com if you have any problem about Hello Stars.

summary: Must use brain to finish all levels.
developerAddress: WAYSONCOMMERCIAL BUILDING 28CONNAUGHT ROAD WEST SHEUNG WANHONG KONG
comments: Fun Game, Too Many Ads. Finished a level? Watch an ad. Don't want an ad? Here's one anyway. Here's another ad, I didn't skip the last one fast enough. Way too much. I timed it and for every 2 minutes of actual gameplay, I had 3 minutes 48 seconds of total ads

It is really good in terms of the difficulty and the different gamemodes and I have to say that the sound and music is really good. There maybe too many ads but the is a cross button to click it away so not really a problem and I like the tutorial level as it is animated.

Annoying the app continues to show notifications even after they have been turned off, They just use a different push notification. I have had 6 notifications in 15 mins and I have now removed the app.

This game is fine in concept, unfortunately, it doesn't work in practice. A lot of puzzles require precise solutions, if you have big fingers, you've already lost. If you touch a wall, a simple solution would be to have the line skip over the wall, instead, you have to backtrack your fingere to draw it at a new angle. Not very practical, developers. This game was not made with the intention of satisfaction.

It's really unfortunate, because this game is kinda like Crayon Physics Deluxe, which I own but won't work. However, there's an ad after almost every quick puzzle, and you can't skip until the whole ad has played. Couple this with the fact that you can't simply pay to remove ads, but must purchase a subscription that's around 12 dollars a month. That's a little past insane.

recentChanges:
Thanks for using Credit Karma!

Our app is regularly updated to make it easier for you to track your financial progress. This version includes a number of performance improvements and squashes a few small pesky bugs.
comments: I like the new layout and look. However, I would give 5 stars if I didn't have to search for what comes through on the alert notifications. Example, "there's a special loan offer", where?! I have search for it, when the app should go right to the information that is on alert notification, and not just the home page. Many alerts I just ignore, because I become frustrated trying to find them. Just open directly to them once pressed, otherwise I'm just wasting time seeing the same information.

I really love this app and the website. It's convenient and easy to use. My only complaint right now it that no matter how many times I click on "Recommendations" and scroll through it, it ALWAYS says there is 1 waiting. It's been going on for a while and it's on both desktop and mobile, so I know it's not just this latest update to the app. I don't like the advertising of the credit cards all the time but I get it, to keep the app free you need to have ads, no problem. Recommend me stuff all the time, I don't care, just register that I've seen it once I have.

Great app, I mean ausome app, in less than a year, this app has helped me get all three of my credit scores boosted. They were all between 510-530 and now, only a year later all three range from 622-643. So this app has done wonders. After a year of doing what the app said I went from having no credit to having 3 credit cards and owning a house. SO CREDIT KARMA GETS A 10 STAR RATING FROM ME. I USED TO SPEND MONEY AS FAST AS IT HIT MY POCKET NOW I HAVE OVER 10,000 IN SAVINGS AND I'M A PACK RAT.

Good app, but this latest update sucks. I don't like the new UI, and it feels slower now. And one thing that's been bugging me forever, when you open the app and it displays where you enter your pin, raise all the numbers up. It's way too low. But the in app UI sucks now. Change it back please. It was easier on the eyes before and easier to read

I've been monitoring my credit for a couple years now with Credit Karma, but this is thee worst update they've done! Not to mention, your score in the app will never be what a lender pulls. So I just use it to monitor credit card usage and any collections. Other than that, the app is garbage. Edit to include CK's response: I already know that. I am informing others, because clearly your formula isn't accurate. And if it's not accurate... it's not useful.

comments: It's honestly addictive once you get the hang of it, which doesn't take long! And so far it's easy to level up and progress in the game unlike other games like this. Also literally no ads, unless you choose to watch an ad to speed up the already fast tasks! So I have nothing bad to say about it! Nice job Pewds!

This is from when i first played it. It is great and fun and i love it, but had to uninstall it bcs of problems with my storage. Now that i fixed my storage i reinstalled it but to my suprise i cant play. Im stuck im the loading screen where it has the logo of the game and the colorful background. If u can help me plz do

This game is actually very well made. The way they inserted mini games to keep you interested while you wait or if you wanna do something different. And the best part is its not the "pay to win" kind of mobile game with all the pop-up ads on top of it. You can just grind your way to the top or you can take the easier way around if you have money to spend. Absolutely love this game. No wonder it's still relevant üòÅüòâ

Ive had this app for 3 years now and let me just say: phoenomenal. You'd really think it would get boring after playing for awhile, but there are mechanisms set in place that make it just alot of fun. I absolutely recomend to anyone who wants to have a good time. The pixel art is also just incredible!

I used to love this game, but I call it bs now because it crashes too often or worse, it makes my phone too lagged that it forces me to hard reset my phone most of the time I attempt to log in to this game. I've been experiencing the same problem since February(as far as I can remember) but still, there's no improvement at all. It is so frustrating that I can play call of duty on my phone smoothly, but not tuber when supposedly, it is COD thay requires a better phone specs so WHY?!!!!

title: Resony: anxiety, stress & low mood self-management
description:
About Resony

Resony provides scientifically proven techniques to improve physical and emotional health and enhances productivity, even under pressure. This is achieved through reducing negative stress, anxiety and low mood and by building positive resources for enduring resilience. The techniques are developed by our experienced medical team and are based on neuroscience, positive psychology, behavioural science and physiology. Resony offers an integrated approach towards building resilience, addressing mind and body simultaneously to achieve faster and more sustainable results.

What does Resony do

The app is your personal guide to reduce negative stress, anxiety and low mood by building positive resources for resilience and sustainable peak performance at work. It starts with measuring your emotional well-being by asking a few simple questions. Based on your responses, Resony gives you a emotional well-being score and personalised techniques to improve your well-being and reduce stress, anxiety and low mood. Using the dashboard, you can track your score and verify if the techniques benefit you.

Main features of Resony

‚òÖ Wellbeing Check: 7-item self-assessment questions to personalise techniques and to track intensity of symptoms 
‚òÖ Resonant breathing: Reduce stress and anxiety and build resources for resilience and sustainable peak performance under pressure 	
‚òÖ Acute Stress Release Techniques: Assist before, during and after experiencing challenging situations
‚òÖ Progressive Muscle Relaxation: Deep relaxation to support ‚Äúletting go‚Äù, recovery and regeneration
‚òÖ Constructive Worry: Neutralise the impact of negative emotions, such as worry, anxiety, fear, anger etc. by raising emotions into conscious awareness and by neutralising them through naming them with precision. Based on cognitive behavioural therapy (CBT)
‚òÖ Constructive Gratitude: Gratitude journaling that helps reframe negative experience and create an enduring positive emotional state that is a foundation for stress reduction and creating adaptive resilience
‚òÖ Prioritised To-Do-List: Linked to constructive worry and constructive gratitude techniques which strengthens the power to implement change and enhances a sense of control
‚òÖ Nature Observation: Mindfulness technique to deepen your connection with nature and enhances concentration and memory
‚òÖ Active listening: Mindfulness technique which strengthens positive relationships and improves communication


What are the benefits of using Resony?

Using the techniques for 10-20 minutes daily can benefit you in the following ways:

Health & Well-being
‚Ä¢	Improve and maintain your health and well-being
‚Ä¢	Improve your sleep
‚Ä¢	Boost recovery from strain and ill health
‚Ä¢	Rejuvenation (healthy ageing) 

Emotion Regulation
‚Ä¢	Deal more effectively with pressure, trauma, change and crisis
‚Ä¢	Improve your regulation of emotions 
‚Ä¢	Reduce stress, anxiety, anger, fear and low mood 

Productivity at work (and home)
‚Ä¢	Access sustainable high-performance states of flow easily, even under pressure
‚Ä¢	Improve decision-making capacity in challenging circumstances 
‚Ä¢	Improve performance under pressure
‚Ä¢	Enhance creativity 
‚Ä¢	Boost confidence to handle problems
‚Ä¢	Access resourcefulness for problem solving
‚Ä¢	Improve concentration, memory and cognitive processing under pressure
‚Ä¢	Improve social skills

Resony provides scientifically proven techniques to improve physical and emotional health and enhances productivity, even under pressure. This is achieved through reducing negative stress, anxiety and low mood and by building positive resources for enduring resilience. The techniques are developed by our experienced medical team and are based on neuroscience, positive psychology, behavioural science and physiology. Resony offers an integrated approach towards building resilience, addressing mind and body simultaneously to achieve faster and more sustainable results.

What does Resony do

The app is your personal guide to reduce negative stress, anxiety and low mood by building positive resources for resilience and sustainable peak performance at work. It starts with measuring your emotional well-being by asking a few simple questions. Based on your responses, Resony gives you a emotional well-being score and personalised techniques to improve your well-being and reduce stress, anxiety and low mood. Using the dashboard, you can track your score and verify if the techniques benefit you.

Main features of Resony

‚òÖ Wellbeing Check: 7-item self-assessment questions to personalise techniques and to track intensity of symptoms
‚òÖ Resonant breathing: Reduce stress and anxiety and build resources for resilience and sustainable peak performance under pressure
‚òÖ Acute Stress Release Techniques: Assist before, during and after experiencing challenging situations
‚òÖ Progressive Muscle Relaxation: Deep relaxation to support ‚Äúletting go‚Äù, recovery and regeneration
‚òÖ Constructive Worry: Neutralise the impact of negative emotions, such as worry, anxiety, fear, anger etc. by raising emotions into conscious awareness and by neutralising them through naming them with precision. Based on cognitive behavioural therapy (CBT)
‚òÖ Constructive Gratitude: Gratitude journaling that helps reframe negative experience and create an enduring positive emotional state that is a foundation for stress reduction and creating adaptive resilience
‚òÖ Prioritised To-Do-List: Linked to constructive worry and constructive gratitude techniques which strengthens the power to implement change and enhances a sense of control
‚òÖ Nature Observation: Mindfulness technique to deepen your connection with nature and enhances concentration and memory
‚òÖ Active listening: Mindfulness technique which strengthens positive relationships and improves communication


What are the benefits of using Resony?

Using the techniques for 10-20 minutes daily can benefit you in the following ways:

Health & Well-being
‚Ä¢ Improve and maintain your health and well-being
‚Ä¢ Improve your sleep
‚Ä¢ Boost recovery from strain and ill health
‚Ä¢ Rejuvenation (healthy ageing)

Emotion Regulation
‚Ä¢ Deal more effectively with pressure, trauma, change and crisis
‚Ä¢ Improve your regulation of emotions
‚Ä¢ Reduce stress, anxiety, anger, fear and low mood

Productivity at work (and home)
‚Ä¢ Access sustainable high-performance states of flow easily, even under pressure
‚Ä¢ Improve decision-making capacity in challenging circumstances
‚Ä¢ Improve performance under pressure
‚Ä¢ Enhance creativity
‚Ä¢ Boost confidence to handle problems
‚Ä¢ Access resourcefulness for problem solving
‚Ä¢ Improve concentration, memory and cognitive processing under pressure
‚Ä¢ Improve social skills
summary: Free therapy and tracking for emotional well-being, stress and anxiety relief

title: Ruqya Healing Guide
description:
The Alruqya Healing app is designed under the guidance of both Sheikh Khalid Al-Hibshi and Abu Nadeer, two highly recognised and respected Raaqi's in the field of Ruqya.

The main purpose of this application is to Empower yourself with correct tools and and knowledge so that you can follow correct treatment plan according to your signs and symptoms and to be able to motivate your self to complete your Ruqya plan on a daily basis.

The aim of the app is to equip you with the best tools and knowledge needed for your treatment plan I'm accordance with the Qur'an and Sunnah. 

We understand that many struggle to stay motivated, so we have made this app user friendly and helpful for people to be able to complete their program successfully.

Our ethos at Alruqya is simple:

‚Ä¢ Improving Health through Educating Society

‚Ä¢ Ruqya According to the Qur'an and Sunnah

‚Ä¢ Revival of the Prophetic Medicine

‚Ä¢ Effective Support and Treatment for Spiritual Affliction

One of our primary goals is to instil hope in you and to remind you that you should not allow your affliction to overwhelm you.

We do not want you to feel disheartened by it and instead we hope to make you understand that it is simply a test from Allaah subhanahu wa ta'ala which will in shaa Allaah strengthen your relationship with Him.

We aspire to make you feel optimistic in seeking a cure.

MAIN FEATURES OF APP:

‚Ä¢ Ruqya Audio Library - Quran recitation and Dua targeting different types of spiritual afflictions.

‚Ä¢ Quran Reading & Listening - Specially designed to help you recite the verses you need for your Ruqya plan along with a proficient reciter to minimise any difficulties in reading. 

‚Ä¢ Dua - A collection of supplications from the Quran & Sunnah that are highly recommended in the daily life of a Muslim.

‚Ä¢ Detailed articles with useful knowledge in understanding different afflictions. Topics range from Tawheed, dealing with spiritual afflictions, real life case studies and much more.

‚Ä¢ Emergency Ruqya plan - A simple and effective guide to be used in case of emergencies such as fits/convulsions, falling unconscious etc 

‚Ä¢ The Prophet's Medicine - A list of remedies mentioned in the Quran & Sunnah that can be incorporated in your Ruqya treatment for optimal results by the permission of Allah.

‚Ä¢ Videos - Delivering educational and motivational messages and more.

‚Ä¢ A Full Body Hijama Diagram - Displaying all the recommended points during Hijama for different illnesses and general well being. 

‚Ä¢ The Raqi Guide - Teaching you the difference between a Raqi who is Islamically lawful and those who are unlawful to visit for treatment.
 

The Quran is the actual words of Allah (swt) which has been revealed to the Prophet Muhammad (SAW) as guidance and a cure for all of mankind, it is used for expelling demons, black magic and evil eye. We must understand that the Quran benefits us in every aspect socially, economical, spiritually and physically. Understanding of the cure (Shifa) in general is a cure in it self and those who understand achieve the blessing. Allah (swt) has clearly told us in the Quran that the actual words of the creator is a healing for all those who believe therefore when used with full conviction seeking the Help of Allah (swt) this form of treatment can bring great miraculous cures to all forms of illnesses.

‚ÄòAllah says in the quran And We send down of the Quran that which is a healing and a mercy to those who believe‚Äô 
(Al-Israa, 17:82)

title: WindWings: Space Shooter - Galaxy Attack
description:
The game is developed based on a fantasy story about a soldier who accidentally went through a time gap to the future. In the future, people have developed to an advanced level of science and technology and began searching for distant planets in space. They created many modern and powerful warships to fulfill that dream. The soldier once again joins the army to join the journey to find the promise land and their fleet encounters many warlike monsters in space. They not only attacked spaceships but also headed straight to invade the earth. In the face of that tense situation, the commander ordered the soldier to come to fight against enemy‚Äôs attacks. A real war has begun. You will play the soldier who takes control of the entire spaceship, protects the earth and leads other spaceships. Destroy and break the enemy's plans.
         WindWings: Space Shooter - Galaxy Attack is a shoot‚Äôem up game genre with many new and modern improvements with lots of impressive points.
‚Ä¢	Players will bring two types of spaceships into battle, each has a unique property. Players will use suitable spaceships from time to time.
‚Ä¢	Many types of monsters are sophisticatedly designed with different types of attacks.
‚Ä¢	Many rounds are constantly updated with many different challenges for players to experience.
‚Ä¢	Many warships, each has a different design and use of a different type of ammunition. Players can optionally customize and combine. 
‚Ä¢	Besides the main spaceship, there are 2 assistants to increase the combat ability.
‚Ä¢	Upgrade your attack power, spaceship speed with Laser missiles, mega-boms and magnets.
‚Ä¢	The game has a good balance of difficulty, suitable for both beginners and hardcore gamers.
‚Ä¢	Many support equipments to help spaceship increase combat ability.
‚Ä¢	Diverse tasks and attractive rewards
‚Ä¢	Diversify the map from the earth to remote places in the universe.
‚Ä¢	Images and sounds combined harmoniously will give players a great experience.
How to play: 
‚Ä¢	Touch the screen and move to avoid enemy‚Äôs attacks, shoot back and destroy them.
‚Ä¢	Click to change the spaceship in accordance with each type of enemy.
‚Ä¢	Collect bullets and equipments to upgrade the spaceship.
‚Ä¢	Use support features during an emergency or when facing strong enemies.

comments: Update: Kudos on the response, developers BUT I cannot change my rating. The adverts & rewards were many & selectable & I watched them but now, every couple of minutes a 5 second ad shows, then a popup ad, then another.... just spoils the game. I constantly viewed the ads to get the rewards but now it's just plain infuriatingly irritating. Still a great game but latest update bombards you with so many ads it completely spoils the gameplay and flow of the game. Sorry, I'm out.

The best of its kind! Thank you for the support and fast response to your community. In the new arena mode how you can earn more points? What's the concept? First time got 22k high score and after that I can reach only 15k

I actually like the game. It's a good shooter. My problem was that I bought gems didn't receive them. Contacted the developer twice and did get an acknowledgement let alone a response.. in the end had to seek a refund from Google. Thanks Google üëç but shame on the developer üëé

Love the game. It is way better and much less glitchier sluggish like some other one which I wouldnt recommend. One setting that they also remembered with these type of games with lots of flying and enemies and exploding etc, is the the one to give you a choice if you want to play with High, medium or low graphic settings. That gives you a 1 in 3 chance to play the game and not like others force you too and then its sluggish and glitchy. Well done devs. Great game.

comments: Used to love this game. Hadn't played in a little while and wanted to play again. Saying the ads are excessive is being kind. The free version didn't used to be like this. It's not even playable anymore and the only way to remove the obnoxious amount of ads is to get the subscription at $2.99/wk. Sadly 'Uninstall' is the best option.

This used to be one of my favorite games. Now they have added a completely excessive amount of ads. After every guess, right or wrong, I get an add. THIS WHOLE GAME HAS JUST BECOME NON-STOP ADDS. I spend more time now watching adds then playing the game. It takes me 3 seconds to make my new guess and type it...but then I get a 45 second long addü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨

I have been playing this a lot lately, it's good fun and addictive. Some of the levels repeat (I just got exact same picture I've had before) but good variety overall. However the addition of ads popping up after guesses is really annoying. I could put up with it for hints or at the end of a level but it's really off-putting now. My other negative would be once you advance in the game you have to scroll all the way down every time. It would be nice to have a way to jump down to where you're at.

An ad after every guess?! What the hell people? I've played this game for quiet a while and have always enjoyed it. Now I'm uninstalling it because that is obnoxious that you feel the need to flood people with ads after every guess. Right or wrong. Doesn't matter. Here's an ad. Oh whats that? Another one? You sure? Its only been one word, but okay. BAM!!!! ANOTHER AD!!!!

Haven't played in a long time and decided to reinstall it. Mad at my self for doing it. There is an ad after each guess making it enjoyable like it use to be. Had to uninstall. Understand having ads but that was way to much.

Update Oct. 30, 2020:: When I tried to go to the link you gave me, I was redirected to ebay. WTH

I have the full version of this app, so it doesn't contains ads. Additionally, I'm running the app on a Samsung Galaxy S9+, with no problems! It has already helped me to find my device several times, (as I have misplaced it several times, or simply forgotten where I placed it)! However, you should know that the location, lock, and wipe your phone doe come as a built in features of the basic Google suite that comes with your Android phone! I got this app for it's Additional features!

This app is garbage. In about the last 6 years and 3 phones, the scream feature worked only once. The website always says its not going through bc of lack service or permission or it's off but it always goes off like 30 min after I find it myself in an area where it has full service and battery. Would give 0 stars if I could. Giving breach updates isn't "security", working features are. Uninstalled.

I haven't had any negative experiences with this app. I like that it scans apps as you install them and let's you know whether those apps are safe. I also like that it does background scans of all my apps periodically. Overall great app for security.

title: My Singing Monsters
description:
Welcome to My Singing Monsters! Breed them, feed them, listen to them sing! 

Raise a monster pet, then feed your musical monster to help them grow. Take care of a collection of fun monster characters in this free musical game for the whole family!

Create an island full of Singing Monsters, then watch your song evolve as you breed and upgrade happy monster pets. Design and build unique decorations to make your world look just the way you want, then share your creation with friends! You'll love exploring the wonderful fantasy land of the Monster World!

Download My Singing Monsters today ‚Äî Happy Monstering!

FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ Collect and level up over 150 cute and funny monsters ‚Äî dragons are so last year‚Ä¶
‚Ä¢ Customize your islands with cool decorations and catchy music
‚Ä¢ Enjoy awesome graphics and character animation
‚Ä¢ Play with friends around the world
‚Ä¢ Discover new updates and events year-round
________

STAY TUNED:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MySingingMonsters
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/SingingMonsters
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mysingingmonsters
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/mysingingmonsters

PLEASE NOTE! My Singing Monsters is completely free to play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. My Singing Monsters requires an internet connection to play (3G or WiFi).

HELP & SUPPORT: Get in touch with the Monster-Handlers by visiting www.bigbluebubble.com/support or contacting us in game by going to Options > Support.

comments: I mean, really just a stellar game. No real need to pay to win, good music (if it's to your taste), pretty smooth animation (in th later updates), very rewarding. Outside of the game itself, the fanbase is generally really nice, it has a respectable presence on the internet, and the creators very actively interact with the players. There's more to say, but the top reviews pretty much say it all. I reccomend just getting the game and trying it out. Also, would reccomend the prequel, Dawn of Fire

Great game, I have only played for a little bit and all ready love it. The progression is fast enough so you don't get bored an microtransactions are optional. I love the idea of your monsters making music and it adds a whole new level of wanting to get more monsters rather than a game that just let's you look at them. At least give this game a try.

I love this game, and I have a few ideas that would make this game SO MUCH BETTER! All I ask is that you respond to me because I would love to get your opinions on these! First, I think when looking through islands in the friends thing, and of course composer songs, you should add a search for artists and the names of songs. That would be a lot faster and easier. Second, I feel like you should add more monsters in the market on the composer island. Maybe trumpits, and add the Ghast as well. Thx!

This has to be one of the best games ever made. So creative to make singing monsters and put it into one perfect game. The free diamond offers actually worked for me, and then got Epic Noggin and Epic Punkleton in less than one hour using the diamonds! I got really lucky that time! Im rating this five stars and nothing can change that. I highly recommend you play it.

Really clever and well-done. You can tell the game designers put a lot of effort into the game. I bought a small pack of gems ($1 worth) several years ago that removed ads and opened up the option for some additional structures. That was a dollar well spent to support a game that's more than earned it, and my only purchase to date. I appreciate that although they make it well worth it to make a purchase, it's far from necessary to enjoy and do well. (Hint: patience + mini mines = diamonds)

title: Sudoku.com - Free Sudoku
description:
Solve sudoku, train your brain, and have fun! Thousands of puzzles to explore. Install to start now!

Classic sudoku for beginners and advanced players. Whether you'd like to relax or keep the mind active ‚Äì pass the time in a pleasant way with sudoku free puzzle game! Get a small stimulating break or clear your head! Take your favorite game with you wherever you go. Sudoku is available offline. Playing the game on mobile is as good as with a real pencil and paper.

Sudoku.com has 10000+ different puzzles and comes in six difficulty levels: fast, easy, medium, hard, expert and giant one! Play easy sudoku to exercise your brain, logical thinking, and memory, or try medium and hard sudoku to give your mind a real workout.

Our free sudoku puzzle games have some features that make the game easier for you: hints, auto-check, and highlight duplicates. What's more, in our app each classic sudoku puzzle game has one solution. You will find all you need whether you are solving your first puzzle, or you've progressed to expert difficulty. Choose any level you like!

Features:

‚úì Complete Daily Sudoku Challenges to get unique trophies
‚úì Take part in Seasonal Events and win unique medals
‚úì Challenge yourself figuring out your mistakes, or enable Auto-Check to see your mistakes as you go
‚úì Turn on Notes ‚úç to make notes as on paper. Each time you fill in a cell, notes are automatically updated!
‚úì Highlight duplicates to avoid repeating numbers in a row, column and block
‚úì Hints can guide you through the points when you are stuck

More features:

- Statistics. Track your progress for each difficulty level: analyze your best time and other achievements
- Unlimited Undos. Made a mistake? Just put it back quickly!
- Color themes. Choose one of three appearances to design your own sudoku kingdom! Play with more comfort, even in the dark!
- Auto-save. If you leave a game unfinished, it will be saved. Continue playing anytime
- Highlighting of a row, column, and box related to the selected cell
- Eraser. Get rid of the mistakes

Highlights:

‚Ä¢ More than 10000 classic well-formed sudoku puzzles
‚Ä¢ 9x9 grid
‚Ä¢ 6 perfectly balanced levels of difficulty. This free app is suitable for both sudoku beginners and advanced evil sudoku players! Play fast, easy and medium levels to exercise your brain. Choose hard sudoku to improve your skills and try expert or giant game for evil challenges.
‚Ä¢ Support both phones and tablets
‚Ä¢ Portrait and landscape mode for tablets
‚Ä¢ Simple and intuitive design

Daily sudoku is the best way to start your day! 1 or 2 classic sudoku puzzles will help you to wake up, make your brain work, and help you to be ready for a productive working day. Download our mobile application and play sudoku free puzzles offline.

If you are an excellent sudoku solver welcome to our sudoku kingdom!  Here you can spend your free time keeping your mind sharp. Regular game practice will help you become a real sudoku master who quickly deals even with the most difficult web puzzles in a short time.

Challenge your brain anywhere, anytime!

comments: Newest release is ad heavy! Before a game, after a game and now on the score page. Use to have a good ad to game ratio with only 1 add per game. And they dont prove their ads. I've had several that the only way to end them was to switch to another app. Oh well, another game to be removed because someone got greedy. Game play and options are outstanding and if the ads weren't so many I'd still play it.

Best ever Sudoku game I've found! Very intelligent game, specifically that I often miss the square I was aiming for, and this game is smart enough to not count that as a mistake, especially on a bad day. It includes fast games, multiple levels of difficulty, and even a giant puzzle with 16 characters, plus colour schemes for comfort and a variety of ways to input data. I doubt I'll ever look for a different Sudoku game, this offers absolutely everything I could think of!

This app used to be ok. Now it acts like a virus. Starts playing multiple ads by itself...no way to stop that...seems a dangerous app to have. Please do not install it. Thanks for responding. Ads between games is fine. After I click on skip/cross, some other ad starts playing in background while the game is displayed on screen. Happens even while using other apps- if I kill sudoku app the background ad stops. After I uninstalled your app I did not face this problem. Please check.

Good game, but too many adverts, which I accept pay for the game. Some of the adverts go on too long until you can close them, draining the battery of the phone, and there have been a couple where I have had to completely close the game to get past the advert. Apparently all of the adverts are supposed to have the option to close after the first 5 seconds or so. This is the case the majority of the time, but not always.

Excellent interface - great notes function; handy way of removing numbers once you've placed all nine (one should remember, but often does not üòä); error check (bit cheaty, but. ..); clear and easy to see. Don't like the ads, so I'd actually buy this (say a ¬£iver) and give it a 5 star. Thank you.

title: News Break: Local Breaking Stories & US Headlines
description:
Local headlines and breaking news ‚Äì get your local news, crime updates,  results and coverage, sports updates and U.S. headlines straight to your phone, with News Break.

Connect with your local community and follow U.S. headlines such as the local news, sports events, lifestyle stories, and even crime updates and traffic. News Break is personalized to your interests, likes and dislikes, so you‚Äôll always get relevant stories that really matter to you.

News Break helps people live safer, more vibrant, more truly connected lives. Whether it‚Äôs your local sports team, lifestyle tips, local headlines, breaking stories, U.S. news and updates ‚Äì you can access local, relevant stories and world news with just a tap.

U.S. News and Highlights

‚Ä¢ Get a curated daily brief focused on breaking stories, the U.S, local headlines, crime updates, traffic, events, sports updates and more U.S. news and local updates
‚Ä¢ Our intelligent local news platform aggregates rich, relevant stories from more than 10,000 trusted news outlets across the U.S.
‚Ä¢ Breaking news - be the first to know about breaking local news, U.S. headlines, world news and local updates

Local Updates: Know Your Town

‚Ä¢ Find local restaurants, local events, shop openings, traffic, breaking stories, and more ‚Äì all in a single app!
‚Ä¢ Read unique perspectives and personal stories from local writers and content creators
‚Ä¢ U.S. headlines, sports updates, lifestyle stories and local events - focus on the incredible things that are happening right where you live and work!

News Commentary: Express Yourself

‚Ä¢ Don‚Äôt just read the news, discuss it with other News Break readers!
‚Ä¢ News Break welcomes all respectful perspectives and points of view

Support the Cause

‚Ä¢ News Break is working hard to revive the local-news ecosystem by supporting small publishers around the U.S.
‚Ä¢ We‚Äôre activating legions of local bloggers and content creators ‚Äì people just like you ‚Äì that have important things to say about their communities. Join in and share your views & news!

What are you waiting for? Download News Break today and start living a safer, more vibrant, more connected life through the power of local news, U.S. news and information!

Your place for local updates, breaking stories and world news. News Break ‚Äì Better Informed, Better Life.

comments: It's a pretty nice app. Loads of information and tons of links. The guys are great. If they run across something that you like, they will email you or text ya. They we're just letting me know about Tom's Place. It's really good too. Kinda slow at times but it's not bad. I would definitely recommend üòä this app.

I am tired of this app crashing, repeatedly. I will be in the middle of an interesting article and the app closes and restarts. I even deleted it and reloaded it and it still happens. To make things worse, I can't always find the article I was reading again. Annoying. Update...Still happening. Still annoyed.

it is a nice site- if you're into everything - I initially downloaded for my breaking neighborhood news - tried to adjust the notifications level to no avail - it resets itself for push, for local, for comments. it slowly started to take up my whole screen with updates on the same story, with nothing new to report on. I had to uninstall. :( updated 10/31 - app send emails only now :) it seems as though it has improved and I look forward to reading the articles now.

I've been using News break for about a year now, and it's been informative and accurate in relating the news. I like this app mainly because if it's wide variety of topics and interest pieces. My news etc. is ALWAYS just a few inches from me. I don't have to go buy a newspaper for almost $2.00 everyday. I feel I get the news I need to keep me up to date between this app and watching Action news a couple times a day.

The developer needs to work on this site!!! They do not respond back, or even care about issues. It freezes up and sometimes takes 30 minutes to as you to "stop"/"wait" or "close out" by that time you are other places. They load too many ads for the screens and ones that take over the whole screen where you can not close out of,you have to leave the app, and come back never to read the article you were trying. The ADs do not format to fit the page right. I need more space here to address issues

title: Make More! ‚Äì Idle Manager
description:
Welcome to the world of factory business!

Start with just one factory and an employee in this silly work simulator. Hire more, build more and make more to become an industry leading big shot. You're the boss! And the boss of the bosses! At least until you meet THE BIG BOSS...

‚Ä¢ üí∞ MANAGE ‚Äì Hire & train your workers. Not productive enough? Replace them with robots!
‚Ä¢ üè≠ EXPAND ‚Äì Run multiple factories at the same time, upgrade and make more crazy products
‚Ä¢ üí§ IDLE ‚Äì Too lazy to boss around? Understandable. Automate! Profit!
‚Ä¢ üèÜ ACHIEVE ‚Äì Make THE BIG BOSS happy and get rewards
‚Ä¢ ü§° COLLECT ‚Äì Get all the 200+ workers, bonus jobs, trophies...
‚Ä¢ ‚≠ê PRESTIGE ‚Äì Level up and restart with better workers, better bonuses, better everything
‚Ä¢ ü§ë MONEY ‚Äì Make more cash and tap tap tap to be a billionnaire multifactory tycoon

You have never seen factories like these before. Each one managed by a wacky boss such as the circus clown or medieval king who motivate their hard working employees by pounding the table and yelling. Just like your boss. Or your parents. Or spouse. We call this "maximising profits through positive motivation".

And the workers? There's a long queue of eager employees at the factory gates waiting to be employed by you! As their boss you get to train them and reward the best performers with prices like golden medals and the much sought after Employee of the Day award!

Oh, and did we mention the surprise boxes and loot? Boost productivity by giving your factory bosses a cup of coffee or an energy drink. That really gets them going! How about some motivational 80's disco music? Your employees will dance and jam and make even more while at it!

Become the biggest boss and MAKE MORE!


!!WARNING!! HIGHLY ADDICTIVE! Once you start playing Make More!, you can't put it away!


Make More! can be played for free, but it contains optional in-app purchases. Please see your device's settings if you want to disable in-app purchases completely.

We'd appreciate if you'd report any issues you're having with the game to support@badcrane.com, please include your device make and model.

comments: Overall, this is a good game. Balanced, progress isn't too slow, and fun. While it is a grind, frequent power ups and "floating dollars" make it easier, and I installed an auto clicker. I would rate it 4.5 stars, but that's not possible.

Fun, ad optional , game to play Sometimes ads don't work or don't give buff, but sometimes it gives the ad buff, then gives it again, so when I giving my employee of the day more time, it became 32 hours But fun time waster Edit: BUT sometimes it says it going give you one thing from a flying gift, but then it doesn't give it to you, so when that's fixed, it will be a five star rating again

This game is really good for using time when you have nothing to do and is generally a very fun game. The only reason why I didn't give it 5 stars is because, I was saving up 15 dollars (in game) to buy the coin rain and once I got the 15 needed it stopped me from buying it.

This is a pretty good idle game. You can play it entirely without an internet connection and it doesn't shove microtransactions in your face every 5 seconds. I definitely recommend this game if you like idle games.

I don't have all the badges in the game but it is pretty good not going to lie I got all the factories and I got to the millions of the Mondays and I got a couple robots I got like 18 and right now I got the trophy my first Trophy and recent at the game I'll see you later guys now time for me to work doing this

title: Apk Share Bluetooth - Send/Backup/Uninstall/Manage
description:
‚ú∞‚ú∞Apk Share Bluetooth‚ú∞‚ú∞ - is a app manager that helps Share , Uninstall , Backup and Manage.

Apk Sharer - Send Apk/Link
Using this app you can send apk or play store link easily by :
‚ö° Bluetooth
‚ö° Whatsapp
‚ö° Email
‚ö° NFC and etc.
It also gives you information about app sizes for transfer.

Easy Uninstaller - Multiple Quick Uninstaller
App will help you to find last installed, more size applications and Uninstall it easily in one click. You can also manage system apps, but without root permissions it's not possible uninstall it.

App Backup - Easiest backup tool
Bulk Apk Backup to SD card. FREE UP your device storage! Faster & Smaller.

Features
‚úì Multiple Apk Share - Transfer apps over bluetooth, email ,Facebook, Whatsapp etc.
‚úì Multiple App Uninstall - Easy Uninstall multiple app faster in one click. Fast apk uninstaller.
‚úì Multiple App Backup - Save multiple apk to SD card in one click.
‚úì Copy multiple app Link to Clipboard
‚úì Auto Apk Refresher - Refreshes App list on new install or uninstall 
‚úì Quick Sort - Sort by Name, Install Date, Size
‚úì View App on Play Store
‚úì Launch Selected Application
‚úì Show System Applications
‚úì Sweet & Usable interface
‚úì Quick Search - Search your application easily by name
‚úì Simple Animations
‚úì App Informer - Shows selected and all application count and size based on your search filter
‚úì Used Permissions - Shows used permissions by app
‚úì FREE

Notice:
¬ª You can not uninstall system application if root permissions does not exists.
¬ª If you are not seeing app on list, try to use Show System Apps option.

‚ñ∫ Required permissions
‚Üí	WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: For Backup Apk to SD card

‚ñ∫ Facebook- follow us
‚Üí	https://www.facebook.com/apksender

We are trying do best for you!

FAQ
üí¨Why I not see some apk on list?
üí°For system app you check the menu "Show System Apps"

üí¨Can I Share Apk to non Android devices?
üí°Yes, if non android devices have bluetooth, email and etc. then you can send , but you can not run apk on non android device

üí¨Do both people need the app?
üí°No , only sender need this app

üí¨How I can backup all app to SD card?
üí°From menu choose "Select All" and then click "Backup"

comments: This app deserves 6 STARS!!!! I love the fact that it gives you the option to list apps from most recent to oldest. I usually share apps using wifi direct between my samsung phones, and this app has never let me down. Does not affect battery life on none of my phone, which was my primary concern. An app that doesn't consume (much) battery isn't certainly doing any background activity. It's a free app, and a good one too; therefore the least I can do is to write this sort of lengthy review, lol.

This is a very good app. There is a SELECT ALL but it's not obvious, long press any single apk, then tap select all context menu. It's also a little odd that there is no save option only share but that's not too much of a problem since you can share to your a file explorer with the added advantage that you can save to any location that you choose at the time rather than a default folder. Overall a very good app.

I'm always skeptical about these kind of apps because they keep promising things and don't deliver. I tried other apps and no luck but this app worked instantly, I'm actually amazed. I transferred an app to my tablet from my phone via WiFi direct and it worked. Now I'm using the app on my tablet. Thank you app developers for making a genuinely easy app to use and that works what it was intended for. I had to write this to let others know. Thank you once again.
I hate it.when i use this app and the transfer finished the other device need to install it say "app not installed" and i try it again "app not installed "plss fix it.
Super when you don't have other speedy files transfer applications

description:
Cloud storage for your mobile devices. Easy to backup, search and share. 

Sign up today for 600 GB or 2 TB of storage and your first 30 days are on us.

Features:  
‚Ä¢	BACK UP your photos, videos, contacts and more to a secure cloud storage
‚Ä¢	SYNC & ACCESS across devices ‚Äì Backup, sync and access your content when you need it, from your smartphone, tablet or computer

comments: Absolutely no issues to report. MotoZ4, running Android 10. It's a basic app but, that's exactly what you want in cloud storage. Simple and to the point. Transitions are a little slow but, I'm fine with it; this app is doing what it's supposed to üëç. Total app size: 114 MB. No issues with this. Hey people: a 128 GB Samsung EVO memory card is $20 on Amazon. If your phone is "full," clean it out and expand the storage if you can.

So far good. Will need to see down the calendar a ways. 10/30 - still can't access cloud account. 'Sign in and password valid. We can not verify you have a valid account'. (Paraphrasing). When I purchased this tablet, I also purchased a 1TB account. Why can't I get in?

The latest update (10/9/2020) on my Samsung Galaxy J3V is quite a space hog. The amount of space used has gone from around 40 MB to over 400 MB. The creepy part is that it continues to grow with no end in sight like some weird tumor. The growth is classified as data rather than cache. I was told could delete data but it would then have to re sync. It is now the largest app in memory. Asked if I could safely uninstall this update still waiting for an answer. Less than 3 GB left in storage space.

Upload speeds to cloud server are extremely poor (1-5Mbps), files in the Verizon Sync folder fail to upload and will just repeatedly try over and over (which I suspect is the cause of reviews saying this app used up all their data), desktop app is clunky and outdated, can not log into my account via app from a second phone (my work phone), connections to the cloud service often time out. Competing services have never given me any of these issues and are far more price competitive. This service was included in my cell plan but I would rather pay to use a different service than fight to make this one work for free.

Have never even used this app yet since the latest update my phone has completely run out of space. I have deleted hundreds of pictures and videos (DAILY), deleted apps, and am still unable to use literally anything in my phone. Can't so much as make a call or even try to open any app, including cloud, because they close instantly as it still says it's 100% full. Last night I just happened to notice that this app, that has never been used, is now taking up 10gb! That is completely unacceptable.

title: Smurfs' Village
description:
The evil wizard Gargamel and his ever present cat companion, Azrael, have finally found the Smurfs‚Äô village and scattered our lovable blue friends far and wide throughout the enchanted forest. Come along with familiar friends, like Papa Smurf, Smurfette, Brainy, Jokey, Greedy and the rest of the smurf family, as they guide you on a family fun adventure to build a new forest village for the Smurfs to call home.

Based on the beloved classic Saturday morning cartoon, your adventure begins with a single mushroom home and a smurflightful plot of land. Harvest your smurfberries. Build charming huts, special mushroom houses, and bridges. And decorate your village with colorful gardens, lights, flower chairs, hammocks and more!

------------------------
FEATURES:
FAMILY FUN - Build your very own Smurfs' village and create a new home for the Smurfs.

PLAY WITH YOUR FAVORITE SMURFS - Papa Smurf, Smurfette, Lazy Smurf, Baby Smurf, Handy Smurf, and Jokey Smurf

HARVEST SMURFBERRIES - Use in-app purchase to speed up the growth of your crops and your blue village.

SMURFY MINI-GAMES ‚Äì While your village is growing, play multiple mini-games like: Greedy Smurf‚Äôs Baking Game, Papa Smurf‚Äôs Potion Mixing Game, Painter Smurf‚Äôs Painting Game, Lazy Smurf's Fishin' Game and a new free Handy Smurf minigame to unlock additional bonuses.

CONNECT WITH FRIENDS ‚Äì Share your Smurfs Experience on Facebook and send gifts to your friends' villages.

PLAY OFFLINE - manage your village anytime without having to connect to the internet
------------------------
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/smurfsgames 
Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SmurfsVillage
Follow us on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/bongfish
