comments: I guaranty the people who created this game are from China. All they care about is getting your money legal or illegal. We need to bring legal actions against them. This game is biggest money pit I have ever seen. The good ratings are people who work for the developers. There are alot of bad reviews. There is absolutely no customer service. I purchased a 300 ship upgrade & my credit card was charged but I did not get the 300 ships. When the game steals your money once, it will happen again.

So far, so good! It's actually kinda fun, and a good way to pass the time! This game reminds me a lot of that game from back in the day called " Galaga" So anybody that liked playing that game way back when....Getcha Pull off this game, and give it a try! ü§òüòé

This beautiful game would easily be a 5 star game, unfortunately the devs are horrible. 5 recycled failed events in a row + Halloween event failed. Lost 6 tickets had 7 boss freezes = 2000+ candy lost with no compensation and yes we messaged devs on FB. They don't do anything, literally nothing. No customer service, purchases fall through, 100s of bugs with no help whatsoever. $10 a week for no ads (80+ ads a day). Most of this can be fixed if the devs simply did their job but they don't. SMH...

I admit that while the developers need to make money, one should be able to buy new planes by playing long enough and earning coins. After a point coins are useless and you need the green gems, which can only be accumulated by watching ads mostly. Most of the planes have to have cards which depend on luck. Also wings can never be accessed because it's just too hard. It's sad that a game with such good gameplay is riddled with money making schemes.

I have played this game for more than 2 years. Initially it is fun, but when you get to the higher levels it is almost impossible to progress. You need ship upgrades to progress and they need colossal amount of gems and as you may guess gems are difficult to get. If only the developer were less greedy for cash and more generous on rewards it might have been very good game. Unless you intend to spend a fortune on this game play up to level 60 and find something else.

title: CodyCross: Crossword Puzzles
description:
- Best of 2017 Google Play store 
- A new crossword experience
- Challenge yourself with countless puzzles
- Relax while exploring thematic worlds
- Become a trivia master
- Word games reinvented
- Solve puzzles and have fun while you learn
- Enjoy this exclusive crossword gameplay
- Excel at brain games
- A brand-new word game challenge
- Solve crosswords anywhere you are
Join CodyCross, a friendly alien that has crash-landed on Earth and counts on your help to learn about our planet! Travel across space and time as you unveil our planet's history and humanity‚Äôs accomplishments through themed puzzles in this challenging word game. 
Solve crosswords and explore beautiful sceneries, use your knowledge and skills in a one-of-a-kind word game, where every correct answer takes you closer to completing the puzzle and revealing the secret word! 
Highlights: 
- Explore beautifully designed worlds with hundreds of levels to play the best crosswords 
- Each world brings new themes and genres that will challenge the wisest of puzzle lovers
- Have some fun while testing your knowledge with brain games
- Innovative gameplay that brings a new twist to crossword puzzles
- Test your language skills through these brain games
- If you get stuck on a question in our word game, use the power-up to reveal a letter
- Solve crosswords to train your brain 
- Sync your progress across all devices by connecting to Facebook
- Solve crosswords and play different levels in offline mode if you don‚Äôt have internet connection (with limited features)
- You can play tons of puzzles for free on adventure mode or subscribe for special packs in this word game.
About subscription:
- A subscription is offered within the app for enjoying special themed puzzles in your desired difficulty (hard, medium, easy and kids) with fresh new content every week.

recentChanges:
Hi there, friends!

The latest CodyCross update is here, and we want you to join in on the fun with our Halloween theme! If you‚Äôre looking for thrills and adventure, explore the newest Fantasy World puzzles.

We hope you‚Äôll have a spookily fun time!
comments: Bunch of ads and a terrible energy system, which basically let's you start a one puzzle per day, unless you pay or watch even more ads (if there weren't enough already). One puzzle takes around 10 minutes to complete, so there you have it - play for 19 minutes, wait 24 hrs, play for 10 minutes again, wait another 24 hrs etc. Honestly you can find much better games out there and I hope you do. I'm not saying this particular game is bad, but its monetization is just terrible. ... Please fix.

In my initial review, I talked about the long ads between each group. Since then there is a way to shorten the ad after only 3-5 seconds. So my update is to say that this is a really fun take on a crossword puzzle and the fact that the developers listened and worked out a solution gives the game a solid 5 stars. Thank you for responding and for working to find a solution!

I have a Samsung Note9 but this game uses too much battery and makes my phone hot. I love, love, love this game so these facts make me sad. UPDATE: some of the ads (which I do not mind watching since they let me play for free, I can't afford to pay) but some of the ads are freezing the game. Please fix these issues. I do not want to delete. Have a blessed day

I like this game, but there are too many ads. Each game takes 2 tokens and there aren't enough ways to gain tokens. It would be best to find ways to motivate people to play the game. Do fun games where they can win more tokens. Way too many ads!! Before you can play. After you play. Its crazy and a waste of time. Otherwise I really like this game and would probably keep playing of the ad situation can be made better.

I love this game.Awsome,wonderful,amazing,superbüòäüòäüòòüòòüòö.This might be the best game among all crossword games.There are even powerups to help if we are unable to find the word for a question.Very nice wonderful game.But the only thing is ,it works so slow if my data pack is over.I wish it to be work fast though my data pack is over .Hence i gave 4 stars. Apart from this ,it a awesome game .Loved it.ü§óü§ó

title: BAND - App for all groups
description:
Organize your group on BAND! It‚Äôs the perfect group communication app, with features like the Community Board, Shared Calendar, Polls, To-Do Lists, Private Chat & much more!


BAND is BEST for:

‚óè Sports Teams ‚Äì Keep track of game days and team practices with the Calendar, send quick notifications about canceled practices, and share team videos and photos, all in one place.

‚óè Work/Projects - Share files and keep everyone in the loop with the community board. Have a quick group call with remote teams. Hold everyone accountable with shared to-do lists.

‚óè School Groups - Plan all your school events easily with the group Calendar. Use Polls to plan activities and food options. Send group messages to keep everyone updated.

‚óè Faith Groups - Organize activities with weekly notices and event RSVPs. Support each other throughout the week by privately sharing prayer requests through chat.

‚óè Gaming Clans and Guilds - Set up a raiding schedule with the group calendar and share important information about any game with all your members. Use multiple chat rooms to find groups, manage recruitment and share strategies.

‚óè Family, Friends, Communities - Stay connected with your family and friends. BAND also has Public groups! Use the Discover feature to find communities with similar interests.


Why BAND?

BAND is the best way to stay connected with your group! BAND is trusted by group leaders as the Official Team Communication App for Varsity Spirit, AYSO,¬†USBands,¬†and Legacy Global Sports.

‚óè Be social & stay organized in the same place
Community Board / Calendar / Poll / Group File Sharing / Photo Album / Private Chat / Group Call

‚óè Create or join a space that meets your group‚Äôs unique needs
Adjust privacy settings (secret, closed, public), control notifications, manage members (admin & co-admins), assign privileges, and make a vanity URL or home cover design dedicated to your group. Customize your group and use it how you want to!

‚óè Accessibility
You can chat wherever you are. BAND can be used on any device including your phone, desktop, or tablet by going to¬†http://band.us.
We value your feedback! Send us your feedback and/or suggestions so we can make BAND better for you & your groups.

comments: Band has been fantastic! I've been using it for the last 3 years since I became cheer director for our local youth league. It keeps me organized and everything in one spot. Its so helpful with parents. You can add everyone to your band and set things how you want them. They even have a live streaming option, polls, attendance and sooo much more. I will always use band for any group stuff I may have.

I love the original Band App. It works so well from. My team at work and our daughters softball team to communicate with the parents. I recently downloaded the BAND FOR KIDS for my daughter to talk to her teammates, it hasn't worked yet. I have paid 2 different times, $.50 and I still can't make it work.

Great app--has essentially transformed our group's communication. Feature request: Please allow toggling the visibility of calendars within a Band. If we have multiple calendars created for different purposes, it would be nice to be able to declutter the agenda view by hiding events from irrelevant calendars. Also, please let us specify an individual calendar (when there are multiple) from a specific band when we are creating a widget. Thank you, developers!

This is a excellent app. I was able to listen enjoy and be a part of a church service that was active. Thank you Pastor Rodrick Reeve of New Creation family worship center. Also the staff and congregation. Love the way it works. I will tell others how good it is. Thanks.ü§©

Perhaps the best application to manage a sports team activities and keep everyone coordinated and on the same page. Same is true for the recording project, as it is a platform to have all the materials shared and updated between the participants.

title: Stress First Aid
description:
The Stress First Aid app is a community resource that provides guidance and resources for individuals dealing with stress, and for leaders, family members, friends, and co-workers who know someone who is currently dealing with emotional stress or is in a crisis situation. This App is not a replacement for professional judgment of leaders and clinicians or indicated clinical care, and should not be used as a substitute for seeking professional help.  The hyperlinks contained in this App are not an endorsement of such websites or the information contained therein.

The Stress First Aid app includes these features:

* Suicide Intervention:  ACE
* Crisis Referral Path
* Stress Continuum
* Stress First Aid Model
* Stress Indicators
* Actions to Help
* More Resources.

title: Breathmix - Biofeedback Breath Pacer
description:
Who Can Benefit From This App? 
Performing calm breathing exercises can help with variety of situations:
dealing with stress, asthma, panic attacks,  relief of chronic pain or just
daily relaxation. 

Breathmix contains 2 products in 1: 

Box Breathing 
In this powerful relaxation technique you breathe according to a predefined
pattern (4-7-8 for helping falling asleep is a famous example of this) . The goal
is to sync the heart rate with the breathing - reaching heart rate coherence / resonance.
In "Simple mode" the app allows you to set a breathing function of your choice
with the following features not always found in other places:

‚òÖ  Decimal accuracy in inhale, exhale, hold and rest periods.
‚òÖ  Adjustable breathing depth based on lung capacity.
‚òÖ  3D widget with touch gestures to fluently adjust pacing and breathing depth .
‚òÖ  Session timer.
‚òÖ  Audio and vibration cues. 


Heart Rate Variability Coherence Trainer
The second product inside Breathmix is the HRV biofeedback trainer. 
The end effect is the same as in the box breathing technique 
but here the heart rate is measured by a sensor and an algorithm adjusts the breathing pattern. 
learn more:
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4104929/

The following features are provided
‚òÖ  Heart rate graph 
‚òÖ  Preview window for adjusting the finger position 
‚òÖ  Resonance(coherence) percent indication for showing progress.
‚òÖ  Intelligent algorithm to help you reach resonance.
 
Find Your Prefect Breathing Rate
Breathmix is the only app that we know of that allows you to find your personal
perfect breathing rate.  It is displayed when reaching resonance in biofeedback mode.
Once you know this number you can use it in simple mode to improve box breathing
method efficiency.


Try Breathmix premium for FREE
Breathmix allows you to try the complete app suite without limitations for a limited
number of sessions.Try the full functioning app and unlock the pro version  if you like it. 

Visit Breathmix Online
To try an online version of Breathmix right now,  head to:
http://breathmix.com/

Instagram:
https://www.instagram.com/breathmix/

Additional Features
‚òÖ No ads
‚òÖ Interactive tutorial - to get you started, step by step
‚òÖ Guide sounds - use with or instead of visual guide
‚òÖ Ambient audio -  nature sounds for deep sleep meditation and relaxation
‚òÖ Vibration - use in addition to sounds and visuals
‚òÖ Mental battery - keep it charged by practicing regularly

We hope you will find this app useful. 

Stay relaxed,
The Breathmix team :)

comments: I really like this app when it works, but it's got some bugs that make biofeedback mode unusable sometimes, and that makes me question it's accuracy all of the time. Sometimes when it detects my heart rate, it seems accurate, but sometimes the HR it reports is WAY OFF. Example: it says my HR is fluctuating between 40 and 55 but it's really closer to 80. Simple mode is great.

This is great. Love the ambient sound options, but I would like it much more if I could choose to listen to the beat of my heart instead of the breathing rate. My breathe makes its own sound and the ball can bounce silently. I'd like a simple peaceful sounding heart beat to meditate with or the possibility of listening to both breathe and heartbeat.

It is a great app and premiss, but I got it with the hope of using the heartrate monitor feature in conjunction with the breathing tool, but the flashlight kept burning my finger and so I couldn't use it for more than 30 seconds at time like I'd wanted. If you guys debug that aspect of it, I would defiantly give it a try again.

The problem is that the biofeedback mode is utterly useless because the heart rate measurements via the camera are so unreliable and noisy. Other apps manage to do it perfectly fine so I can only conclude that the developers are either incompetent or just don't care. Either way, a waste of my money.
Biofeedback resonance is not working for me. Galaxy s9+.

title: Smash Hit
description:
Take a surreal journey through an otherworldly dimension, move in harmony with sound and music and smash everything in your path! This experience requires focus, concentration, and timing to not only travel as far as you can, but also break the beautiful glass objects that stand in your way.

* Smash your way through a beautiful futuristic dimension, smashing obstacles and targets in your path and experiencing the best destruction physics on mobile devices.

* Musically synchronized gameplay: music and audio effects change to suit each stage, obstacles move to each new tune.

* Over 50 different rooms with 11 different graphic styles, and realistic glass breaking mechanics in every stage.

Smash Hit is playable at no cost and free from ads. An optional premium upgrade is available through a one-time in-app purchase that will enable new game modes, cloud save across multiple devices, detailed statistics and the ability to continue from checkpoints.

comments: Great game. Superb quality and excellent graphics. The only thing is when you run out of balls and you are sent back to the home screen you cannot continue without the premium bonus. There should at least be 1 more free gamemode or it will get boring. If it gets boring you loose players. If you loose players it will run downhill quickly. Please improve this. If it gets improved I will rate 5. For now its 4

I love this game! It's really good,time eating and fun! The graphics is just out of this world! I just don't like 2 things: 1.the fact that you have to restart the game every time from the beginning (if you don't want to buy premium) 2.when you miss only ONE crystal you lose all multiballs!(and the steps). That 2 facts are the reason I gave this game 4 stars. I would recommend this though!

It's really fun and helps me focus, the music in the background and the sounds of breaking glass is also very relaxing, but one thing i noticed is when they tell you "checkpoint saved", sometimes it doesnt let you click on the screen or doesn't detect your fingers on the screen, if you could fix that, that would be great!üëåüíñ

It's a really nice game . N I really liked it just the thing is that u have to take a look at ur balls otherwise it does not take time to be finished üòÇ Leaving this the game is perfect. If u r bored u can absolutely play it. It's the best way to time pass. If u r out u will definitely play the other But u will never b full of this game.üòÅ Play and enjoy the game.

I love this game! The only thing i have a problem with is there's not enough levels. I passed every level, then it goes to endless mode i think it's called. Other than that it's an awesome game, very well made. Side note: i did purchase the premium version, because of how much i love this game!

title: Megapolis: city building simulator. Urban strategy
description:
Ladies and gentlemen, 
Welcome to Megapolis - a long standing city building strategy game. Megapolis is not only a true economic game based on the rules of the market, but also a perfect chance to build the metropolis of your dreams. 
You'll never be bored in this game,  Megapolis has a lot of opportunities to grow: build a perfect urban infrastru—Åture, advance science by forming a research center, expand the mining industry for natural resources or become a true oil tycoon. You can play however you want. 

LINE UP REALISTIC BUILDINGS AND MONUMENTS
Ever wanted to combine Stonehenge, Eiffel Tower and Statue of liberty all in the same town? Now it's possible! Megapolis gives you an opportunity to build a huge number of famous buildings and monuments which look exactly the same their real-life counterparts. Build houses, skyscrapers, parks and choose the monuments you'd like to add to your city to enjoy the view. Place buildings strategically to keep the taxes flowing and your city growing. There‚Äôs always something new and different to make your town unique.

BUILD PERFECT URBAN INFRASTRUCTURE
Megapolis is constantly growing! Create one of the busiest transport hubs ever and provide your citizens with all the blessings of civilization . Construct infrastructure such as a Ring Road for vehicular traffic, an extensive underground network, railway stations for cargo and passenger trains, airports with fleets of airplanes to send flights all over the world, and much more!

DEVELOP AN INDUSTRIAL COMPLEX
Form your own manufacturing system strategy. Develop deposits, collect and process resources, build factories, extract and refine oil, and more.  Build up a military base, develop new weapons and enter the arms race. Choose your path and become a true industrial tycoon.

ADVANCE SCIENCE
Mayor! To progress faster and conquer the space, your town definitely needs a research center. Discover new materials, advance science and build a true spaceport to fire the rockets into space. Don't forget to invest in high-tech equipment such as  survey boats, atmospheric sounders, deep-submergence research vehicles and much more!

WIN STATE CONTESTS
Cooperate with other Mayors and compete in real-time state contests. Once the weekly contest is on, earn as many points as you can to get rewards and climb the ranks to advance through Leagues. Compete in seasonal contests to get even more valuable rewards.  Become a top State and get a unique state emblem and rewards that can upgrade and beautify your city.


MAIN FEATURES:
üèô Realistic buildings and monuments
üèô State contests - Develop your own state and join state contests
üèô Amazing opportunities for infrastructure upgrades: railway, airport, ring road, underground, ships etc.
üèô Industrial complex - collect and process resources
üèô Military base - develop new weapons and enter the arms race
üèô Research center - advance science to progress faster

Is your Megapolis going to be your personal source of pride? It doesn‚Äôt matter what type of player you are or what your age is. Every decision is yours as your city grows into Megapolis. Nothing will be in your way once you start planning a strategy to progress. Make smart choices to keep your citizens happy and your skyline growing. It‚Äôs all there for you to enjoy!  Become the most creative tycoon the world has ever seen and the best builder, too! Build, expand, plan your strategy  - the decision is in your hands!

PLEASE NOTE! Megapolis is free to download and install. However, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. A network connection is also required.

End-user License Agreement: 
https://eula.socialquantum.com/

recentChanges:
Awesome news!

Our game has become even better. We have fixed a range of small bugs, so that nothing would keep you from developing your Megapolis. Playing the game is now even more enjoyable! Update now and see for yourself.

We have been working really hard to improve the game for you, so do not forget to leave your comments! Thank you for staying with us!
comments: Great game, but two things you could improve: 1. When you leave the app for even a second, the app restarts. This can be annoying when I want to check something like my texts. 2. Could there be a quick place option? I hate manually placing the same building, for example stuff like energy sources and money sources. It would be convenient to place large amount fo buildings at once. Sincerely, a Player.

Great game, when it loads. Nothing wrong on my end for connection, had it tested. Don't bother spending any money or investing in contests, it won't load on the last day. Sick of playing a game with blank squares with money symbols on them. Can't collect built goods in factories when it doesn't load etc. What a waste of time and money. Only game with no actual fighting or war against someone else, only reason it gets any stars. No war! Thank you.

Absolutely loved this game. This game has a lot of different buildings to choose from. The one problem being, there isn't an option to store the buildings, you either have to move them to a different place or sell it and buy it again and place it where you want to. I would highly recommend this game for anyone who loves city construction games.

Hello SQ. I just want to let you know that this is the best game I have ever played but I am expierencing some problems. Whenever I am going to my state (Kabar) it always loses connection for some reason when I have a good connection. Please fix. Edit: the problem is now fixed thank you so much.

Very good game and challenging so that you will never be bored except that the special event number of days is too small and that you won't have enough material, other than that it's good, also what are the chances of getting the jackpot at the stock exchange when you are level 70

title: King of Avalon: Dominion
description:
King Arthur fell in battle, a victim of the betrayal of his nephew Mordred. Now, his body lies in a fortress on the sacred Isle of Avalon next to his powerful sword, Excalibur. It is only when Excalibur is raised again that a new king again will be crowned and the kingdom will be unified. The whole empire has been split into cities fighting each other. Many desire the power and magic of Excalibur but there is only room for one in the king's throne...

King of Avalon is set in a fantasy medieval England bringing back the legend of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table. Build a mighty city, raise a greater army, master war strategy skills for an intelligent strategy to go to battle, train your magic dragon and wage war against your medieval enemy! Join a multiplayer alliance to survive every enemy assault and increase your chances of succeeding! The great war between kings is about to begin! Build the most powerful empire ever!

Raise your dragon and build your army in the PvP quest to lift Excalibur and become King. Taste power and victory while making friends and enemies along the way. Chat, help, trade, and wage war with players around the globe in a multiplayer adventure. King Arthur‚Äôs death has left an empty throne... Get ready to get medieval! The epic battle to conquer the kingdom with your dragon has started!

‚óÜ War! Everywhere. You and your army allies need to be prepared. Build up and upgrade your bases and bulk up epic armies with a war strategy - you're not the only ones with your eyes on the throne of the Empire!
‚óÜ Multiplayer kingdom war alliances! No man is an island. Whether you‚Äôre rallying against a GvE Barbarian Leader or marching at a PvP bully, you‚Äôll need allies that you can trust.
‚óÜ Send a spy to your enemies with your troops before waging war against the enemy castle!
‚óÜ Dragons! A legendary weapon of mass destruction. How will you train a legendary dragon to battle in your fantasy army?
‚óÜ Chat & play! Easy-translation feature brings thousands of players from around the world together in this real-time multiplayer war.
‚óÜ Strategy! Research and master army attack and defense skills to ensure that you have the edge over your magic enemies. Know when to be invisible and when to order an invasion in this PvP adventure!
‚óÜ Building! Build the foundations of an Empire strong enough to survive in a dragon-fire war zone!
‚óÜ Experience a realist gameplay in every mission. Manage and produce resources to build your army, conquer the kingdom, and win the throne!
‚óÜ Epic free MMO fantasy adventure! The Legend of Camelot lives. Awesome monsters and dragons!

Make strategy your ally and build the greatest army of all time in this multiplayer RTS! Be one of the heroes of King of Avalon and become a myth of the dragon-fire war!

SUPPORT: 
https://funplus.aihelp.net/elva/FAQ/FAQList.aspx?l=zh_CN&SectionID=0&pf_app_id=993

Privacy Policy:
https://www.centurygame.com/privacy-policy

Facebook fanpage:
https://www.facebook.com/koadw

PLEASE NOTE: King of Avalon is completely free MMO to download and play, but some items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please select password protection for purchases in your Google Play Store app. A network connection is also required.

Do you want to be the hero of the kingdom army, the King of Avalon, a dragon hunter, and become the leader of an empire? Lead your army in this free multiplayer strategy war!

comments: Started playing it, thought it would be 3D or as advertised but it isn't, never mind that, game is too much for my device, way too many things happening. Plus the tutorial is so long, I ended up just building and upgrading things I don't know. In fact all the building made me want to play Sim city, if they designed it that way it be enjoyable.

The only reason I am not giving this game 5 stars is that there is no reward for those who don' t spend a lot of money. All events pull you in to spending money - its a choice, I know but can't some events reward perseverance, loyalty and time? It is impossible to be ranked in anything without spending. The difference in players is obscene. In our kingdom (798) it is impossible to survive without being shielded 24/7, which costs. Saying all that, it's bloody fantastic!

Great Game but only way to Play is to PAY !!! If your short on money this game is definitely not for YOU !!! You can play the game without spending but it will take you forever to build. And you will be constantly being farmed by larger opponents healing your troops and losing your resources. Better to Play a one shooter game or download solitary.

There are several issues with this game. First when tapping the bar to increase resource amount then it maxes it out. This caused me to loss all resource I have gotten so to attack because there is no real good way to get shields that I have determined. Alot of stuff to build that really does not help you at low levels. They say it is used as you get higher level but is very inconvenient at times as it feels like you are missing something. When you are killed you very little resource back even

I really liked this game at first until y'all decided to start charging more and more for everything. Honor pass used to be 2 bucks, then 3 now you want 5 for it. You charge people to get the items just to try and play some of your activities but then you don't even give them enough. And the glitches and bugs? I've had millions of resources removed from my account, I've had issue with claiming on prize packs in my messages. It's ridiculous because no new players are added to our kingdoms ever.

title: Farm Heroes Saga
description:
Farm Heroes Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Soda Saga & Bubble Witch 3 Saga! 

Rancid the Racoon is trying to spoil the precious Farm Lands, stealing as many Cropsies as he can along the way. Join forces with the Farm Heroes and help collect the Cropsies to save the day! Play through hundreds of levels solving puzzles by switching, matching and collecting Cropsies across the farm! 

Match 3 or more Cropsies to collect them, plan your moves for bigger and better matches to reach that all important high score! Explore farmtastic adventures across a variety of game modes and puzzles including Rancid boss battles!

Farm Heroes Saga has a wealth of boosters and power ups to help you out along the way! Make the most of Hero Mode when you have moves to spare, Hero Mode lets you earn extra points which makes those big matches even more worthwhile! 

Take on this fantastic Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score and compete to become number 1!

Farm Heroes Saga is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

Farm Heroes Saga features: 
‚óè Collect all kinds of Cropsies to win the level before you run out of moves
‚óè Relaxing match 3 gameplay
‚óè Hero Mode: Earn extra points when you have moves to spare!
‚óè Play levels and win magic beans to help you activate Farm Club 
‚óè Reach for the stars in the Tractor Dash, challenge friends to collect stars for rewards
‚óè Rechargeable boosters, special power ups and Farm Club animals to help you win those challenging levels
‚óè Easy to play but challenging to master
‚óè Acres of luscious levels and puzzles to complete - more added every 2 weeks!
‚óè Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
‚óè Easily sync the game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the internet

Visit https://care.king.com/ or contact us in game by going to Settings > Customer Care if you need help!

Follow us to get news and updates:
facebook.com/FarmHeroes 
Twitter @FarmHeroesSaga 
youtube.com/user/FarmHeroesOfficial 
farmheroessaga.com 

Start matching and collecting Cropsies today! But most importantly have fun playing Farm Heroes Saga!

comments: challenging & interesting game. Certain levels are too challenging for the simple minded like me! Tempted to give up many times as it's too time consuming! üò¢Don't understand why the gold bars are not available for use even though the piggy bank has been full many times. Getting too difficult to complete a level, impossible in fact for hours on end. Very tempted to give up all together & try other games. Getting to a stage where it's too time consuming to complete a level. Losing interest.

This game is fun sometimes, until you have one left and you lose. This game is rigged. Cause they can give you what you need if there is only one left, but they want you to spend money, and when you do spend a little money, you would expect to get cheaper prizes and better prizes. Y'all need to do something about it because im getting annoyed when that happens after I've spent $30 or $40, im expecting better results with my spending

Been Playing for 10 years and I'm obsessed with this game. I love the animals and the challenges, I have gotten all of the animals in the game w/o really putting 5$ in and playing on/off for so many years. So Its a great game with great side games you can play for hours. To the Developers I would like to see more of the level streak boost. For every level you pass you get boosters on your next like the candy crush sagas have. Thank You if you made it here!

Great game until you reach the pay wall level. Move the sheep to the hay.. yeah when the game decides that you're allowed to. No information provided on how to move the sheep, thought I'd got the last sheep to the hay with my last move but NOOOO.. game decides that the same move I'd made with the previous sheep was not allowed. 100% designed like this so you spend money. Well not me. Deleted. As with candy crush take your game and SHOVE IT!!!!

fun till it started cheatingüò°When it starts cheating again I will uninstall it again. It is ok for awhile then it cheats. Funny that the cheating starts when a player reaches higher levels. I am not going to pay for gold bars I have "WON." A lot of time is wasted on ads and other nonsense. I spend mote time watching dumb ads than playing...boo!

title: Stop - Categories Word Game
description:
Stop is a fun and clever turn based game you play with friends. 

Randomly select a letter to start and type a word for each of the 5 different categories that starts with that letter. The player that gets most correct words in the least amount of time wins!


Features:

- Turn based, fast paced word game
- Go head to head with your friends on Facebook and Game Center
- Unlimited fun with challenging categories to choose from
- Achievements to unlock and conquer the game
- Learn a new language! Play in English, Spanish, French, German, Italian and Brazilian Portuguese

Start playing Stop!

Tune in at www.facebook.com/stopbyfanatee

comments: Only 3 stars because I quite enjoy the game, there are alot of ads which I can deal with however you dont get enough lives so you're basically waiting and hoping that the other player hasnt put their phone down so you can play for longer than 5 minutes. My suggestion is either add more lives, or cut down the time to wait for lives. If its going to be a half hour wait to get 1 life, it's not worth my time when I use all 3 in 5-10 minutes.

This is a super great innovative game. I love it. I have always loved the paper version, but to find an app version, this is great. Thank you developers and all who worked hard to make this app possible- From the little guys who are hardly recognized to the CEO or whatever you call your top people.

The game itself is fun! It would be great to have a way to leave comments to your opponent. Some people leave hilarious answers. But the ads are offensive and obnoxious. I understand the need to have ads to support the business, and that I could just pay $3 to remove them. Just beware if your kids want to download it, some of the ads are Rated R.

I REALLY love this game. It's super fast paced, makes me think and I really enjoy the premise of it. However the ads are absolutely terrible. They are constant and long and I know I will soon stop playing the game because of it
The game is fun but very repetitive but it's whatever. I hate how many ads there are and the amount of time they need to run before you can exit out from them.
